tassa cuṁpālaē rammē nisannō ciṭuē sayā । āinnō bhiccavaggēṇaṁ jōyaṁtō jalavēttiṇiṁ ॥ 270 ॥ 379 ॥

jammē vihu akalaṁkō suhakammāō ajāyaāyaṁkō । tassa'tthi varā bhajjā ṇāmēṇaṁ rayaṇacūla tti ॥ 11 ॥ । 1043 ॥ 
savvakalāgamakusalā pasattharuvāilakkhaṇōvēyā । sōhaggavarapaḍāyā accharasā caiva paccakkhā ॥ 12 ॥ 1044 ॥ 
tīē ya samaṁ bhōē puvvajiyapunnakammasaṁjaṇiē । jā bhuṁjai sō sēṭṭhī tāvuppannō suā tāṇa ॥ 13 ॥ 1045 ॥ 
kaṁdappasarisarūvō samatthaṇayarammi acchariyabhūō । kayajaṇaṇi-jaṇayapūō kalāvalīkōilācūōṁ ॥ 14 ॥ 1046 ॥ 
dhaṇaō tti suvikkhāō pabhūyalōyāṇa jaṇiyaaṇurāō । dīṇāṇa dinnacāō viṇīyabahupariyaṇasahāō ॥ 15 ॥ 1047 ॥ 
vavaharai ṇiē haṭṭē bahuvihavaṇiyāraēhiṁ pariyariō । ēvaṁ ca tassa kālō baccai ciṁtāvirahiyassa ॥ 16 ॥ 1048 ॥ 
ēttō ya tammi cēva ya ṇayarē parivasai siṁghalō ṇāma । acaṁtajūyavasaṇī dāriddēṇaṁ samabhibhūō ॥ 17 ॥ 1049 ॥ 
khēllai ya tattha cēva ya uddaṁḍaṁ vāravāsiṇībhavaṇē । jūyaṁ ṇa ya kaiyā vi hu jiṇai imō kammadōsēṇaṁ ॥ 18 ॥ 1050 ॥ 
annamma diṇē līhāē chōhiō aṁdhiyassa jūyassa । laggēṇa cōṭṭaēṇaṁ acchai ciṁtāurō ahiyaṁ ॥ 19 ॥ 1051 ॥ 
kaha kaha vi tassa diṭṭhī paḍiyā dēvīē tīē aṁgammi । tā rōsāruṇaṇayaṇō uṭṭittā jāi tayabhimuhaṁ ॥ 20 ॥ 1052 ॥ 
gēhiṁttā pāhāṇaṁ rōsāiddhō ya bhaṇai taṁ dēviṁ । 'ā ! pāvē ! tuha bhavaṇē ēttiyakālaṁ ramaṁtēṇaṁ ॥ 21 ॥ 1053 ॥

kaiyāviṇa mē jittaṁ tā saṁpai dēhi kiṁci mē davvaṁ । aha ṇa vi tō ajēva ya ṇa hōsi taṁ majjha hatthāō' ॥ 22 ॥ 1054 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ dēvī bhayabhīyā bhaṇai 'mā imaṁ kuṇasu । ṇa vi atthi kiṁci majjhaṁ jaṁ dāyavyaṁ tuhaṁ jōggaṁ' ॥ 23 ॥ 1,055 ॥ 
bhai imō'mā bhaṇihisi jaha navi kahiyaṁ ti, ēsa phōḍēmi' । ṇāūṇaṁ ṇissūyaṁ puṇō vi dēvī papē ॥ 24 ॥ 1056 ॥ 
'jai ēvaṁ tō giṇhasu ēyaṁ gāhaṁ supattaē 'lihiyaṁ' । tēṇa vi rōsēṇa tayaṁ ullālittāṇa pakkhittaṁ ॥ 25 ॥ 1057 ॥ 
dēvīē taō buttō 'mā khiva haṭṭammi vikkiṇējjāsu । dīṇārasahassē ṇaṁ labbhisi taṁ majjha vayaṇēṇa ॥ 26 ॥ 1058 ॥ 
tēṇa vi tuṭṭēṇa tayaṁ puṇō vi gahiūṇa haṭṭamajjhammi । jaṁpatō jāi tahiṁ 'labbhai bhō ! gāha gāha' tti ॥ 27 ॥ 1059 ॥ 
'kai' risiyā pēcchāmō tuha gāhā, kēttiēṇa mōllēṇa । labbhai ?' sō vi payaṁpaṛa 'dijati dīṇārasaha sēṇaṁ' ॥ 28 ॥ 1060 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ vaṇiyā jaṁpati 'gahillaō imō jāō । ajja varāō jūēṇa chōhiō jēṇimaṁ lavai' ॥ 29 ॥ 1061 ॥ 
ēvaṁ hasi māṇō dēvayavayaṇāō jāi ēsō vi । puvyuttaṁ jaṁpatō saṁpattō dhaṇayavīhīē ॥ 30 ॥ 1062 ॥ 
tēṇā'vi pucchiō sō, puṇō vi taṁ cēva jaṁpiyaṁ tēṇaṁ । sēṭṭhisuō vi hu kōṇa dēī jahapatthiyaṁ mōllaṁ ॥ 31 ॥ 1063 ॥ 
ghēttūṇa karayalēṇaṁ jā vāyai pattayaṁ, taō tammi । lihiyaṁ pēcchai ēvaṁ ēkkaṁ gāhulliyaṁ rammaṁ ॥ 32 ॥ 1064 |

“jaṁ kira vihiṇā lihiyaṁ taṁ ciya pariṇamai, kiṁ viyappēṇa ? । iya bhāviūṇa dhīrā vihurē viṇa kāyarā hōṁti” ॥ 33 ॥ 1065 ॥ 
taṁ pēcchiūṇa dhaṇaō hiyaē ciṁtēi suṭu tuṭumaṇō । “ laddhā ahō ! samagghā ēsā gāhulliyā ajja ॥ 34 ॥ 1066 ॥ 
savvassaṁ pi hu dijau jai kaha vi tahā vi pāvaē nēya । ēīē phuḍaṁ mōllaṁ ahō ! salāhā imā saṭṭī ” ॥ 35 ॥ 1067 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi pattō jaṇaō pucchai ya 'putta ! kiṁ kiṁci । vavahariyaṁ aja taē, uyāhu nō ?' bhāṇiē ēvaṁ ॥ 36 ॥ 1068 ॥ 
pāsaṭṭiēhiṁ laviyaṁ 'vavahariyaṁ aja tujjha puttēṇa । gahiyā ēkkā gāhā dīṇārāṇaṁ sahassēṇaṁ' ॥ 37 ॥ 1069 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ sēṭṭhī jaṁpai kōvēṇa phuriyaaharōḍō । 'khāhisi ērisaēṇaṁ vēbahārēṇaṁ ṇa saṁdēhō ॥ 38 ॥ 1070 ॥ 
tā uṭusu ēyāō ṭhāṇāō, uvavisāhi annattha । jēṇa sayaṁ cēva ahaṁ karēmi kaya - vikkayaṁ kiṁci' ॥ 39 ॥ 1071 ॥ 
iya bhaṇiō ēsō vi hu viṇiggaō uṭṭhiūṇa haṭṭāō । “jaṁ kiṁra vihiṇā lihiyaṁ iccāi " maṇēṇa ciṁtatō ॥ 40 ॥ 1072 ॥ 
ṇiggacchai ṇayarāu vi aḍavīē sammuhaṁ aha payaṭṭō । paccāsannammi ya puravarassa aha uttaradisāē ॥ 41 ॥ 1073 ॥ 
jaṁ ciṭuē araṇṇaṁ saṁpattō tattha diṇa'vasāṇammi । pēcchai ya tappa sē mahāmahaṁta saraṁ ēkkaṁ ॥ 42 ॥ 1074 ॥ avi ya-
tuṁga - vitthiṣṇapālīē saṁsōhiyaṁ, maccha-jalahatthi - magarāisaṁkhōhiyaṁ ।

taṁ daṭṭu āsasiō dīharavallīē baṁdhiuṁ puḍayaṁ । kaḍūḍhēūṇaṁ ṇīraṁ piyai tisāpasamaṇaṭṭāē ॥ 77 ॥ 1109 ॥

tēhiṁ vi 'taha' tti vihiyaṁ saṁbhālittāṇa appiyaṁ tēṇa । rayaṇāṇi ya dhaṇaēṇaṁ kayāṇi guttēsu ṭhāṇēsu ॥ 101 ॥ 1133 ॥ 
daṭṭuṇa bahu davvaṁ caliyaṁ cittaṁ sudattavaṇiyassa । aha sanniyā ya purisā 'khivaha imaṁ ēttha kūvammi' ॥ 102 ॥ 1134 ॥ 
tō tēhiṁ dhaṇō bhaṇiō 'kaḍūḍhasu ṇīraṁ ṇa yāṇimō amhē' । jā sō kaḍūḍhai ṇīraṁ tā khittō tēhiṁ ayaḍammi ॥ 103 ॥ 1135 ॥ 
paṇṇūramajjhaḍiō maṇayaṁ pi ya nēya pīḍiō dēhē । uṭṭhēi sasaṁbhaṁtō kūvayapāsāī pulayaṁtō ॥ 104 ॥ 1136 ॥ 
gāha'tthaṁ ciṁtatō iō taō jāva tattha paribhamai । tā jalarahiyapaēsē pēcchai ēgaṁ mahaduvāraṁ ॥ 105 ॥ 1137 ॥ 
jāva ṇirūvēi tayaṁ tā varasōvāṇapatiyaṁ niyai । hēṭṭhāmuhaṁ vayaṁtī avayarai ahōmuhaṁ tīē ॥ 106 ॥ 1138 ॥ 
avayariya thōvabhāyaṁ jāi puṇō paṁjalēṇa maggēṇa । pēcchaṁtō āyāsaṁ ṭaṁkichinnē ya giripāsē ॥ 107 ॥ 1139 ॥ 
āyāsatalavilaggē ubhaō pāsēsu girivarē dahuṁ । ciṁtai “ahaha ! ahō ! hō ! acchariyaṁ kiṁpi naju ēyaṁ ॥ 108 ॥ । 1140 ॥ 
ahavā vi kiṁ imēṇaṁ ? puraō pēcchāmi kiṁpi jaṁ hōi " । jā ēva jāi dhaṇaō tā ṇiyai surālayaṁ ēkkaṁ ॥ 109 ॥ 1141 ॥ 
savvarayaṇāmayaṁ taṁ dahuṁ kōūhalēṇa apphuṇṇō । jā pavisai tā pēcchai majjhē cakkēsarīpaḍimaṁ ॥ 110 ॥ 1142 ॥ 
daddr̥ṇa tayaṁ haṁṭuō baṁdai gurubhattipulaiyasarīrō । thuṇai ya mahurasarēṇaṁ 'jaya jaya jaya dēvi ! dēvi ! tti ॥ 111 ॥ 1143 ॥ 
jaya jaya garuḍaṇisaṇṇē ! jaya jaya varacakkasōhiyakaraggē ! । jaya jaya bhūsaṇadhāriṇi ! jaya jaya surasuṁdarīṇamiē ! ॥ 112 ॥ 1144 ॥ 
1. paṇṇaura° pā0 ॥ 2. tuṭṭō jē0 kā0 ॥

jaya paṇayakappalaiē ! jaya jaya ciṁtāmaṇīmahādēvi ! । saṁpai maha tuha pāyā saraṇaṁ" bhaṇiuṁ ṇivajē ॥ 113 ॥ 1145 ॥ 
bhattīē gahiyahiyayā jaṁpai cakkēsarī 'tumaṁ vaccha ! । vaccasu puraō jēṇaṁ savvaṁ piṁ hu sōhaṇaṁ hōi ॥ 114 ॥ 1146 ॥ 
kiṁca vimaggāhi varaṁ jaṁ tuha cittassa kiṁpiṁ paḍihāi' । bhaṇai imō 'paramēsari ! kimannamēttō vi laṭuyaraṁ ॥ 115 ॥ 1147 ॥ 
jaṁ lōyammi vi dulahaṁ taṁ dinnaṁ daṁsaṇaṁ taē majjha । tā sāmiṇi ! jāmi ahaṁ karēmi āṇattiyaṁ tujjha ' ॥ 116 ॥ 1148 ॥ 
dēvī vi bhaṇai 'puttaya ! mahappabhāvāī paṁcarayaṇāī । ēyāī gēṇha, jēṇaṁ sahalaṁ maha daṁsaṇaṁ hōī ॥ 117 ॥ 1149 ॥ 
dāuṁ dhaṇayassa karē jaṁpai cakkēsarī jahā 'vaccha ! । aiṁgaṁ sōhaggakaraṁ, lacchīnilayaṁ imaṁ bīyaṁ ॥ 118 ॥ 1150 ॥ 
taiyamimaṁ rōgaharaṁ, cautthayaṁ visaviṇāsaṁyaṁ ēyaṁ । āvaipaḍiyaṁ tu ṇaraṁ ṇitthārai paṁcamaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 119 ॥ 1151 ॥ 
ēyammi majjha vayaṇē na hu saṁdēhō kayāi kāyavvō' । iya jaṁpiūṇa dēvī jhaḍatti ahaṁsaṇihūyā ॥ 120 ॥ 1152 ॥ 
cakkēsariṁ ṇamēuṁ dhaṇaō jā jāi aggaōhutaṁ । tā ōsahiṁ niyacchai puraō saṁrōhaṇīṇāma ॥ 121 ॥ 1153 ॥ 
taṁ dahūṇaṁ phāḍai ṇiyajaghaṁ thavai tāṇi rayaṇāṇi । ōsahirasēṇa sittaṁ na najaē jhatti vaṇavivaraṁ ॥ 122 ॥ 1154 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca karēūṇaṁ baccai puraō pahiduhiyaō sō । pēcchai ya mahārammaṁ pāyālapuraṁ tahiṁ ēkaṁ ॥ 123 ॥ 1155 ॥

jā kōūhalapunnō pavisai tā uvvasaṁtayaṁ niyai । vaccaṁtō ya ṇiyacchai ṇāṇāvihabhakkhapuṇṇāō ॥ 124 ॥ 1156 ॥ 
pavarakayāṇayajuttāō paramarammāō vivihavīhīō । ṇimāṇusāō ṇavaraṁ dhavalaharāī pi ya tahēva ॥ 125 ॥ 1157 ॥ 
pēcchatō rammāī sattatalāī dhaōhakaliyāī । aha annammi paēsē ṇiyai narēṁdassa pāsāyaṁ ॥ 126 ॥ 1158 ॥ 
uttuṁgasālakaliyaṁ ṇimmiyavarabhavaṇatōraṇaduvāraṁ । pavaragavakkhaya- cōṁpālayāīkaliyaṁ mahārambhaṁ ॥ 127 ॥ 1159 ॥ 
pavisai ya kōugēṇaṁ ṇariṁdabhavaṇammi taha samāruhai । jā sattamiyaṁ bhūmiṁ tā pēcchai bāliyaṁ ēkkaṁ ॥ 128 ॥ 1160 ॥ 
miu-ṇiddha-kasiṇa-kuṁciyakēsa kalāvaṁ sukaṁtamuhacaṁdaṁ । kaṁbusamasarisagīvaṁ uttuṁgapaōharakaṁtaṁ ॥ 129 ॥ 1161 ॥ 
sukumāladīhabāhuṁ asōyapallavasamāṇa karajuyalaṁ । vajrasamakhāmamajjhaṁ gaṁbhīrāvattaṇāhillaṁ ॥ 130 ॥ 1162 ॥ 
viyaḍaṇiyaṁba karikarasarisōruṁ cāruēṇiyājaṁghaṁ । kummapaṭṭiyacalaṇaṁ siṇiddhaṇahakiraṇakabburiyaṁ ॥ 131 ॥ 1163 ॥ 
taṁ daddr̥ṇaṁ ēsō ciṁtai cittammi “kā imā bālā ? | añccaṁtarūvakaliyā ciṭṭhai ēgāgiṇī ēttha ॥ 132 ॥ 1164 ॥ 
tō pucchāmi imaṁ ciya" jāvēvaṁ ciṁtaē taō tīē । bhaṇiō 'hā hā! muddhaya! jōvvaṇa-guṇa-rūvaāvāsa ! ॥ 133 ॥ 1165 ॥ 
kattha tumaṁ saṁpattō appavahatthā imammi ṭhāṇammi ? । tā ṇiggaccha lahuṁ ciya, jāva viṇāsaṁ ṇa pāvēsi ' ॥ 134 ॥ 1166 ॥ 
1. 'isahiyaṁ kā0 ॥ 2. suddhi jē0 kā0 ॥

bhaṇiyā dhaṇēṇa 'suṁdari ! mā ubvēyaṁ karēha, maha sāha । kassa sayāsāō bhayaṁ ? kō vā ēsō paēsō tti ? ॥ 135 ॥ 1167 ॥ 
kiṁnāmayaṁ ca ṇayaraṁ ? kiṁ vā vi hu sunnayaṁ amāṇussaṁ ? । iya sāhasa majjha tumaṁ aigaruyaṁ kōuyaṁ jēṇa ' ॥ 136 ॥ 1168 ॥ 
tō dhīrattaṇa-sukumālavayaṇarūvēhiṁ raṁjiyā bālā । aha akkhiuṁ payattā 'suṇasu mahābhāga ! jai kōḍuṁ ॥ 137 ॥ 1169 ॥ 
" āsi iha bharahabāsē siritilayaṁ ṇāma paṭṭaṇaṁ rammaṁ । tatthā''si piyā majjhaṁ mahēṁdarāō mahārāō ॥ 138 ॥ 1170 ॥ 
sō annayā kayāī bala - pōrisadappiēhiṁ rāīhiṁ । jā ciṭui akkaṁtō tāva ya kira tassa pāsammi ॥ 139 ॥ 1171 ॥ 
saṁpattō divvavasā ēgō aha vāṇamaṁtarō dēvō । ciṁtai " hā ! kaha ēsō paḍiō kaṭummi ṇaraṇāhō ? ॥ 140 ॥ 1172 ॥ 
pēcchaṁtassa ya ēyaṁ majjha uppajjaē maṇē tōsō । tā kiṁ kāraṇamēyaṁ sammaṁ jāṇāmi ṇāṇēṇaṁ" ॥ 141 ॥ 1173 ॥ 
iya ciṁtiūṇa ṇāṇaṁ vipphārai jāva tāva sō muṇai । “huṁ ēsō puvvabhavē āsī maha aipiō mittō" ॥ 142 ॥ 1174 ॥ 
āgaṁtuṁ ṇivapāsē jaṁpai sō 'ṇaravariṁda ! ṇisuṇēhi । atthi iha bharahakhēttē supasiddhaṁ puravaraṁ rammaṁ ॥ 143 ॥ 1175 ॥ 
ṇāmēṇa caṁdapuraṁ puravaraguṇarayaṇarōhaṇamahagghaṁ । taṁ paripālai rāyā caṁdajasō ṇāma supasiddhō ॥ 144 ॥ 1176 ॥ 
tassa'tthi caṁdakaṁtā dēvī 'tēlōkkaramaṇijiyarūvā । sayalakalāgamakaliyā kamaṇīyā ṇiyayakaṁtassa ॥ 145 ॥ 1177 ॥ 
1. uvvēvaṁ jē0 kā0 ॥ 2. kinnāma tru0 kā0 ॥ । 3. tēlukka° jē0 ॥

ēttō ya tammi ṇayarē aṇēyavaṇisahasaṇāyagō sēṭṭhī । atthi suvikkhāyajasō jiṇadattō ṇāma jiṇabhattō ॥ 146 ॥ 1178 ॥ 
annō vi tassa mittō tattha purē basai saṁkhadattavaṇī | mēttībhāvamuvagaō accatthaṁ tassa sēṭuissa ॥ 147 ॥ 1179 ॥ 
aha annayā kayāī ṇiyahaṭṭē jāva ciṭui ṇiviṭṭhō । tā siddhavihiyavēsō saṁpattō takkarō ēgō ॥ 148 ॥ । 1180 ॥ 
tēṇa vi vatthaṁtāō chōḍittā rayaṇamēgamairammaṁ । dinnaṁ vaṇiyassa karē ṇāmēṇa saṁkhadattassa ॥ 149 ॥ 1181 ॥ 
tēṇa viya tayaṁ dahūṁ cittammi vigappiyaṁ jahā ēyaṁ । “dīsai sutēyarayaṇaṁ taṁ mannē hōhii aṇagghaṁ" ॥ 150 | 1182 ॥ 
iya ciṁtiūṇa tēṇaṁ puṭṭhō 'kiṁ dēmi bhadda ! tuha mōllaṁ ? ' । tēṇa vi ya taō bhaṇiyaṁ 'dēhi tayaṁ hōi jaṁ uciyaṁ ' ॥ 151 ॥ 1183 ॥ 
aha vaṇiēṇa viṇiyaē cittammi viyakkiyaṁ jahā ēsō । “dīsai aīvamuddhō jaṁ kiṁcī dēmi tā mōllaṁ” ॥ 152 ॥ 1184 ॥ 
tō dinnā dammāṇaṁ sahassa dasa tēṇa tassa cōrassa । sō tēhiṁ ciya tuṭṭhō vaccai ṇiyayammi ṭhāṇammi ॥ 153 ॥ । 1185 ॥ 
vilasai ya jahicchāē taṁ davvaṁ bahuvihappayārēhiṁ । ēttō ya tattha muṭuṁ bhaṁḍāraṁ kēṇa vi ṇivassa ॥ 154 ॥ 1186 ॥ 
tassa ya gavēsaṇatthaṁ bhamai talārō gharāghariṁ jāva । tā hiṁḍatō kamasō saṁpattō tattha ṭhāṇammi ॥ 155 ॥ 1187 ॥ 
jattha'cchai vilasaṁtō sō cōrō bahuvihāhiṁ kīlāhiṁ । taṁ daddūṇaṁ talārō ciṁtai "davvaṁ imassa kaō ? " ॥ 156 ॥ 1188 ॥ 
jāva ya tayaṁ ṇirikkhai tā pēccha cōralakkhaṇaṁ tammi । tē dahūṇaṁ ciṁtai “ṇūṇaṁ ēsō bhavē cōrō ॥ 157 ॥ 1189 ॥ 
tā baṁdhāvēmi imaṁ jēṇaṁ jāṇāmi sē phuḍaṁ bhāvaṁ" । iya ciṁtiūṇa tēṇaṁ āiṭṭhā ṇiyayapāikkā ॥ 158 ॥ 1190 ॥

! rē ! baṁdhēha imaṁ jēṇaṁ jāṇāmi bhāvamēyassa' । tō tē vi takkhaṇaṁ ciya baṁdhaṁti tayaṁ sukuddha vva ॥ 159 ॥ 1191 ॥ 
puṭṭhō ya 'kaō tujjhaṁ rē ! rē ! ēvaṁvihā imā lacchī ?' । tēṇā'vi 'jāṇiō' tti ya saccaṁ ciya akkhiyaṁ savvaṁ ॥ 160 ॥ 1192 ॥ 
pabhaṇai taō talārō 'jai ēvaṁ tō samappasu asēsaṁ' । tēṇa vi vikkiyarayaṇaṁ mōttūṇaṁ appiyamasēsaṁ ॥ 161 ॥ 1193 ॥ 
puṇaravi ya talārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ 'natthēttha ēga maharayaṇaṁ' । jaṁpai imō vi 'dinnaṁ haṭṭē taṁ saṁkhadattassa ' ॥ 162 ॥ 1194 ॥ 
tō saṁkhadattavaṇiō sahasā giṇhāviō talārēṇaṁ । taṁ ṇāūṇaṁ sēṭṭhī jiṇadattō jāi ṇivapāsē ॥ 163 ॥ 1195 ॥ 
vinnaviuṁ mēllāvai taṁ vaṇiyaṁ saṁkhadattavaramittaṁ । jāō ya taō suhiō puṇaravi baccaṁta kālē ॥ 164 ॥ 1196 ॥ 
sō saṁkhadattavaṇiō vaccai ṇayarassa dūradēsatthē | dēvaulē tatthadviyadēvassa ṇamaṁsaṇaḍāē ॥ 165 ॥ 1197 ॥ 
aittō ya tammi ṇayarē kuṭuṁbiō basai sōmarāō tti । tassa'tthi varā bhajjā supasiddhā rūviṇī nāma ॥ 166 ॥ 1198 ॥ 
sā āsattā ahiyaṁ rēvaṇanāmammi annapurisammi । jāṇai ya sōmarāō jahā viṇaṭuṁ imaṁ kannaṁ ॥ 167 ॥ 1199 ॥ 
bujhai ya ṇataṁ purisaṁ, vaha ya khēyaṁ maṇammi anbhahiyaṁ । ciṁtai ya bahūvāēṁ jārassa viyāṇaṇaṭṭāē ॥ 168 ॥ 1200 ॥ 
sā vi ya tammi suragihē paidiyahaṁ jāi vihiyasaṁkēyā । tammi diṇammi ṇa pattō kahamavi sō rēvaṇō tattha ॥ 169 ॥ 1201 ॥ .

pattō ya saṁkhadattō, divvavasā hēriyāya tammi dinē । diṭṭhō ya saṁkhadattō pavitō sōmarāēṇa ॥ 170 ॥ 1202 ॥ 
kōvāyaṁbiraṇayaṇēṇa tēṇa sahasa tti tō imō gahiō । bhaṇiō ya 'kattha vaccasi rē pāva ! imaṁ karēmāṇō ? ' ॥ 171 ॥ 1203 ॥ 
baṁdhittu āṇiō ṇaravaissa pāsammi sōmarāēṇa । nāūṇa tayaṁ sahasā samāgaō sēṭṭhī jiṇadattō ॥ 172 ॥ 1204 ॥ 
puṭṭhō ya sēṭṭhiṇā sō 'kammāṇa imāṇa kāraō kiṁ taṁ ? ' । sō jaṁpai 'mitta ! ahaṁ maṇasā vi imaṁ ṇa ciṁtēmi ॥ 173 ॥ 1205 ॥ 
jaṁi ṇa vi pattiyaha mahaṁ pattijjāvēmi tō ahaṁ ṇiyamā । ṭuḍēṇa vi divvēṇaṁ saṁdēhō ṇatthi ētthatthē ' ॥ 174 ॥ 1206 ॥ 
tō ṇaravaissa puraō sēṭṭī jaṁpai viṇicchyaṁ kāuṁ । 'dēva ! imō ṇa hu kārī, giṇhai duṭuṁ pi jaṁ divvaṁ' ॥ 175 ॥ । 1207 ॥ 
bhaṇai ṇivō 'maha divvaṁ tuha vayaṇaṁ cēva, kiṁ viyappēṇa ?" । ēvaṁ ca mōiūṇaṁ āṇai sēṭṭī tayaṁ gēhē ॥ 176 ॥ 1208 ॥ 
baddhāvaṇayaṁ kāuṁ, ciṁtai aha saṁkhadattaṇāmō vi । "pēccha adōsō vi ahaṁ viḍaṁbiō naṇu kahaṁ vihiṇā ॥ 177 ॥ 1209 ॥ 
tā pajattaṁ majjha imēṇa ēvaṁvihēṇa gēhēṇa" । iya ciṁtiūṇa gahiyā parivāyagasaṁtiyā dikkhā ॥ 178 ॥ 1210 ॥ 
parivāliūṇa dikkhaṁ saṁjāō vāṇamaṁtarō dēvō । tattō caviūṇa puṇō saṁsāraṁ hiṁḍiuṁ kiṁci ॥ 179 ॥ 1211 ॥ 
tattō ya puvvajammē kiṁci tavaṁ kariya puṇa surō jāō । ahayaṁ jō tujjha imō paccakkhō rāya ! ciṭṭhāmi ॥ 180 ॥ 1212 ॥

jiṇadattō vi hu tattō mariuṁ sōhammadēvalōgammi । uvavannō tiyasavarō tattō caviuṁ tumaṁ jāō ॥ 181 ॥ 1213।

kūvayapavēsasōvāṇapaṁtiyaṁ bhaṁjiūṇa sō pāvō । bhakkhara diyahē diyahē rakkhasarūvī maṇussāī ॥ 192 ॥ 1224 ॥ 
ēvaṁ bhakkhatēṇaṁ tēṇaṁ uvvāsiyaṁ puraṁ ēyaṁ । mōttūṇa mamaṁ ēgaṁ annō iha māriō lōgō ॥ 193 ॥ । 1225 ॥ 
bāhirapuraṁ pi pāvēṇa jāva aṁha bhakkhiuṁ samādattaṁ । vahaṇēsu āruhittā tā ṇaṭṭō sēsaō lōgō ॥ 194 ॥ 1226 ॥ 
ēsō vi annadēsaṁtarāṇa paidiyaha māriuṁ lōyaṁ । bhakkhara vijābaliō paccakkhō rakkhasō jāō ॥ 195 ॥ 1227 ॥

'gaccha, pavēsēhi lahuṁ' raṇṇā bhaṇiē pavēsaē ēsō । appittu pāhuḍaṁ tō jōkārēūṇa uvavisai ॥ 288 ॥ 1320 ॥ 
diṭṭhō ya tēṇa sēṭṭhī "ēsō sō āgaō sudattō" tti । iya ciṁtatō rannā bhaṇiō 'bhō ! dēhiṁ taṁbōla' ॥ 289 ॥ 1321 ॥ 
dinnō ya ṇēṇa puraō hōūṇa visēsaō, taō ēsō । ciṁtai “haṁta ! kimēyaṁ sāricchō tassa ēsō ti ॥ 290 ॥ 1322 ॥ 
ahavā vi na saṁbhavaī jō pakkhittō agāhakūvammi । nimmāṇusammi rannē tassa ihaṁ āgamō kattha ? ॥ 291 ॥ 1323 ॥ 
sārikkhayā bahūṇaṁ hōi narāṇaṁ, taō imō annō" । iya ciṁtatō rannā bhaṇiō 'tuha addhadāṇaṁ' ti ॥ 292 ॥ 1324 ॥ 
‘dēvapasāō' tti imō bhaṇiūṇaṁ jāi ṇiyayavahaṇammi । dhaṇayaṁ daṭṭu ahiyaṁ saṁkāuliō niyamaṇammi ॥ 293 ॥ 1325 ॥ 
ciṁtai ya “haṁta ! tēṇaṁ taṁbōlaṁ dētaēṇa maha samuhaṁ । sākūyaṁ piva mannē puṇō puṇō pēsiyā diṭṭhī ॥ 294 ॥ 1326 ॥

iya ciṁtiūṇa tēṇaṁ puṭṭhō nayarammi kōi vatthavyō । 'thaiyāētō ēsō kiṁ puvyakamāgaō rannō ? ' ॥ 296 ॥ 1328 ॥ 
kahiyaṁ ca tēṇa 'satthāhaputta ! ēsō na ēttha vatthavvō । kiṁtu imāē juttīē āgaō ēttha nayarammi' ॥ 297 ॥ 1329 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ hiyaē pīyavirēō vba āulīhūō । ētthaṁtarammi ḍōṁbō gōravyō ṇaravarēṁdassa ॥ 298 ॥ 1330 ॥ 
gīyaraīṇāmēṇaṁ gaṁdhavyakalāē suḍḍu ṇimmāō । satthāhassa samīvē samāgaō pariyarasamēō ॥ 299 ॥ 1331 ॥

kiṁ vā vi hu ullāvāigōrakhaṁ kuṇai bhadda ! tuha rāyā ? ' । sō bhaṇai 'dēsiō haṁ, kiṁtu maē raṁjiō rāyā ॥ 302 ॥ 1334 ॥

tuṭṭēṇa taō rannā bhaṇiō macchōyarō ' jahēyassa । dēhi sayaṁ taṁbōlaṁ gaṁdhavviyarayaṇabhūyassa ॥ 308 ॥ 1340 ॥

tō tē ḍōṁbagihāō āṇīē saṁpuḍē palōēi । na ya niyai dhaṇayaṇāmaṁ utthallitō vi savvattō ॥ 341 ॥ 1373 ॥ 
ullavai ṇivō 'ṇa hu kiṁpi ṇāmayaṁ bhadda ! ēttha pēcchāmō' । bhaṇai sudattō 'saccaṁ ōlakkhāṇaṁ imaṁ dēva ! ' ॥ 342 ॥ 1374 ॥ 
jaṁpai dhaṇaō 'sāmiya ! na ēyamaliyaṁ jaō vihāḍēuṁ । jōēha jēṇa pēcchaha maha ṇāmaṁkaṁ ṇa saṁdēhō' ॥ 343 ॥ 1375 ॥ 
saṁdhīō vihāḍēṁtī jā tā pēcchaṁti nāmayaṁ payaḍaṁ । tō palayakālasarisō kuviō vaṇiyassa ṇaraṇāhō ॥ 344 ॥ 1376 ॥ 
jaṁpai 'sūlāē imaṁ ārōvaha pāvakāriṇaṁ cōraṁ । ḍōṁba pi hu khairaṁ piva kuṭṭaha iya dōsasaṁjaṇayaṁ ॥ 345 ॥ 1377 ॥

jai amhāṇaṁ uvariṁ sapasāō kuṇasi taha ya kāruṇṇaṁ । tō muṁcasu dō vi imē niyapāvabharēṇa viddaviē' ॥ 347 ॥ 1379 ॥ 
bhaṇai ṇivō 'ṇa hu juttaṁ ēvaṁ ēvaṁvihaṁ karēṁtāṇaṁ । tahavi hu ṇa tujjha paṇayaṁ annaha kāuṁ pariccaēmi' ॥ 348 ॥ 1380 ॥ 
iya jaṁpiyammi macchōyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ 'mahāpasāō' tti । dāuṁ cautthabhāyaṁ dhaṇaō vi visajaē vaṇiyaṁ ॥ 349 ॥ 1381 ॥ 
ḍōṁbassa vi jaṁ uciyaṁ taṁ dāūṇaṁ taō ṇariṁdassa । ēgatē ṇiyacariyaṁ savvaṁ pi savittharaṁ kahai ॥ 350 ॥ 1382 ॥ 
'jaha dēva ! tujjha sēḍissa saṁtiō rayaṇasāraṇāmassa । puttō haṁ' iccāī macchayagilaṇāipajaṁtaṁ ॥ 351 ॥ 1383 ॥

kiṁtu na sāmiya ! ēvaṁ gujjhaṁ kassā'vi pāyaḍēyavvaṁ । jāva ṇa sō saṁpattō' bhaṇai ṇivō 'hōu ēvaṁ ' ti ॥ 353 ॥ । 1385 ॥ 
aha annammi diṇammiṁ pūriyagurusiḍasamūharamaṇīyaṁ । bahudhaya- mālavamālaṁ dīsai āvaṁtayaṁ vahaṇaṁ ॥ 354 ॥ 1386 ॥ 
taṁ daṭṭuṇaṁ lōgō udghāvai tassa sammuhaṁ jhatti । pēcchaṁtāṇaṁ ca khaṇēṇa āgayaṁ jalahitīrammi ॥ 355 ॥ 1387 ॥ 
saṁvariyā ya barasiḍā ṇivāḍiyā taha ya kūvayakkhaṁbhā । jalamajjhammi u ṇaṁgarasilāō khittāō mahaīō ॥ 356 ॥ 1388 ॥ 
baddhāō pāyāō dharaṇayāṇammi aha dharēūṇaṁ । uttariō satthāhō sapariyaṇō dēvadattō sō ॥ 357 ॥ 1389 ॥ 
uttāriyā ya taha tilayasuṁdarī paḍauḍīō uviyāō । uttāriyaṁ ca bhaṁḍaṁ saṁkhitaṁ ṇivaṇarēhiṁ ॥ 358 ॥ 1390 ॥ 
bhariūṇaṁ rayaṇāṇaṁ varathālaṁ tilayasuṁdarīsahiō । saṁpattō ṇivabhavaṇē pavisai ṇaraṇāha'ṇunnāō ॥ 359 ॥ 1391 ॥ 
appē pāhuḍaṁ sō uvavisaī āsaṇammi dinnammi । nāyaṁ ca naravarēṇaṁ “dhaṇayakkhāō imō hōhī ॥ 360 ॥ 1 3 92 ॥ 
jamhā pāsē ēyassa dīsaē kā vi suṁdarā bālā । aṁguṭṭiiyavayaṇā lajjābharamaṁtharasarīrā ॥ 361 ॥ 1393 ॥ 
taṁ mannē sā ēsā hōhī dhaṇayassa rūviṇī bhajjā" । iya ciṁtiūṇa rāyā saṁbhāsai satthavāhaṁ taṁ ॥ 362 ॥ 1394 ॥ 
jaha 'kattō iha tubbhē ? kiṁ vā vi hu bāliyā imā ēttha । āṇīyā ?' iya bhaṇiē satthāhō jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ॥ 363 ॥ 1395 ॥ 
'dēva ! kaḍāhāō ahaṁ saṁpattō ēttha vavaharaṇahēuṁ । bālā ya imā laddhā samuddamajjhammi dīvammi ॥ 364 ॥ 1396 ॥

tā dēva ! puhaiṇāhā tubbhē iha saṁpayaṁ aō majjha । aṇumannaha jēṇa imā saṁjāyai bhāriyā pavarā' ॥ 365 ॥ 1397 ॥ 
sōūṇa tayaṁ rāyā saṁpucchai tilayasuṁdaraṁ 'bhaddē ! । kiṁ rōyai tuha ēsō bhattārō satthavāhasuō ?' ॥ 366 ॥ 1398 ॥ 
sā bhaṇai 'dēva ! ēsō kayagdhasirasēharō mahāpāvō । ṇillō aidhiṭṭhō addaṭubyō supurisāṇaṁ ॥ 367 ॥ 1399 ॥ 
kiṁ bahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ ? ṇāmaṁ pi hu mā laējjaha imassa । jēṇa guṇarayaṇakhāṇī rūvēṇaṁ vijiyakaṁdappō ॥ 368 ॥ 1400 ॥ 
sūrō dhīrō suhaō cāī saralō kayaṇṇuō saccō । dakkhinnajuō mēttīpaḍibannō duducittēṇaṁ ॥ 369 ॥ । 1401 ॥ 
maha rūvamōhiēṇaṁ samuddamajjhammi dēva ! pakkhittō । maha daiō bhaṇiyā haṁ 'suṁdari ! paḍivajasu mamaṁ' ti ॥ 370 ॥ । 1402 ॥ 
tā dēva ! imassa maē dinnaṁ paccuttaraṁ jahā jai maṁ । dāhī rāyā tō haṁ bhajjā hōhāmi iya bhaṇiē ॥ 371 ॥ 1403 ॥ 
na kaō imēṇa majjha sīlaviṇāsō aō paraṁ tubhē । kaḍūḍhāvaha maha kaṭṭē, sāhēmi huyāsaṇaṁ jēṇa ॥ 372 ॥ 1404 ॥ 
bhaṇiyaṁ ca naravarēṇaṁ ' mā pavisa huyāsaṇammi ruddamma । taṁ cēva dēmi tujjha bhattāraṁ dēvayādinnaṁ' ॥ 373 ॥ 1405 ॥ 
tō bhai imā 'sāmiya! payapālō taṁ si, kīsa luddhō si । dīṇāṇa aṇāhāṇaṁ saraṇēṇaṁ kuṇasi kāruṇṇaṁ ' ॥ 374 ॥ 1406 ॥ 
bhaṇai ṇivō 'mā vacchē ! maṁgulacittaṁ mamaṁ viyappēhi । dhūyā ya ajapabhidaṁ taṁ majjha na ēttha saṁdēhō ॥ 375 ॥ 1407 ॥ 
saccaṁ ca bhaṇāmi ahaṁ, tubbhaṁ taṁ cēva dēmi bhattāraṁ ' । sā bhaṇai 'tāya ! ēvaṁ vayaṇaṁ dūraṁ visaṁvayai ॥ 376 ॥ 1408 ॥ 
kaha sōcci mē bhattā jō pakkhittō mahāsamuddammi ?' । tō taṁbōlachalēṇaṁ dhaṇayaṁ uṭuvai ṇaraṇāhō ॥ 377 ॥ 1409 ॥

bhaṇiyā ya 'putti ! ēyaṁ sayaṁ nirūvēhi hōi kiṁ ēsō । tuha bhattā ? ' iya bhaṇiē uvarimahuttaṁ palōēi ॥ 378 ॥ 1410 ॥ 
bhaṇai ya 'ghaḍai saricchō, kiṁtu saricchāṇa pūriyā puhaī । kaha sō saṁbhāvijjai jō pakkhittō jalaṇihimmi ? ' ॥ 379 ॥ 1411 ॥ 
iya bhaṇiē bhai imō 'ēīē dēva ! hōi sō bhattā । jō dhavalaharaḍiyāē atakkiō āgaō sahasā ॥ 380 ॥ 1412 ॥ 
jēṇa ya puṭṭhā ēsā kā si tumaṁ ? kiṁ ca paṭṭaṇaṁ ēyaṁ ? । jassa imīē kahiyaṁ mahiṁdayāī asē pi ॥ 381 ॥ 1413 ॥ 
jassa ya imīē kahiyaṁ rakkhasamammaṁ, samappiyaṁ khaggaṁ । nihaō ya jaiṇa rakkhō, jēṇa ya vīvāhiyā tattha ॥ 382 ॥ 1414 ॥ 
ṇīsāriyā ya kūvāō jēṇa rayaṇāiēhiṁ saṁjuttā । ārōviyā ya vahaṇē, khittō jō jalahimajjhammi ॥ 383 ॥ 1415 ॥ 
sō hōi dhavō ēīē dēva !' sōuṁ imaṁ taō bālā । ukkaṁṭaiyā sahasā dhārā haiyanīma kusumaṁ va ॥ 384 ॥ 1416 ॥ 
ukkaṁḍiyā ya ēsā jalayaravā''yannaṇāō mōri vva । mannē sā varabālā jhaḍatti anna vya saṁjāyā ॥ 385 ॥ 1417 ॥ 
pabhaṇaiya 'tāya ! ēsō sō cēva ya ṇatthi ēttha saṁdēhō । kahamavi maha punnēhiṁ jalanihimajjhāō uttinnō ॥ 386 ॥ 1418 ॥ 
tā tāya ! tāyabhāvō tumaē ajaṁ payāsiō majjha । vihiō mahāpasāō āisasu jamēttha kāyavvaṁ ॥ 387 ॥ 1419 ॥ 
bhaṇai ṇivō taṁ 'vacchē ! dēva - gurūṇaṁ pasāyajōgēṇaṁ । hōsu avihavā suhabhāiṇī ya taha puṇṇavaṁtī ya ॥ 388 ॥ 1420 ॥

rāēṇa aṇunnāō taṁbōliyamāi bhūriparivārō । jāi jaṇayassa gēhē taṁ daṇuō sēṭṭhī ॥ 400 ॥ 1432 ॥

rūvāiēhiṁ taṁ ciya paccakkhō hōsi putta ! ṇibrbhataṁ । bahusārikkhā puhaī, tēṇaṁ na bhaṇāmi sō taṁ si' ॥ 409 ॥ 1431 ॥

taṁ sōūṇaṁ rāyā mucchāvihalaṁghalō dharāpīḍhē । paḍiō taṁ daṭṭaṇaṁ lōgō vi hu dukkhaō jāō ॥ 444 ॥ 1476 ॥

sō tīē samaṁ bhōē bhatta'ṇurattāē bhuṁjai jahicchaṁ । na viyāṇēi gayaṁ pi hu kālaṁ dēvō vya niccitō ॥ 8 ॥ 1586 ॥ 
annamma diṇammi imō āruhiuṁ rahavarammi tuṁgammi । ujjāṇiyānimittaṁ ujjāṇē vaccai samittō ॥ 9 ॥ 1587 ॥ 
tattha vi pavarapaēsē vitthiṇṇō maṁḍavō viṇimmaviō । ullōyabhatticittō vimukkavarakusumaōūlō ॥ 10 ॥ 1588 ॥ 
tattha ya bhōjaṁ khajjaṁ lējjha pēyaṁ cauvvihāhāraṁ । bhuṁjai saha mittēhiṁ āyamai taō kamēṇa sō ॥ 11 ॥ 1589 ॥ 
gihittu paṁcasōgaṁdhiyaṁ tu muhavāsayaṁ sutaṁbōlaṁ । pēcchittu khaṇaṁ ēgaṁ pēcchaṇayaṁ lōyaṇāṇaṁdaṁ ॥ 12 ॥ 1590 ॥ 
uṭṭittu taō mittēhiṁ saṁjuō pēcchaē varujjāṇaṁ । bahupāyavasaṁkiṇṇaṁ phulla-pphalariddhisusamiddhaṁ ॥ 13 ॥ 1591 ॥ 
aha ēkkammi paēsē suvivittē phāsuē maṇabhirāmē । tasa - thāvarajīvēhiṁ vivajjiē sāhujaṇajōgē ॥ 14 ॥ 1592 ॥ 
uttattakaṇayavaṇṇaṁ tiyasaṁ piva rūvasaṁpayasamēyaṁ । paḍhamavaē baṭṭaṁta caṁdō iva sōmayākaliyaṁ ॥ 15 ॥ 1593 ॥ 
khaṁtī-muttipahāṇaṁ tavatēyasirīē suṭu dippataṁ । rattāsōyatalammi suniviṭṭaṁ jhāṇagayacittaṁ ॥ 16 ॥ 1594 ॥ 
pēcchai ya varamuṇi sō daṭṭu ruvāiēhiṁ vimhaiō । pucchai niyaē mittē 'kō ēsō ?' kahaha maha purisō ॥ 17 ॥ 1595 ॥ 
mittēhiṁ taō bhaṇiyaṁ 'ēsa muṇī savvasaṁgaparimukkō । ēgatammi mahappā dhammajjhāṇaṁ jhiyāēi ॥ 18 ॥ 1596 ॥

jaha ēsā pāviṭṭā sayamaṇubhaviyā maē aṇatthayarī । tā tumhāṇa vi ēsā dāhī bahudukkharichōliṁ ॥ 152 ॥ 2477 ॥ 
jaha tēhiṁ saṁpuṭṭhō jai ēvaṁ tō kahēhi amhāṇaṁ । dēvīē sayāsāō chuṭṭissāmō kahaṁ amhē ? ॥ 153 ॥ 2478 ॥ 
tāyaha dukkhabhattā bhaṇati bhavyā vi dhammadēsayaraṁ । jaha tēṇa sēlagāō nittharaṇaṁ tāṇa akkhāyaṁ ॥ 154 ॥ 2479 ॥ 
taha ēsō vihu bhavvāṇa kahai caraṇāō tīē nittharaṇaṁ । jaha sēlagapaṭṭimmiṁ tē tabbhīyā samārūḍhā ॥ 155 ॥ 2480 ॥

taṁ nisuṇiūṇa vijāharēhiṁ sahasa tti dō vi āvariyā । vijrāharamāyāhiṁ karēṁti nāṇāvihē rūvē ॥ 38 ॥ 2528 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi bala - kēsavāṇa vijjāhiṁ aha ubaṭuviyaṁ । vijjāharabalamaulaṁ agbhiṭṭa iyarasēnnassa ॥ 39 ॥ 2529 ॥ 
dōṇha vi balāṇa dappuddharāṇa niyasāmikajjaludvāṇa । sahasa cciya saṁjāyaṁ mahāhavaṁ bhīsaṇasarūvaṁ ॥ 40 ॥ 2530 ॥ avi ya-
ghōruttābalavajjiyatūraṁ, tūrāyannaṇatōsiyasūraṁ । sūrāyaḍriḍhayadāruṇakhaggaṁ, khaggōvāḍiyamāṇavavaggaṁ ॥ 41 ॥ 2531 ॥ 
vaggira-ṇaccira-kuppirajōhaṁ, jōhavimukkasubhīsaṇasatthaṁ । satthakhaṇakkhaṇajāyahuyāsaṁ, jāyahuyāsaṇatāsiyasiddhaṁ ॥ 42 ॥ 2532 ॥ 
siddha-surā - 'suradinnapasaṁsaṁ, dinnapasaṁsarpa haṭṭhiyarāyaṁ । rāyakhuruppanivāḍiyaciṁdhaṁ, ciṁdhayacacciyamēiṇivīḍhaṁ ॥ 43 ॥ ti ॥ 2533 ॥ 
yārisasaṁgāmē vittē ṇa abhaggayaṁ pi taṁ sēnnaṁ । bala - kēsavāṇa jāyaṁ parammuhaṁ īsi paharahayaṁ ॥ 44 ॥ 2534 ॥

' ēvaṁ karēja bhaddē ! ' jiṇēṇa kahiyammi jāi gēhammi । aṇujāṇāvai dōnni vi, tēhiṁ vi aṇujāṇiyā bālā ॥ 13 ॥ 2671 ॥ 
jaha riddhisamudaēṇaṁ giṇhai dikkhaṁ jiṇassa payamūlē । saṁvēgāisayāō karēi uggaṁ tavaccaraṇaṁ ॥ 14 ॥ 2672 ॥

nissēsa pi hu kammaṁ tattō khaviūṇa jāi siddhīē । bala - kēsavā vi niyaē gēhē bhuṁjati raja siriṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 2675 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca vaccaṁti diyahā । ētō ya baladēvassa asthi virayā nāma mahādēvī । tīē ya kucchimajjhanbhavā atthi sumaī

dēvī vi' āha 'piyayama ! na tēṇa majjhaṁ imaṁ samakkhāyaṁ । kiṁtu maē savvaṁ pi vi saccaviyaṁ niyayadiṭṭhīē ' ॥ 60 ॥ 3142 ॥ 
rāyā vi bhāi 'miyasāvalōyaṇē ! kaha imaṁ ghaḍai vayaṇaṁ । jamhā gēhāō bahiṁ na niggamō tujjha saṁbhavai ? ' ॥ 61 ॥ 3143 ॥

hakkāriūṇa bīyaṁ pi pucchaē sō dhaṇō taha ccēva । sā vi taha cciya savvaṁ sāhai savvaṁ pi niyacariyaṁ ॥ 51 ॥ 3280 ॥ 
sōūṇa tayaṁ sēṭṭhī jaṁpai 'ēsā vi bhōgavaisuhā । abhaṁtariyā pēsaṇakārī maha hōu gēhammi ॥ 52 ॥ 3281 ॥ 
khaṁḍaṇa -pīsaṇa- raṁdhaṇa-payaṇa - virōlaṇapabhīi savvaṁ pi । ēyāē kāyavvaṁ' iya bhaṇiya visajaē taṁpi ॥ 53 ॥ 3282 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ciya taiyaṁ pi hu rakkhiyanāmaṁ pi pucchaī, sā vi । sāhai jahaṭṭhiyaṁ ciya, tattō tuṭṭhō bhai sēṭṭhī ॥ 54 ॥ 3283 ॥ 
bhaṁḍāgāriṇi ēsā hōu sayā majjha bhaṁḍayārammi । maṇi - mōttiya - vattha- suvaṇṇamāi āyattamēīē' ॥ 55 ॥ 3284 ॥ 
rōhiṇināmaṁ pitaō hakkārittā cautthiyaṁ suṇhaṁ । bhaṇai 'tumaṁ pi hu puttē ! appasu tē paṁca sālikaṇē' ॥ 56 ॥ 3285 ॥ 
tīē vi hu saṁlattaṁ ' bahusagaḍī - sāgaḍaṁ mahaṁ dēhi । vasabha - mahisāiyā vi ya jēṇaṁ appēmi tē sālī ' ॥ 57 ॥ 3286 ॥ 
bhaṇiyā ya sēṭṭhiṇā sā 'putti ! kahaṁ sāliakkhaē paṁca । bahusagaḍi - sāgaḍēṇaṁ nijjāijjati ? mē kahasu' ॥ 58 ॥ 3287 ॥ 
sāvitaō āīō kahai asēsa pi jaṁ jahāvihiyaṁ । sōūṇa tayaṁ sēṭṭhī ūsasiō nī makusumaṁ va ॥ 59 ॥ 3288 ॥

" atthi iha jaṁbudīvē vāsē ēravayanāmadhēyammi | viṁjhapuraṁ nāmēṇaṁ supasiddhaṁ puravaraṁ rammaṁ ॥ 1 ॥ 3350 ॥

bhaṇiyaṁ - ' ēvaṁ karēhi' । taō paḍhiyaṁ mēhasēṇēṇa, avi ya-
'gayavayaṇaṁ 1 baraṇayaraṁ2 dēvasamūha 3 mahāṇaīṇāhaṁ4 । kimirāyaraiyavatthaṁ5ca bhaṇasu ēgēṇa vayaṇēṇaṁ' ॥ 3 ॥ 3528 ॥ 
puṇō vi paḍhāviūṇa, lahiūṇa ya jaṁpiyaṁ rahasēṇēṇa - ' surarayaṇaṁ' । taō puṇō vi jaṁpiyaṁ mēhasēṇēṇa - 'suṇēhi
saṁpayaṁ chapaṇhaṁ' । iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - ' ēvaṁ karēhi' । taō paḍhiyamaṇēṇa, avi ya-
'giriraṇṇaṁ 1 kuviyamuṇiṁ2 aḍavīsattaṁ3 aṇatthasaṁjuttaṁ4 | dhammaraiṁ5 samaṇōvāsayaṁ6ca bhaṇa ēgavayaṇēṇaṁ' ॥ 4 ॥ 3529 ॥ 5
puṇō vi paḍhāviyamaṇēṇa, tahā vi jāva na laddhaṁ tāva paribhāviūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ naṁdisēṇēṇaṁ- 'sāvayaṁ' ti । 'ahō !
jēṭussa satti, tti bhaṇamāṇēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ dōhi vi kumāraēhiṁ, jahā - 'saṁpayaṁ paḍhaṁtu ēīē cēva rīīē jēṭupāyā' । taō
tavvayaṇamāyaṇṇiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ naṁdisēṇēṇaṁ- 'jai ēvaṁ tō suṇēha ēvaṁ sattapaṇhaṁ,' avi ya-
'aivasimaṁ 1 bhaṭṭamuṇi2 kiviṇaṁ3 sukkassaraṁ4 aphuḍavayaṇaṁ5 । taddīṇajāyaṁ 6 ēgāgiṇaṁ 7 ca bhaṇa ēgavayaṇēṇaṁ' ॥ 5 ॥ 3530 ॥ 
puṇō vi paḍhāviyaṁ kumārēhiṁ, kahiṁci na priyaṁ cittammi । taō pariciṁtiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ daḍharahēṇaṁ - ' vayahīṇaṁ' । puṇō
vi jaṁpiyaṁ naṁdisēṇēṇaṁ - 'jai ēvaṁ tā suṇaṁtu tāyapāyā ! ēyaṁ aṭupaṇhaṁ,' avi ya-
'satthasuiṁ 1 nakkhattaṁ 2 dāṇaṁ 3 kannaṁ4 surammayaṁ dēsaṁ5 । sajalaṁ6 ganbhavimōyaṁ 7 vijiyaraṇaṁ 8 ṇigavayaṇēṇaṁ' ॥ 6 ॥ 3531 ॥

1
aha annayā kayāī ghaṇaraharāyā sanikkhamaṇasamayaṁ । ābhōyai ṇāṇēṇaṁ taō ya lōgaṁtiyā dēvā ॥ 1 ॥ 3652 ॥ 
pattā jiṇassa pāsaṁ niyayathuī-maṁgalāī pabhaṇaṁti । 'jaya jaya naṁdā jaya jaya bhaddā' icāi battūṇaṁ ॥ 2 ॥ 3653 ॥ 
'bujjhāhi lōgaṇāhā ! lōgahiyaṁ taha pavattayasu titthaṁ' । saṁvaccharadāṇāī dāūṇaṁ mēharahakumaraṁ ॥ 3 ॥ 3654 ॥ 
rajjammi prāviūṇaṁ gēṇhai dikkhaṁ suriṁdanayacaraṇō । uppāḍiūṇa nāṇaṁ paḍibōhai bhavyasaṁghāē ॥ 4 ॥ 3655 ॥ 
kālaṁtarēṇa siddhiṁ pattō bhayavaṁ jiṇō dhuyakilēsō । mēharahō vi ya rajjaṁ parivālai niyavibhūīē ॥ 5 ॥ 3656 ॥ 
parivālaṁtō rajjaṁ pabhūyasāmaṁtapaṇayapayakamalō । juyarāyapayaṭṭhiēṇaṁ daḍharahakumarēṇa saṁjuttō ॥ 6 ॥ 3657 ॥ 
annammi ya diyahammiṁ dēvaramaṁ nāma atthi ujjāṇaṁ । tassa ya sirimaṇuhaviuṁ vaccai niyaēṇa vibhavēṇa ॥ 7 ॥ 3658 ॥ 
tattha ya abhiramamāṇō jahicchiyaṁ bhamai niyayalīlāē । piyamittadēvijuttō asōyahēdummi uvavi ॥ 8 ॥ 3659 ॥ 
maṇi - kaṇaga- rayaṇacittē silāyalē kuṇai tattha pamayagaṇō । varanaṭṭa - gīyavāiyaravēṇa ramaṇijapēcchaṇayaṁ ॥ 9 ॥ 3660 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi sahasā uvaḍiyā bhūribhūyasaṁghāyā । mēharaharāyapuraō auvyapēcchaṇaya karaṇatthaṁ ॥ 10 ॥ 3661 ॥ avi ya-
kē vihu gahiyagaruyavaramōggara - kuṁta-tisūlahatthayā, kē vi hu dhaṇuha - bāṇakayakarayalapīḍiyajubalabhatthayā ।
kē vihu parasu-satti - asi - sūlavirāiyapaṁcasāhayā, kē bihu sēlla - bhalla - bāballa-mahallayasatthagāhayā ॥ 11 ॥ 3661 ॥ 
1. vōttūṇa tru0 ॥ 2. paṭṭi pā0 kā0 ॥ 3 °ṇubhaviuṁ tru0 kā0 ॥ 4 °yalē tattha kuṇai pa° jē0 ॥ 5. hu pharusa - satti pā0 । hu parusu -satti tru0 ॥

tālasamāṇaūru-jaṁghājuyakalaṇinisāhacalaṇayā, lōḍhayatullagaruyacalaṇaṁgulicibbiranāsavalaṇayā ।
dīharabāhu daṁḍaubvillaṇapūriyagagaṇadēsayā, naccirabhūyanivaha ēmāi viṇimmiyavivihavēsayā ॥ 14 ॥ 3665 ॥ 
nacaṁtēhiṁ ya tēhiṁ nāṇāciṭṭhāhiṁ sayalarasakaliyaṁ । dalai va dharaṇī, phuṭṭai va nahayalaṁ calaṇakhēvēhiṁ ॥ 15 ॥ 3666 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca jāva nivatōsakārayaṁ tē kuṇati varanaṭṭē । tā gayaṇammi phuraṁtaṁ dīsai ēgaṁ varavimāṇaṁ ॥ 16 ॥ 3667 ॥ avi ya-
bahurayaṇakiriṇaniyarōhavijiyaāicyatēyaniuruvaṁ । nacaṁtaṁ piva gayaṇa'ggalaggadhayadīhabāhāhiṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 3668 ॥

taṁ jalaṁ daṇaṁ vicittabhūsaṇakalāvasōhillaṁ । piyamittā baradēvī pucchai sirimēharaharāyaṁ ॥ 20 ॥ 3671 ॥ 
'kō ēsa sāmi ! dīsai mayaṇō vva raīsamanniō taruṇō ? । kiṁ hōjja kōvi tiyasō ? kiṁ vā vijjāharō kōvi ? ' ॥ 21 ॥ 3672 ॥ 
aha jaṁpai mēharahō rāyā 'nisuṇēhi ēttha paramatthaṁ । taṁ dēvi ! ēmacittā sāhippataṁ asēsa pi ॥ 22 ॥ 3673 ॥ 
" iha cēva jaṁbudīvē dīvē bharahammi pavarakhēttammi । supasiddhō atthi nagō rayayamaō nāma vēyaḍḍhō ॥ 1 ॥ 3674 ॥ 
tassa ya uttarasēḍhīē atthi alayāurī suvikkhāyā। vijjāharavaranayarī acchērayasayasamāiṇṇā ॥ 2 ॥ 3675 ॥ 
jīē maragayanimmiyapāsāyāṇaṁ viṇiggayakarēhiṁ । gajaṁkurabhaṁtīē nīyaṁ vaccaṁti raviturayā ॥ 3 ॥ 376 ॥ 
baraiṁdanīlanimmiyapāsāuṭṭhiyakarēhiṁ miliya sasī । uddhadvāiyarbarihiṇa kalāvasōhaṁ samubbahai ॥ 4 ॥ 3677 ॥ 
jīē phāliyabhittībahijaṁtaṁtōpaviṭurūvēhiṁ । jaṇai surayaṁtarāyaṁ muddhabahūṇaṁ divālōgō ॥ 5 ॥ 3678 ॥ 
jattha vararattamaṇimayapāsāyasihāsamūhavēlabiyā । rayaṇīē dīvayāsakiya vva salahā nilīyaṁti ॥ 6 ॥ 3679 ॥ 
jīē ya pīyamaṇigihakara kusumaggahaṇabhaggahatthanahā । kaṇiyārayakusumēsu vi vāhiṁti na māliyā hatthē ॥ 7 ॥ 3680 ॥ 
iya kēttiyaṁ va bhannau, tīē nayarīē rayaṇamaiyāē ? । jaṁ jaṁ ciya acchariyaṁ, taṁ taṁ savvaṁ pi saṁbhava ॥ 8 ॥ 3681 ॥

taṁ puṣva'jipunnōhaladdhamāhappapūriyasarīrō । vijurahō nāmēṇaṁ pālai vijñāharaṇariṁdō ॥ 9 ॥ 3682 ॥ 
tassa'tthi pavaravijjāhariṁda kulasaṁbhavā mahādēvī । vilayāyaṇappahāṇā māṇasavēga tti nāmēṇa ॥ 10 ॥ 3683 ॥ 
sā annayā kayāī rayaṇīē pacchimammi jāmammi : sīhēhiṁ jōviyarahaṁ sumiṇē daḍūṇa paḍibuddhā ॥ 11 ॥ 3684 ॥ 
sāhēi niyayadaiyassa jhatti rōmaṁcapulaiyasarīrā । tēṇa vi ya 'puttajammō' āiḍō tī tuṭṭēṇa ॥ 12 ॥ 3685 ॥ 
sā vi hu parituṭumaṇā baṁdhittā sauṇagaṁḍimuṭṭhēuṁ । baccai niyavāsaharē saṇiyaṁ paiṇā aṇunnāyā ॥ 13 ॥ 3686 ॥ 
uvvahamāṇā gabbhaṁ kamēṇa pattā pasūisamayammi । pasavai diṇayarakaraniyarasacchahaṁ bālayaṁ dēvī ॥ 14 ॥ 3687 ॥ 
baddhāviō nariṁdō kāuṁ baddhāvaṇāiyaṁ savvaṁ । pattē bārasamadiṇē karēi nāmaṁ kumārassa ॥ 15 ॥ 3688 ॥ 
'sumiṇassa'ṇusārēṇaṁ sīharahō nāma hōu ēsō ' tti । siyapakkhē caṁdō iva, kalākalāvēṇa vaḍūḍhēi ॥ 16 ॥ 3689 ॥ 
baḍūḍhaṁtō ya kamēṇaṁ jā pattō jōvvaṇammi ramaṇīē । tā kārēi nariṁdō pāṇiggahaṇaṁ mahārammaṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 3690 ॥ 
muiyaṁ kulubbhavakannāē rūva- lāvaṇṇa-vaṇṇakaliyāē । vēgavaīnāmāē bhuṁjai sō tīē saha bhōē ॥ 18 ॥ 3691 ॥ 
jubarāyapayaḍiō sō sīharahō lalai vivihakīlāhiṁ । tāyattiṁsasurō iva, ēvaṁ jā baccaē kālō ॥ 19 ॥ 3692 ॥ 
1. ° vā varā dēvī jē0 kā0 ॥ 2. sagharē tru0 kā0 ॥ । 3. 'halīlāhiṁ pā0 ॥

tā annamma diṇammiṁ rayaṇīē pacchimammi jāmammi । jaggittu nivō ēvaṁ ciṁtai saṁvēgamāvannō ॥ 20 ॥ 3693 ॥ 
" hā ! hā ! kahaṁ pamattēṇa visayaluddhēṇa mūḍhacittēṇa । vuḍḍhattaṇaṁ pi iṁtaṁ na lakkhiyaṁ pāvakammēṇa ? ॥ 21 ॥ 3694 ॥ 
saṁpai kiṁ va karissaṁ iṁdiyavēyallanissahasarīrō ? । tā saṁpayaṁ pi dhammaṁ karēmi saṁsāraniddalaṇaṁ ॥ 22 ॥ 3695 ॥ 
ṭhāuṁ sīharahaṁ kumaraṁ rajjammi sugurupayamūlē । sāvajjajōgaviraī kāuṁ sāhēmi sivasōkkhaṁ" ॥ 23 ॥ 3696 ॥ 
iya ciṁtaṁtassa nivassa jhatti jā jāmiṇī aikkaṁtā । kālanivēyayapurisēṇa tāva ēvaṁvihaṁ paḍhiyaṁ ॥ 24 ॥ 3697 ॥ 
'timirakkhayaṁ karēṁ tō uggamai imō nariṁda ! diṇanāhō । sārhētō iva lōyāṇa, kuṇaha timirakkhayaṁ tubbhē ॥ 25 ॥ 3698 ॥ 
payaḍiyapayatthasatthō sāhai lōyāṇa ēsa divasayarō । tubbhē vi savvatattē payaḍaha sannāṇajōgēṇa ॥ 26 ॥ 3699 ॥ 
iya sōūṇaṁ rāyā ciṁtai "naṇu suṁdaraṁ imaṁ paḍhiyaṁ । maha ciṁtiyāṇurūvaṁ karēmi savvaṁ pi tā sigdhaṁ ॥ 27 ॥ 3700 ॥ 
iya ciṁtiūṇa sējjaṁ mōttuṁ muhadhōvaṇāiyaṁ kāuṁ । nivisai atthāṇammi samatthalōēṇa pariyariō ॥ 28 ॥ 3701 ॥ 
patthāvaṁ nāūṇaṁ niyaākūyaṁ kahēi lōyassa । tēhiṁ vi bhaṇiyaṁ 'sāmiya! kimakaṁḍē cēva paricayasi ? ' ॥ 29 ॥ 3702 ॥ 
bhaṇai nivō 'mā vigghaṁ kāhiha tumhāṇa sāmiō inhi । sīharahō, tā kijjau savvā sāmaggiyā pauṇā ' ॥ 30 ॥ 3703 ॥ 
mannittu rāyavayaṇaṁ karēti sāmaggiyaṁ taō pauṇaṁ । ahisiṁcāi sīharahaṁ mahayā rajjābhisēēṇa ॥ 31 ॥ 3704 ॥

gaṁtūṇa gurusamīvē pavvajaṁ gēhiuṁ tavamuyāraṁ । saṁvēgāisayāō karēi kamma'ṭuniṭuvaṇaṁ ॥ 32 ॥ 3705 ॥ 
sīharahō vi ya rāyā accaṁtapayaṁḍaniggayapayāvō । parivaḍhatō pattō vijjāharacakkabaṭṭittaṁ ॥ 33 ॥ 3706 ॥ 
savvattha vi ya payāsō bala - vijjā - maṁta- taṁtamāīhiṁ । aha annammi diṇammi rayaṇīē ciṁtaē ēvaṁ ॥ 34 ॥ 3707 ॥ 
" tē dhannā sappurisā, tāṇa suladdhaṁ ca māṇusa jammaṁ । jē vaṁdaṁti jiṇidē varakēvalanāṇasaṁpannē ॥ 35 ॥ 3708 ॥ 
ōsaraṇamajjhasaṁpriyasīhāsaṇamatthayammi suniviṭṭē । jē dēsaṁti sudhammaṁ bhaviyāyaṇaharisasaṁjaṇaṇaṁ ॥ 36 ॥ 3709 ॥ 
tā ahayaṁ pi pavittaṁ karēmi attāṇayaṁ jiṇē namiuṁ" । iya ciṁtiūṇa gacchai dhāyaisaṁḍammi dīvammi ॥ 37 ॥ 3710 ॥ 
avaravidēhē vāsē sīōyamahāṇaīē uttaraō । vijayammi suttanāmē khaggapurē rammanayarammi ॥ 38 ॥ 3711 ॥ 
siriamiyavāhaṇajiṇaṁ dēvīē pariyaṇēṇa ya samaggō । tipayāhiṇaṁ vihēuṁ vaṁdai paramēṇa viṇaēṇa ॥ 39 ॥ 3712 ॥ 
nisuṇēi tahā dhammaṁ jiṇidamuha kuharaṇiggayaṁ payaḍaṁ । jaha 'ētthaṁ bhaviēhiṁ bhāvēyavyaṁ bhavasarūvaṁ ॥ 140 ॥ 36713 ॥ 
jaha ēsō saṁsārō caugaibhavagahaṇabhamaṇaduharūvō । iya bhāviūṇa bhavvā ! dhammammi samujjayā hōha' ॥ 41 ॥ 3714 ॥ 
iya jiṇavayaṇaṁ sōuṁ rāyā parituṭṭamāṇasō ahiyaṁ । dēvīpariyaṇasahiō vaṁdittā ēi iha ṭhāṇē ॥ 42 ॥ 3715 ॥ 
pavaravimāṇārūḍhō jā pattō majjha sannihāṇammi । tā sē gaipaṛighāō sahasa ciya piyayamē ! jāō ॥ 43 ॥ 3716 ॥

taṁ daṇaṁ rāyā ciṁtai " maha kēṇa gaipaḍigghāō । vihiō ?" iya ciṁtēuṁ sahasa tti talaṁ nirūvēi ॥ 44 ॥ 3717 ॥ 
daṭṭūṇa
mamaṁ kuddhō jākira hēi maṁ kara'ggēhiṁ । tāva maē akaṁtō niyavāmakarēṇa kaḍhiṇēṇa ॥ 45 ॥ 3718 ॥ 
rasiyaṁ ca caṁpiēṇaṁ aivirasasarēṇa viṇayavihurēṇaṁ । taṁ sōuṁ sē bhajjā sasuyā vijāharajuyā ya ॥ 46 ॥ 3719 ॥ 
mama puraō hōūṇaṁ 'saraṇaṁ saraṇaṁ' ti ullavai sahasā । taṁ daddhuṁ sōūṇa ya mukkō kaṁtē ! maē jhati ॥ 47 ॥ 3720 ॥ 
sō ēsō sīharahō vijjāviuruvviēhiṁ rūvēhiṁ । mama puraō pēcchaṇayaṁ karēi ṇāṇāvihāṇēhiṁ ॥ 48 ॥ 3721 ॥ 
tā ēsō sō kaṁtē ! jō puṭṭhō akkhiō maē tujjha" । taṁ sōuṁ tuṭumaṇā piyamittā japaē ēvaṁ ॥ 49 ॥ 3722 ॥ 
'kiṁ sāmiya! puvyabhavē ēēṇa kayaṁ jaō imā riddhī । acaṁtavimhayakarī dīsai amhārisaṁjaṇēṇa ?' ॥ 50 ॥ 3723 ॥ 
aha jaṁpai mēharahō 'nisuṇēhi piē ! imaṁ pi vittaṁtaṁ । ēgaggamaṇā saṁpai kahijramāṇaṁ maē suyaṇu ! ' ॥ 51 ॥ 3724 ॥ 
“pukkharavaradīva'ḍḍhē puvvillē bhārahammi vāsammi । atthi puraṁ supasiddhaṁ saṁghauraṁ nāma guṇakaliyaṁ ॥ 1 ॥ 3725 ॥ 
tattha'tthi rajjaguttō nāmaṁ kulaputtaō suduggayaō । parakammakaraṇauvaladdhadaviṇakayabhōyaṇō ṇicaṁ ॥ 2 ॥ 3726 ॥ 
bhajjā ya tassa saṁkhiyanāmā aṇurattabhattayā atthi । tāṇaṁ ca galai kālō dōṇha vi parakammanirayāṇa ॥ 3 ॥ 3727 ॥ 
aha annamma diṇammi phalāikajammi dōnni vi gayāṇi । saṁghagirimmi visālē nāṇāvihataruvarāiṇṇē ॥ 4 ॥ 3728 ॥ 
1. vivihēhiṁ jē0 ॥ 2. 'hāṇēṇaṁ tru0 ॥ 3. 'jaṇāṇa pā0 jē0 ॥

jā tattha vaṇaphalatthaṁ bhamaṁti rammammi girivaruddēsē । tā nisuṇaṁti sahēlaṁ saddaṁ pakkhubhiyajalahisamaṁ ॥ 5 ॥ 3729 ॥ 
taṁ nisuṇiūṇa dōnni vi pamōyabharapūriyāṇi vaccēti । jā tassa'ṇusārēṇaṁ, tā sāhuṁ tattha pēcchati ॥ 6 ॥ 3730 ॥ 
nāmēṇa savvaguttaṁ uttamacārittasattasaṁjuttaṁ । vijjāharanivahāṇaṁ uttamadhammaṁ pasārhataṁ ॥ 7 ॥ 3731 ॥ 
taṁ daddhuṁ tō tāī bhattivasasamūsasaṁtagattāī । vaṁdittu muṇivariṁdaṁ visuddhabhūmīē niṁvisaṁti ॥ 8 ॥ 3732 ॥ 
7
bhayava pi tāṇa dhammaṁ visēsaō kahai bhayavaō vayaṇaṁ । sumaraṁtō "jaha punnassa katthaī taha ya tucchassa" ॥ 9 ॥ 3733 ॥ 
“bhō bhō bhavvā ! ētthaṁ vaṁchiyasōkkhāṇa kāraṇaṁ hōi । sattīē kīramāṇō tavō jaō viusavayaṇamiṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥ 3734 ॥ 
jāva na rasamasakasamasahiṁ cūriu pāu tavēṇa । tāva ki labbhai daddajiya 'jaṁ ciṁtiyā maṇēṇa ॥ 2 ॥ 3735 ॥ kiṁca-
jaṁ jammaṁtari kammu kiu jīviṁ asuhu maṇēṇa । taṁ cūrijjai nittulauṁ rasamasatavalōḍhēṇa” ॥ 12 ॥ 3736 ॥ 
ēvaṁ sōūṇa taō bhajappaiyāṇi kammavivarammi । jāyammi paṇamiūṇaṁ sāhuṁ ēvaṁ payaṁpati ॥ 13 | 3737 ॥ 
'bhayavaṁ ! bahupāvāī amhē tamhā jammha jōgatavaṁ । taṁ āisa sayamēva ya amhāṇuvariṁ dayaṁ kāuṁ' ॥ 14 ॥ 3738 ॥ 
savvaguttasāhū jōggaṁ nāūṇa tāṇa uvaisai । battīsayakallāṇaṁ tavō visēsa imaṁ taṁ ca ॥ 15 ॥ 3739 ॥ 
dōnnēva tistāī taha ya cautthāī hōṁti battīsaṁ । tēhiṁ vi bhattijuēhiṁ gahiyaṁ ēyaṁ tavōkammaṁ ॥ 16 ॥ 3740 ॥

kāūṇaṁ pāṇavahaṁ jīvā paṁcēṁdiyāṇa jīvāṇa । nivaḍaṁti mahānaraē, bhāvēhi imaṁ sacittammi ॥ 18 ॥ 3777 ॥ 
pārvati tattha dukkhaṁ nāṇāvihajāya ṇāisaṁjaṇiyaṁ । sāhāviyaṁ ca vivihaṁ, bhāvēhi imaṁ sacittammi ॥ 19 ॥ 3778 ॥ 
tiriēsu vi pāṇivahāō pāvaē dāruṇaṁ mahādukkhaṁ । taṇhā - chuhāijaṇiyaṁ, bhāvēhi imaṁ sacittammi ॥ 20 ॥ 3779 ॥

iya jāṇiūṇa suṁdara! jīvavahaṁ pariharitu kuṇa dhammaṁ । pāvēsi jēṇa sōkkhaṁ, bhāvēhi imaṁ sacittammi" ॥ 22 ॥ 3781 ॥ 
ēvaṁ bhaṇiē bhiḍiō jaṁpai 'nisuṇēhi rāya ! maha vayaṇaṁ । ēsō maha bhayabhīō tujjhaṁ saraṇaṁ samallīṇō ॥ 23 ॥ 3782 ॥ 
ahayaṁ tu tikkha-kharadukkhalakkhaparikāriyāē rōddāē । bhukkhāē rakkhasīē gahiō vaccāmi kaṁ saraṇaṁ ? ॥ 24 ॥ 3783 ॥ 
kiṁca tumaṁ sappurisō kassa vi maṇasā vi kuṇasi nō dukkhaṁ । tā jaha rakkhasi ēyaṁ mamaṁ pi taha rakkhasu narēṁda ! ॥ 25 ॥ 3784 ॥ 
dhammammi vi natthi maī maha bhukkhādukkhakhaṇiyakhēttassa । tā ēyaṁ dēhi lahuṁ jā navi vaccaṁti maha pāṇā' ॥ 26 ॥ 3785 ॥ 
ēvaṁ bhaṇiē ōlāvaēṇa jaṁpēi mēharaharāyā । ' jai bhukkhiō si dhaṇiyaṁ, tā annaṁ dēmi āhāraṁ ' ॥ 27 ॥ 3786 ॥ 
sō jaṁpēi 'na maṁsaṁ mōttuṁ jāīē majjha āhārō' । bhaṇai imō 'maṁsaṁ pi hu, annēhiṁ māriyaṁ dēmi' ॥ 28 ॥ 3787 ॥

'nisuṇasu sāmiya ! ajaṁ sumiṇē jaṁ majjha vittayaṁ kajaṁ । ucchaṁgē vasahajuyaṁ pāsittā uṭṭhiyā lahuyaṁ ॥ 7 ॥ 3812 ॥

iya jā didu rāu ēvaṁvihavēyaṇabharaviyalliu, bhaḍa - sāmaṁtamāiparivāru asēsu vi dāruṇadukkhasalliu ।

'jai vi hu jēṭṭhō ēsō kumarō nāmēṇa dēvarāō tti । taha vi hu guṇēhiṁ jēṭṭō hōu imō vaccharāō nivō' ॥ 22 ॥ 3913 ॥

sōūṇa kalayalaṁ taṁ pucchai rāyā 'kimēsa āhaṭṭō ? ' । aha pariyaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ 'dēva ! imaṁ ērisaṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 24 ॥ 3915 ॥ 
tō māṇasiyaduhēṇaṁ duguṇayaraṁ pīḍiō nivō bhaṇai । 'hā ! hā ! ahō ! ajuttaṁ kajamiṇaṁ maṁtiṇā vihiyaṁ ॥ 25 ॥ 3916 ॥

kiṁtu na jaṇāṇurāō tahāvihō atthi tahavi sō rajjaṁ । kuṇai iyarō vi gacchai alaggāē paidiṇaṁ tu ॥ 28 ॥ 3919 ॥ 
jōhārāī savvaṁ paḍivattiṁ kuṇai jaha va jaṇayassa । kiṁtu jaṇō savyō vi hu aṇurāyaṁ dharai kumarammi ॥ 29 ॥ 3920 ॥

ahavā vi dukhaṇāṇaṁ payai ciya ērisā na saṁdēhō । jamhā hu viusavaggā bhaṇati ēyārisaṁ vayaṇaṁ ॥ 32 ॥ 3923 ॥ 
"vavaharai aṇṇaha ciṁya suddhasabhāvō jayammi sāhujaṇō । mannai tamannaha ciṁya duṭusabhāvō khalajaṇō vi ॥ 33 ॥ 3924 ॥ 
jaha jaha parisuddhamaī suyaṇō nēhēṇa kuṇai cēṭṭhāō । taha taha iyarō vi daḍhaṁ viyappaē annahārūvaṁ" ॥ 34 ॥ 3925 ॥ 
iya ciṁtiūṇa maṁtī gaṁtu nivadēvarāyapayamulē । vinnavai 'dēva ! ēsō na sōhaṇō hōi varddhatō' ॥ 35 ॥ 3926 ॥ 
jaṁpēi ya dēvarāō ' tā kiṁ kīrau imammi vatthummi ?' | maṁtī vi bhaṇai 'sāmiya ! nivvisaō kīraū ēsa' ॥ 36 ॥ 3927 ॥ 
sāmatthiūṇa ēvaṁ pabhāyakālammi jaṁpiō kumarō । jaha 'maha visayaṁ mōttuṁ vaccasu annattha taṁ kumara !' ॥ 37 ॥ 3928 ॥ 
' āēsō ' tti bhaṇittā baccai jaṇaṇīē pāyamūlammi । jaṁ jaha vattaṁ savvaṁ, taṁ taha parikahai nīsēsaṁ ॥ 38 ॥ 3929 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ dēvī asupavāhēṇa dhōyagaṁḍayalā । maṇṇubharapūriyaṁgī acaṁtaṁ dukkhiyā jāyā ॥ 39 ॥ 3930 ॥ 
taṁ dukkhayaṁ niē ṁ papaī baccharāyakumarō vi । ' mā aṁbē ! kuṇa ēvaṁ, āēsaṁ dēhi vaccāmi ॥ 40 ॥ 3931 ॥ 
dēvī vi bhaṇai 'puttaya ! jai ēvaṁ tō ahaṁ pi saha tumaē । niyabhagiṇīē samēyā āgacchissāmi aviyappaṁ ' ॥ 41 ॥ 3932 ॥ 
aha bhai vaccharāō 'māē ! dēsatarāī visamāī । suhasamuciyā tumaṁ puṇa tā ciṭu suhēṇa ētthēva ' ॥ 42 ॥ 3933 ॥

tō jaṇaṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ 'puttaya ! mā bhaṇasu ērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ । tumaē parivārēṇa ya juyāē kaha maha duhaṁ hōhī ? ' ॥ 43 ॥ 3934 ॥ 
tō parivārajuyā jā caliyā sā dhāriṇī mahādēvī । tā vāriō samaggō parivārō dēvarāṇaṁ ॥ 44 ॥ 3935 ॥ 
bhaṇiyaṁ 'imēṇa samayaṁ jō baccai tassa nicchyaṁ pāṇē । ghēcchāmi' iya bhaṇēuṁ uddālai vāhaṇāī pi ॥ 45 ॥ 3936 ॥ 
aha dōnni vi bhagiṇīō kumarēṇa samaṁ calati pāēhiṁ । saṁbalamēttaṁ kiṁcī piḍaē ghēttūṇa sīsammi ॥ 46 ॥ 3937 ॥ 
tā puravarassamajhē hāhakkārō daḍhaṁ samucchaliō । pāēṇa na'tthi kō vi hu jēṇa na aṁsulliyaṁ vayaṇaṁ ॥ 47 ॥ 3938 ॥ 
jaṁpai ya 'ahō ! ajaṁ nayaramaṇāhaṁ daḍhaṁ imaṁ jāyaṁ । ajaṁ ciya paṁcattaṁ pattō sirivīrasēṇō vi ॥ 48 ॥ 3939 ॥ 
nūṇamadhannaṁ ēvaṁ jaṁ muccai ērisēṇa purisēṇa । ahavā vi kapparukkhō, kiṁ hōi thirō adhannāṇaṁ' ॥ 49 ॥ 3940 ॥ 
iya purajaṇavayaṇāī nisuṇaṁtāī kamati pāēhiṁ । mōttūṇa tayaṁ dēsaṁ avatidēsamma pattāī ॥ 50 ॥ 3941 ॥ 
tattha'tthi purī rammā ujrēṇīnāma dasadisipayāsā । tīē ya atthi rāyā jiyasattū nāma vikkhāō ॥ 51 ॥ 3942 ॥ 
tassa'tthi aggamahisī kaṇayasirī nāma rūva- guṇakaliyā । aha puravarīē bāhiṁ tāiṁ chāyāē bīsamahiṁ ॥ 52 ॥ 3943 ॥ 
ciṁtai dēvī aha bīsamaṁtiyā "hā ! hayāsa ! rē dēvva ! । kiṁ ēyaṁ amhāṇaṁ vihiyamavatthaṁtaraṁ visamaṁ ? ॥ 53 ॥ 3944 ॥

dhāriṇi vimalā ya taō dōnni vi kammaṁ kuṇaṁti taggēhē । ahavā udarassa kaē jaṁ na kayaṁ, taṁ pi kuṇai jaṇō ॥ 66 ॥ 3957 ॥ 
kammāyattā jīvā bahuvihadukkhāṇa bhāyaṇaṁ hōṁti । jaha dhāriṇī vi dēvī paragēhē kuṇai kammāī ॥ 67 ॥ 3958 ॥ 
jaṁ dāṇaṁ dēṁtēhiṁ kiñcai cittammi kiṁci kālussaṁ । taṁ bhauttūṇa suhāī pārśvēti jiyā duhāī pi ॥ 68 ॥ 3959 ॥ 
jaha ēsa cciya dēvī bahubisuhalāliyā ya hōūṇa । māṇasa - sārīriyavivihadukkhacaya bhāiṇī jāyā ॥ 69 ॥ 3960 ॥ 
tā ēyaṁ nāūṇaṁ rakkhēyavvaṁ maṇassa kālussaṁ । savvaṁ pi dhammakicaṁ visuddhacittā kuṇaha ṇicaṁ ॥ 70 ॥ | 3961 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca jāva diyahā kēttiyamēttā vi tāṇa vōlēṁti । tā annammi diṇammiṁ bhaṇiyāō tēṇa vaṇiēṇa ॥ 71 ॥ 3962 ॥ 
'ēsō vi bālaō mē vacchayarūvāṇi rakkhaū bhaddē ! | jai tumhāṇa vibhāvai nivvavasāō jaō ēsa' ॥ 72 ॥ 3963 ॥ 
tō bahuvihāī hiyaē aṭṭa-rauddāī ciṁtavēūṇa । 'hōu imaṁ pi hu ēvaṁ suṁdara ! tumhēhiṁ jaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ' ॥ 73 ॥ 3964 ॥ 
tō vaccharāya kumarō viṇīyaviṇaō tti jaṇaṇivayaṇēṇa । cittē abhāvamāṇaṁ pi rakkhaṇaṁ kuṇai vacchāṇa ॥ 74 ॥ 3965 ॥ 
aha annamma diṇammiṁ gahiuṁ vacchāṇi jāi aḍavīē । vacchēsu caraṁtēsuṁ jā vīsamaī khaṇaṁ ēkaṁ ॥ 75 ॥ 3966 ॥ 
tā ēgattha vaṇammi nisuṇai satthāṇa guṇaṇiyāsaddaṁ । ciṁtai ya "haṁta ! kattha vi ēsō naṇu guṇaṇiyāsaddō” ॥ 76 ॥ 3967 ॥

aṇusārēṇaṁ tēṇaṁ vaccai vaṇasaṁḍamajjhayārammi । pēcchai ya tattha kumarē nāṇāsatthāiṁ guṇavaṁtē ॥ 77 ॥ 3968 ॥ 
daṇaṁ tē kumarē harisēṇupphullalōyaṇō ēsō । ēgattha ḍiō pēcchai vinnāṇaṁ tāṇa kumarāṇa ॥ 78 ॥ 3969 ॥ 
jaī kō vi hu ghāyāō īsiṁ pi hu bhullaē taō ēsō। 'hā ha' tti jaṁpamāṇō muṁhammi sāmattaṇaṁ dharai ॥ 79 ॥ 3970 ॥ 
jai puṇa ṭhāṇē ghāō nivaḍai tō tōsanibbharō dhaṇiyaṁ । 'sāhu' tti jaṁpamāṇō na māi niyayammi aṁgammi ॥ 80 ॥ 3971 ॥ 
taṁ daṭṭhē kalasūrī ciṁtai "naṇu ēsa kōviō kōvi । bālō vi hu jō ēvaṁ jāṇai satthāṇa mammāī " ॥ 81 ॥ 3972 ॥ 
tō puṭṭō tēṇa imō 'vaccha ! tumaṁ āgaō kuō ēttha ?' । tō bhaṇai vaccharāō 'tāya ! mamaṁ dēsiyaṁ muṇasu ॥ 82 ॥ 3973 ॥ 
kōḍussa pēcchaṇatthaṁ ēttha paviṭṭhō' taō uvajjhāō । jaṁpai 'kēttiyamēttaṁ bujjhasi taṁ vaccha ! sāhēhi ?' ॥ 83 ॥ 3974 ॥ 
akkhai ya ēsa 'paricayamēttaṁ maha atthi 'saṁgaibasāō' । āisai kalāyariō 'karēhi satthaṁ karē baccha ! ॥ 84 ॥ 3975 ॥ 
daṁsēhi amha niyayaṁ vinnāṇaṁ' tō imō vi payaḍēi । sabba'tthēsu kusalayaṁ, taṁ dahuṁ vimhiyā savvē ॥ 85 ॥ 3976 ॥ 
ēvaṁ jā khaṇamēkaṁ satthāṇa parissamaṁ imō kuṇai । tāva kumarāṇa jōggaṁ jhaḍatti bhattaṁ samaṇupattaṁ ॥ 86 ॥ 3977 ॥ 
kumarēhiṁ taō ēsō vi bhōiō pavarabhōyaṇavihīē। thakkō jāva viyālaṁ jāi taō niyayagēhammi ॥ 87 ॥ 3978 ॥ 
vaccharuvāṇi vi rakkhavālaparivajjiyāī kāūṇaṁ । saddivasē cciya gēhaṁ gayāṇi, tō bōllaē sēṭṭhī ॥ 88 ॥ 3979 ॥

kumarō vi bhāyammi uṭṭhittā aḍavisammuhaṁ jāi। pēcchaṁtō nāṇāvihataruvaragaṇasaṁkulaṁ raṇṇaṁ ॥ 101 ॥ 3992 ॥ avi ya-
aṁba-kayaṁba-niṁba- aṁbōiya-jaṁbuya-siṁvisaṁkulaṁ, nāga-sāga-punnāga-sugaṁ-gaya-pūgaya- tagara āulaṁ ।
ajjuṇa-saja-khuja- khajūriya-khijjaḍa-khaṁjapūriyaṁ, khaira- bōri-vaḍa- khiriṇiya - khāruyatarusamūsiyaṁ ॥ 102 ॥ 3993 ॥ 
iya ērisayaṁ varṇataraṁ bahuvihataruvara bharaniraṁtaraṁ । jōvai tattha bhamaṁtau hiyaicchiu vararukkha samaṁtau ॥ 103 ॥ 3994 ॥ 
ēvaṁ hiṁḍatēṇa tēṇaṁ ēttha gahaṇadēsammi । ēgā varadēuliyā saccaviyā suṭu ramaṇīyā ॥ 104 ॥ 3995 ॥ 
tassa ya vaṇassa sāmī, maṁjhē tīsē paiṭṭiō dēvō । saccaviō varajakkhōṁ pañcakkhō bhattimatāṇa ॥ 105 ॥ 3996 ॥ 
tīē dēuliyāē jāva paribbhamai nāidūrammi । tā paisarai suyaṁdhō gaṁdhō sē nāsiyāraṁdhē ॥ 106 ॥ 3997 ॥ 
āghāiūṇa gaṁdha ciṁtai “siricaṁdaṇassimō gaṁdhō । tā kattō ?, huṁ nāyaṁ bhaviyavvaṁ caṁdaṇa mēṇa ॥ 107 ॥ 3998 ॥ 
jamhā sarisō gaṁdhō tā kō sō hōhiī iya tarūṇaṁ । ēyassa parimalēṇaṁ jamhā parivāsiyā savvē ॥ 108 ॥ 3999 ॥ 
hūṁ nāya nāyavyō bisaharaciṁdhēṇa viusakahiēṇa" । iya ciṁtiuṁ nirikkhai vaṇasaṁḍaṁ vaccharāō tti ॥ 109 ॥ 4000 ॥

ajña ahaṁ sakayatthō, ajaṁ ciya majjha jīviyaṁ sahalaṁ । jaṁ ciṁtāmaṇitullā sāmiṇi! iha āgayā taṁ si' ॥ 199 ॥ 4090 ॥ 
tō jaṁpai kaṇayasirī ' mā kuṇa taṁ bhadda ! saṁbhamaṁ garuyaṁ । dhannō si tumaṁ jēṇaṁ tuha gēhē majjha bhagiṇiō ॥ 200 ॥ 4091 ॥ 
cihuṁti dōnni mahanaravariṁdapattīō puttajuttāō' । ētthaṁtarammi kumarō pavisai jaṇaṇīē pāsammi ॥ 201 ॥ 4092 ॥ 
kāūṇa pāyagahaṇaṁ sāhittā puvvakahiyavuttaṁtaṁ । jaṁpai 'aṁbē ! ētthaṁ naranāhō tumha bhagiṇivaī' ॥ 202 ॥ 4093 ॥

dāūṇa niyayakaragahiyabīḍayaṁ tō nivō visajjēi । ēsō vi jāi niyaē gēhē jaṇaṇīṇa pāsammi ॥ 286 ॥ 4177 ॥

chaṇhaṁ māsāṇaṁtē puṇō vi tuha pāyavaṁdaṇaṁ kāhaṁ । jai puṇa na ēmi kahavi hu jalaṁjalī majjha dāyavvō' ॥ 289 ॥ 4180 ॥

'āēsō ' tti bhaṇittā chakkannōvāhaṇāhi gūḍhapaō । varakhaggakhēḍayakarō niggacchai jhatti nayarīō ॥ 291 ॥ 4182 ॥ 
aṇavarayapayāṇēhiṁ baccai ēsō mahiṁ vilaṁghatō । dāhiṇadisimāsaiō jā vaccai tattha kai vi diṇē ॥ 292 ॥ 4183 ॥ 
bahudēsa-gāma- nagarāimaṁḍiyaṁ vasumaī nirikkhaṁtō । pattō mahāmahaṁtaṁ ēga aḍavīmuhaṁ ghōraṁ ॥ 293 ॥ 4184 ॥

kiṁ hōhī bhūyāṇaṁ, uyāhu jakkhāṇa rakkhasāṇaṁ vā ? | ahavā nahi nahi ēyaṁ dīsai ya cauppayaṁ jēṇa ॥ 295 ॥ 4186 ॥ 10
kiṁ vā vi vigappēhiṁ ? jaṁ hōhī taṁ tu dīsihī laggaṁ" । iya ciṁtaṁtō pattō duvāradēsammi aha tassa ॥ 296 ॥ 4187 ॥

pēcchai ya tassa majjhē pavaranaraṁ varasahāē uvavituṁ । niyaparivārasamaggaṁ taṁ daṭṭhē pucchaē kaṁ ci ॥ 298 ॥ 4189 ॥ 
'kiṁnāmayapuramēyaṁ ? kiṁnāmō ēttha naravaī ēsa ?' । sāhēi sō vi "suṁdara ! na hōi ēyaṁ puraṁ kiṁci ॥ 299 ॥ 4190 ॥ 
kiṁtu iha nāidūrē bhūtilayaṁ nāma paṭṭaṇaṁ asthi । tattha'tthi rāyasīhō rāyā sirivairisīhō ti ॥ 300 ॥ 4191 ॥ 
tassa ya iṭṭhō sēṭṭhī asēsapuralōyanāyagō atthi । bahuriddhi bharasamiddhō supasiddhō dattaō nāma ॥ 301 ॥ 4192 ॥ 
tassa ya varabhajjāē siriyādēvi tti nāmadhēyāē । jāyā pahāṇakannā pañcakkhā mayaṇaghariṇi vva ॥ 302 ॥ 4193 ॥ 
sā jōvvaṇammi pattā asēsarūvāiguṇagaṇasamaggā । nāmēṇaṁ siridattā jaṇaṇī - jaṇayāṇa aibhattā ॥ 303 ॥ 4194 ॥ 
tīē ya mahādōsō saṁjāō jōvvaṇammi pattāē । jō sōvai pāhariō sō marai na ēttha saṁdēhō ॥ 304 ॥ 4195 ॥ 
jai puṇa nō pāhariō sōvai tō marahiṁ satta paṇa purisā । tō raṇṇā sō bhaṇiō 'vacca tumaṁ sēṭṭhi ! aḍavīē ॥ 305 ॥ 4196 ॥ 
mā jaṇakhaō bhavissai nayarammiṁ tujjha dhīyadōsēṇa । niyapariyaṇaṁ gahēuṁ vaccasu, mā taṁ cirāvēhi' ॥ 306 ॥ 4197 ॥ 
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ sō sēṭṭhī niyayapariyaṇasamaggō । mōttūṇa vasimadēsaṁ saṁpattō ēttha aḍavī ॥ 307 ॥ 4198 ॥ 
kāūṇa ya dhavalaharaṁ pāsōvāsēsu pariyaṇagihāī । cōrāīṇa bhaēṇa ya karēi uttuṁgapāyāraṁ ॥ 308 ॥ 4199 ॥ 
tā pahiya ! imō sēṭṭhī paccakkhō tujjha cēva, kiṁ bahuṇā ? । ēyaṁ ca sannivēsaṁ dattauraṁ nāma supasiddhaṁ ॥ 309 ॥ 4200 ॥

tā pēcchai bahu nīraṁ vubbhaṁtaṁ pavaranārisatthēṇa । tāō ya tayaṁ daṭṭhē parōpparaṁ ēva jaṁpati ॥ 385 ॥ 4276 ॥ 
'pēccha halē! pēccha halē! ēsō kattō vi māṇusō pattō । airūva - jōvvaṇajuō paccakkhō kāmadēvō vva ? ॥ 386 ॥ 4277 ॥ 
na ya kaiyā vi hu ētthaṁ kō vihu māṇussaō samāyāō'। aha kumarēṇa vi puṭṭhā tāṇaṁ majjhāō ēgitthī ॥ 387 ॥ 4278 ॥ 
' kā ēsā varanayarī ? kō vā ētthaṁ narāhivō bhaddē ! ? ' । iya bhaṇiyāē vr̥ttaṁ 'na hu atthi narāhivō ēttha ॥ 388 ॥ 4279 ॥ 
ēsā hu dēviyāhiṁ vaṁtarajāīhiṁ puravarī sōma ! । kīlāhēuṁ raiyā iha tāō ramaṁti sēcchā' ॥ 389 ॥ 4280 ॥ 
pucchai puṇō vi kumarō 'jai ēvaṁ tō kimēsa jalapūrō। vubbhajhai aippabhūō ?' dēi taō uttaraṁ ēsā ॥ 390 ॥ 4281 ॥ 
'amhāṇaṁ savvāṇa vijā kira bhō ! sāmiṇī mahābhāga ! । sā niyakīlāē gayā pahayā bāhāē kēṇā'vi ॥ 391 ॥ 4282 ॥ 
tēṇaṁ ca kāraṇēṇaṁ ēyāē atthi dāruṇā pīḍā । tattha imō jalasēgō kīrai pīḍāē samaṇatthaṁ ॥ 392 ॥ 4283 ॥ 
na ya uvasamai kahiṁcivi sā pīḍā tīē' tō imō bhaṇai । 'kiṁ dēvī vi hu ēsā na cayai uvasāmiuṁ pīḍaṁ ? ' ॥ 393 ॥ 4284 ॥ 
1 . itthaṁ truo ॥

jaṁpēi ya taṁ tō sā 'dhāyagadēhassa rakkhagasurāē । pūṇēuṁ na vi sakkai, uvasamai na vēyaṇā tattō ॥ 394 ॥ 4285 ॥ 
ōsahijuyalaṁ ca karē ēīē āsi mahapahāvillaṁ । acaṁtaṁ tuṭṭēṇaṁ dinnaṁ sirivaṁtariṁdēṇaṁ ॥ 395 ॥ 4286 ॥ 
ēkkaṁ dhūmēṇa parē mōhai, bīyaṁ ca gurupahārē vi । uvasāmēī viyaṇaṁ, taṁpi hu tatthēva sē paḍiyaṁ ॥ 396 ॥ 4287 ॥ 
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ sakkai nō vēyaṇa uvasamēuṁ ' । tō bhaṇai vaccharāō 'bhaddē ! hē māṇusō vējō ॥ 397 ॥ 4288 ॥ 
jaha kaha vi vēyaṇaṁ sē avaṇēmi taō kimamha sā dēi ? ' । sā jaṁpai 'jaṁ maggasi taṁ lahasi na ēttha saṁdēhō' ॥ 398 ॥ 4289 ॥ 
bhaṇai imō 'jai ēvaṁ, pēcchāmiṁ tāva jai tumaṁ bhaṇasi । sā jaṁpai 'pucchēuṁ ēmi ahaṁ sāmiṇi vējja ! ' ॥ 399 ॥ 4290 ॥ 
vijjō vi āha ' ēvaṁ karēhi jai tē' paōyaṇaṁ imiṇā । jēṇa paḍikkhāmi khaṇaṁ ahamētthaṁ, annahā jāmi' ॥ 400 ॥ 4291 ॥ 
tō tīē gaṁtūṇaṁ bhaṇiyā sā 'dēvi ! atthi vinnattī । māṇusavē jō ēgō nayarīē ciṭui duvārē ॥ 401 ॥ 4292 ॥ 
sō jaṁpara jaha ēyaṁ ahayaṁ avaṇēmi vēyaṇaṁ savvaṁ । tā kiṁ āṇēmi tayaṁ ?' sā jaṁpai 'sigghamāṇēhi' ॥ 402 ॥ 4293 ॥ 
tattō sā āgaṁtuṁ pabhaṇai 'bhō ! ēhi mā bilaṁbēhi' । kumarō vi tīē sahiō pavisai nayariṁ palōyaṁtō ॥ 403 ॥ 4294 ॥ 
bhaṇiō ya tīē 'bhaddaya ! jai tūsai kaha vi sāmiṇī amha । tā maggijjāsi tumaṁ uvariṭhiyaṁ kannayājuyalaṁ ॥ 404 ॥ 4295 ॥ 
taha kāmiyapallaṁkaṁ jakkhaṁ ciya āsarūvakayavēsaṁ । ēttiyamēttaṁ maggēja, jēṇa taṁ sutthiō hōhī' ॥ 405 ॥ 4296 ॥ 
1. tarēdēṇaṁ kā0 ॥ 2. vējjō jē0 ॥ । 3. bhē pā0. kā0 ॥ 4. iha pā0 ॥ 5 maggējjā' jē0 kā0 ॥ 6. tēṇa pā0 ॥

tāō ya kannayāō dōnni vi lāvaṇṇa-vaṇṇapuṇṇāō ।
dōnni vi kaṁtijuyāō, dōnni vi kalakōsalillāō ॥ 418 ॥ 4309 ॥ 
dōnni vi varavijjāō, dōnni vi navajōvvaṇammi pattāōṁ । dōnni vi thīpavarāō, dōnni vi kīlaṁti sēcchā ॥ 419 ॥ 4310 ॥ 
jaṇaṇīhiṁ taō dōnni vi savvālaṁkārabhūsiyaṁgīō । piupāyabaṁdaṇatthaṁ paṭuviyāō taō tāō ॥ 420 ॥ 4311 ॥ 
namiūṇa jaṇayapāē dōnni vi caraṇaṁtiē nisannāō । nivvanniyarūvāō dō vi kayāō nariṁdē ॥ 421 ॥ 4312 ॥ 
tattō visajjiyāō jaṇaṇīpāsēsu dōnni vi gayāō। jaṇaō vi tāṇa dōṇha vi varagavisaṇavāvaḍō jāō ॥ 422 ॥ 4313 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi pattō ēgō nēmittiō niva'tthāṇē । dāūṇa āsaṇavaraṁ suhāsaṇatthaṁ bhaṇai rāyā ॥ 423 ॥ 4314 ॥ 
'bhaddaya! kassēyāō dāyavvāō varāō kannāō ? ' । sō vihu gaṇiūṇa taō āisai nivassa jaha 'dēva ! ॥ 424 ॥ 4315 ॥ 
hōhiṁti bhāriyāō uttamabala - viriya - sāhasajuyassa । accanbhuyacariyassa u bhūgōyaravaccharāyassa' ॥ 425 ॥ 4316 ॥ 
rāyā viṇai 'suṁdara ! kaha dāyavvāō tassa ēyāō ? ' । āisai imō vi taō 'na tujjha pāsammi ēyāṇa ॥ 426 ॥ 4317 ॥ 10

rāyā vi āha 'tō kaha kāyavvāō imāō sāhēhi ? ' । nēmittiō vi jaṁpai 'āsī puṇa tujjha niva! bhagiṇī ॥ 428 ॥ 4319 ॥

jaṇaēṇa puvvadinnā sūranariṁdassa bhūmirāyassa । niyavallahamittassa usā bhuṁjai tēṇa saha bhōē ॥ 429 ॥ 4320 ॥ 
aha jammaṁtarasaṁbaddhiyāē aṇṇāē rāyakannāē । sō āsattō tīsē nāmaṁ pi hu nēcchaē sōuṁ ॥ 430 ॥ 4321 ॥ 
sā vi hu viddēsagayā tīsē uvariṁ karittu bālatavaṁ । mariūṇa samuppannā supayaṁḍā vaṁtarī dēvī ॥ 431 ॥ 4322 ॥ 
sā vi hu tīē savittī mariūṇaṁ dattasēṭṭiṇō dhūyā । uppannā saṁvavaī dāṇāī kiṁci kāūṇa ॥ 432 ॥ 4323 ॥ 
vayasā vi saṁpai ubbhaḍanavajōvvaṇammi ramaṇīē । tīsē ya uvari dēvī vaha paōsaṁ aṇaṇṇasamaṁ ॥ 433 ॥ 4324 ॥ 
ciṁtai " pāhariō vi hu jō kōvi narō imīē pāsammi । sōvai taṁ pi hu ahayaṁ jamālayaṁ paṭuvissāmi” ॥ 434 ॥ 4325 ॥ 
iya ciṁtiūṇa ēsā paidiyahaṁ haṇai tīē pāhariyaṁ । kōvavasēṇaṁ aja vi baṭṭai purisakkhaō tattha ॥ 435 ॥ 4326 ॥ 
tī pāsaṭhiyāṇaṁ ēyāṇaṁ ēhiī sa bhattārō । pariṇissai ya imāō naravara ! ēttha na saṁdēhō ॥ 436 ॥ 4327 ॥ 
dēvīē sayāsāō purisaviṇāsaṁ ca rakkhiūṇaṁ sō। pariṇissai taṁ kaṇṇaṁ ii savvaṁ akkhiyaṁ tujjha" ॥ 437 ॥ 4328 ॥ 
tō tēṇaṁ āṇittā ēyāō ēttha majjha pāsammi । mukkāō sayaṁ ca puṇō kiṁci tavaṁ kariya kālagaō ॥ 438 ॥ 4329 ॥ 
baṁtaraiṁdō jāō maē samāṇaṁ karēi bahunēhaṁ । tēṇēsa āsarūvī dinnō maha kiṁkarō jakkhō ॥ 439 ॥ 4330 ॥

pariṇīyāō ya taō kannāō vaccharāyakumarēṇaṁ । bhuṁjai ya tattha bhōē acaṁtaṁ suharasāṇugaō ॥ 441 ॥ 4332 ॥

vayaṇāṇaṁtaramēva ya pallaṁkō ullalittu sahasa tti । siridattāvāsaharē avayariuṁ ḍāi turagajuō ॥ 453 ॥ 4344 ॥

kāūṇaṁ ātitthaṁ pucchai sēṭṭhī vi 'kattha taṁ vaccha ! । āsi gaō ? ' tō tēṇa vi nirahaṁkārēṇa cittēṇa ॥ 46 5 ॥ 4356 ॥

vīsajjiō ya tēṇa vi tattō rayaṇīē bōliē paharē । āruhaī pallēkē kaṁtātiyagēṇa saṁjuttō ॥ 470 ॥ 4361 ॥ 
pabhaṇai ya ' jāhi iṇhiṁ ujjēṇīpuravarīē maha gēhē' । tāva ya khaṇamēttēṇaṁ pallaṁkō tattha saṁpattō ॥ 471 ॥ 4362 ॥ 
jāē pabhāyasamaē jaṇaṇī māussiyāō paidiyahaṁ । ārattiyaṁ kuṇaṁtī tassa kumārassa sē jāē ॥ 472 ॥ 4363 ॥

taṁ ḍhakkiuṁ tahēṁba ya puṇō vi bīyaṁ disaṁ nirikkhati । tā pēcchaṁti kumāraṁ tattō ūsasiyahiyayāō ॥ 474 ॥ 4365 ॥ 
ōsakkaṁti ya sahasā saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ viyakkayaṁtīō | "jaha kira ēsō ciṭui bhajjāhiṁ samaṁ iha pasuttō" ॥ 475 ॥ 4366 ॥

tāō vi sāsuyāṇaṁ paḍaṁti pāēsu bhattijuttāō । kumarō vi bhaṇai 'aṁbē ! ēyāō tumha vahuyāō' ॥ 477 ॥ 4368 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca vaccharāō vi tāhi abhinaṁdiō pabhāē ya । vatthaṁ ghēttuṁ vañcai naravaiṇō pāyamūlammi ॥ 478 ॥ 4369 ॥ 
kāūṇa aha navajraṁ naravai - dēvīṇa viṇayasaṁjuttō । appēi tayaṁ cīraṁ taṁ daṭṭu harisiyā dēvī ॥ 479 ॥ 4370 ॥ 
pabhaṇai 'putta ! cirāū hōsu, tumaṁ amha jīviēṇā'vi' । rāyā vihu sakkāraṁ ābharaṇāīhiṁ sē kuṇai ॥ 480 ॥ 4371 ॥ 
pucchai ya taō vattaṁ 'kaha cīraṁ pāviyaṁ imaṁ tumaē ? । bhamiō ya kattha suṁdara ! ēttiyakālaṁ ? kahasu savvaṁ ॥ 481 ॥ 4372 ॥ 
kumarō vi hu kahai raṇṇō viṇiggaō jaha jahēva pariṇīyā । siridattā, jaha pattō vaṁtaridēvīṇa nayarīē ॥ 482 ॥ 4373 ॥ 
jaha pattā kannāō taha nissēsaṁ pi sāhiyaṁ tēṇa । pallaṁka -turayalaṁbha mōttūṇaṁ jāva iha pattō ॥ 483 ॥ 4374 ॥ 
ēvaṁ pamuiyacittō jā bhuṁjai kēvi vāsarē bhōē । tā kaṇayasirī dēvī paṁcataṁ pāviyā sahasā ॥ 484 ॥ 4375 ॥ 
tīē virahammi nivō appāṇaṁ suṇṇayaṁ va mannatō । kuṇai na kiṁcivi cēṭuṁ ṇhāṇāīyaṁ sarīraṭhi ॥ 485 ॥ 4376 ॥ 
tō vaccharāya kumarō bhaṇai 'na tuha dēva ! ērisaṁ juttaṁ । jamhā asārarūvē saṁsārē caṁcalaṁ jīyaṁ ॥ 486 ॥ 4377 ॥ avi ya- 10

mēhassa majjhē iva iṁdacāvaṁ, saṁjjhabbharāu vva calassahāvaṁ । vāsaṁtanīrammiya bubbuyaṁ va, bāēṇa uppāḍiyapattayaṁ va ॥ 488 ॥ 4379 ॥

raṇṇā vihu saṁlattō 'kiṁ tuha bhō ! vippayāraṇāṭhāṇaṁ । amhē jēṇaṁ ēvaṁ pañcakkhaṁ vippayārēsi ? ' ॥ 511 ॥ 4402 ॥

sāhēhi ya jaṁ kajjūṁ' sāhai kumarō vi rāyaāēsaṁ । jaṁpai sā 'nēhi mamaṁ, karēmi duṭṭhāṇa jaṁ jōgaṁ' ॥ 566 ॥ 4457 ॥

tō sāvaṁtarivagghī tabbuddhīdāyagaṁ mahāmatiṁ । ghēttuṁ bhakkhara sahasā tā rāyā jaṁpaē ēvaṁ ॥ 570 ॥ 4461 ॥ 
'hā vaccharāya ! hā vaccharāya ! mī kuṇasu ērisaṁ kammaṁ । giṇhasu ēyaṁ vagdhiṁ jā na vi savvē khayaṁ nēi' ॥ 571 ॥ 4462 ॥ 
gēhai ya vaccharāō puṇō vi kaṇṇammi jhatti taṁ vagdhi । rāyā vi bhaṇai 'bhaddaya ! nēhi imaṁ āṇiyā jattō ॥ 572 ॥ 4463 ॥ 
kajjuṁ na kiṁci amhaṁ' iya bhaṇiē lōyapatthaṇāē ya । nēi niyayammi gēhē bhajjāō kuṇaṁti paḍivattiṁ ॥ 573 ॥ 4464 ॥ 
khāmittā sā mukkā vaccai niyayammi jhatti ṭhāṇammi । kumarō vi tāhi samayaṁ bhuṁjai bhōē aṇaṇṇasamē ॥ 574 ॥ 446 5 ॥ 
aha annammi diṇammī rāyā jā sarai tāō bālāō। puṇaravi paṁcasarēṇaṁ sahasā vēyallayaṁ nīō ॥ 575 ॥ 4466 ॥ 
taṁ daṭṭu tayavatthaṁ puṇō vi maṁtaṁti maṁtiṇō savvē । pēcchaṁti puṇa vi maṁtaṁ ' āṇāvaha jamalanīraṁ' ti ॥ 576 ॥ 4467 ॥

vaha ya tumhāṇuvariṁ saṇiddhabaṁdhuttaṇaṁ aṇaṇṇasamaṁ । bhaṇai ya bahukālāō tumbhēhiṁ sumariyā amhē ॥ 630 ॥ 4521 ॥

taṁ daṇaṁ ciṁtai " ēvamiṇaṁ, natvi ēttha saṁdēhō । jamhā imammi dīsaṁti sayala dēvāṇa ciṇhāī" ॥ 633 ॥ 4524 ॥

jamhā na atthi ētthaṁ iṁdā''ēsēṇa amha āgamaṇaṁ । tā tumaē ciya kahamavi āgaṁtavvaṁ ihaṁ mitta !' ॥ 636 ॥ 4527 ॥ 
iya bhaṇiē savvēhiṁ vi gamaṇammi samujjayaṁ kayaṁ cittaṁ । tō jaṁpai daṁḍadharō 'jai cittaṁ asthi sō ēha' ॥ 637 ॥ 4528 ॥ 
tō rāyāī savvē sahasā uṭuṁti tattha gamaṇatthaṁ । pattā ya tattha ṭhāṇē, daṁḍadharō pavisaē puraō ॥ 638 ॥ 4529 ॥ 
tappaṭuō ya maṁtī caurō vi hu tattha jhatti pavisaṁti । khaṇamēttēṇaṁ ca puṇō saṁjāyā chārapuṁjō vva ॥ 639 ॥ 4530 ॥

sēya kuṁdēdu - dahi-khīrasamavannayaṁ, satthaparibhaṇiyasupamāṇalahukaṇṇayaṁ,
uḍūḍhakayadīhanaṁgūlavaradaṁḍayaṁ, pēcchaē dēvi mayanāhamuddaṁḍayaṁ 1 |
tayaṇu caudaṁta thira thōḍasuṁḍārayaṁ, galiyamayasalilaalivalayasuhakārayaṁ,
sēyauvacaiyauttuṁgataṇudhārayaṁ, pēcchaē gayēvaī sayalakarisārayaṁ 2 ।
puṇa vi tikkhaggasiṁgēhiṁ vilihatayaṁ, taha ya suisuhayasaddēṇa taḍuṁtayaṁ,
suddhavaradhavalavaṇṇēṇa rāyaṁtayaṁ, pēcchaē gōvisaṁ dēvi sumahatayaṁ 3 ।
puṇa vi viyasaṁtapaumāsaṇē saṁḍiyaṁ, paṇayajaṇavarapayāṇammi ukkaṁḍiyaṁ,
vaṇagaīdēhiṁ abhisēyasiccaṁtayaṁ, niyai lacchi mahādēvi supasaṁtayaṁ 4 ।
tayaṇu alivalayanivahēṇa paricuṁbiyaṁ, gucchabahukusumabhārēṇa parilaṁbiyaṁ,
pavaragaṁdhēṇa mahamahiyadisicakkayaṁ, niyai varakusumamālājuyaṁ sakkayaṁ 5 ।
jhariyavara amayanivvaviyajīvōhayaṁ, kumuyasaṁḍāṇa niccaṁ pi paḍibōhayaṁ,
caṁdimāpūranivvaviyamahimaṁḍalaṁ, pēcchaē dēvi saṁpuṇṇasasimaṁḍalaṁ 6 ।

caṁḍakarapasarahayatimiraghaṇaḍaṁbaraṁ, payaḍiyā' sēsadharavalaya taha aṁbaraṁ,
vivihasayavattasaṁḍāṇa suviyāsayaṁ, pēcchaē diṇayaraṁ dēvi ubbhāsayaṁ 7 ।
kiṁkiṇīniyara kayamahurajhaṁkārayaṁ, saṇhavarapaṭṭasiyasicaya kayasārayaṁ,
kaṇayamayasarala - diḍhadaṁḍasunibaddhayaṁ, pēcchaē dēvi airamma sumahaddhayaṁ 8 ।
vivihavara kusumamālāhiṁ urumāliyaṁ, sarasasirikhaṁḍapuṁḍēhiṁ sōhāliyaṁ,
sacchasusuyaṁdhanīrōhasaṁpuṇṇayaṁ, pēcchaē sāmiṇī kuṁbhamanbhuṇṇayaṁ 9 ।
taruvarāiṇṇapālīē suparōhiyaṁ, kamala kalhārasayavattasupasōhiyaṁ,
nakka-cakkāijalajīvasaṁkhuṇṇayaṁ, paumavarasarabaraṁ niyai jalapuṇṇayaṁ 10 ।
garuyakallōla- mālāhiṁ suvisōhiyaṁ, nakka- cakkāijalajīvasaṁkhōhiyaṁ,
dūradiṭṭhīē dīsaṁtaparapārayaṁ, pēcchaē sāyaraṁ dēvi bahunīrayaṁ 11 ।
dhayavaḍāḍōyamālāhiṁ dhuvvaṁtayaṁ, kaṇayamayakhaṁ bhabhittīhiṁ dippaṁtayaṁ,
nayaṇamaṇasuhayaraṁ, jīvadīsaṁtayaṁ, varavimāṇaṁ tayaṁ niyai viyasaṁtayaṁ 12 ।

paḍiō ya takkhaṇēṇaṁ puṇaravi ninnaṭucēyaṇō ēsō । sayaṇō vi puṇō dēvaṁ pabhaṇai 'jīvāvasu imaṁ' ti ॥ 110 ॥ 5454 ॥ 
dēvēṇa vi paḍibhaṇiyaṁ ‘jōgō ēsō na suḍukiriyāē ' । 'amhāṇuvarōhēṇaṁ jīvāvasu' bhaṇai sayaṇō vi ॥ 111 ॥ 5455 ॥ 
tō puṇaravi tēṇa kayā kiriyā sā cēva uḍiō sō vi । puṇaravi asaddahaṁtō gharasamuhaṁ calai sahasa tti ॥ 112 ॥ 5456 ॥ 
nivaḍai ya takkhaṇaṁ ciya ēsō puṇa cakkachinnarukkhō vva । sayaṇuvarōhēṇa puṇō taha cēva pavattaē kiriyaṁ ॥ 113 ॥ 5457 ॥ 
taha cēva paṭṭiō jā tahēva paḍiō, tahēva puṇa sayaṇō । vinnavai pāyavaḍiō, dēvō puṇa ṇēcchaē kahavi ॥ 114 ॥ 5458 ॥

mannai na mittavayaṇaṁ, na ya mannai jaṇaṇi-jaṇayavayaṇaṁ ca । na ya mannai maha vayaṇaṁ, tā kaha kiriyaṁ pauṁjāmi ? ॥ 116 ॥ 5460 ॥ 
jō ēyāṇaṁ vayaṇaṁ savvāṇa vi nēya mannaē ahamō । sō kaha kiriyājōgō ?' iya bhaṇiē bhaṇai puṇa sayaṇō ॥ 117 ॥ 5461 ॥

tō tuṭṭō naranāhō pabhaṇai 'annaṁ pi bhaṇasu tā kiṁpi ' । tēṇā'vi jaṁpiyamimaṁ 'dēva ! imaṁ kuṇasu maha vayaṇaṁ ॥ 22 ॥ 5873 ॥ 
kiṁjapīdīvammi susarā kiṁjaṁpisauṇagā ani । dīsaṁtā diṭṭisuhā, kuṇaṁti cittassa paritōsaṁ ॥ 23 ॥ 5874 ॥ 
tā tāṇa āṇaṇaṭṭhā ēvaṁ pēsēha pūsadēvaṁ' ti । rāēṇa vi paḍivajiya āṇattō pusadēvō sō ॥ 24 ॥ 5875 ॥ 
jaha 'bhadda ! tumaṁ vaccasu dīvē kiṁjaṁpināmadhēyammi । kiṁjaṁpisauṇagāṇaṁ āṇayaṇatthaṁ surūvāṇaṁ' ॥ 25 ॥ 5876 ॥ 
sō vi hu " purōhiyakayaṁ ēyaṁ savvaṁ pi" iya vibhāvēuṁ । 'āēsō ' tti bhaṇittā vaccai niyayammi gēhammi ॥ 26 ॥ 5877 ॥ 
gēhassa ya majjhammi khaṇāvaē paccaīyapurisēhiṁ । bhūmīharayaṁ tassa ya uvari puṇō jaṁtapallaṁkaṁ ॥ 27 ॥ 5878 ॥ 
bhaṇiyā paccaiyanarā 'purōhiō jai kahiṁci iha ēi । baṁdhittā pacchannaṁ, tō āṇējjāha maha pāsē ॥ 28 ॥ 5879 ॥ 
iya āēsaṁ dāu purisāṇa vi ṇiggaō taō ēsō । dēsaṁtarajattāē nāūṇa viṇiggayaṁ taṁ tu ॥ 29 ॥ 5880 ॥ 
pavisai karālapiṁgō parituṭṭhō pūsadēvagēhammi । uvavēsiō ya tammi pallēkē jaṁtanimmaviē ॥ 30 ॥ 5881 ॥

<pb n="702"/>

jā uvaviṭṭhō tā jhatti nivaḍiō tammi bhūmiharayammi । tatthatthēhiṁ ya baddhō purisēhiṁ mayūrabaṁdhēhiṁ ॥ 31 ॥ 5882 ॥ 
nēuṁ samappiō sō, tēṇa vi ṇīō ya appaṇā samayaṁ । chammāsēṇaṁ valiō saṁpattō niyayanayarammi ॥ 32 ॥ 5883 ॥ 
mīṇaṁgā lāvēuṁ lēcchārittāṇa tassa taṁ dēhaṁ । bahupaṁcavaṇṇapiṁchēhiṁ sōhiyaṁ kuṇai sō tattō ॥ 33 ॥ 5884 ॥ 
rāyassa purō gaṁtu jōḍiyakarasapuḍō imaṁ bhaṇai । 'dēva ! maē parigahiyā tē pakkhī āsi aibahuyā ॥ 34 ॥ 5885 ॥ 
maggē āvaṁtāṇaṁ paṁcataṁ pāviyā ya tē savvē । mōttūṇēkaṁ pakkhi, tā taṁ daṁsēmi kiṁ dēva !' ॥ 35 ॥ 5886 ॥ 
rāyā vi bhaṇai 'āṇēhi bhadda ! daṁsēhi taṁ mahāpakkhi । nayaṇa-maṇāṇaṁdayaraṁ nisuṇēmi ya jēṇa tassa saraṁ ' ॥ 36 ॥ 5887 ॥ 
tō āṇēuṁ tēṇaṁ mukkō rāyassa aggaō ēsō । rāyā vi bhaṇai 'ahahō ! appuvvaṁ pakkhirūvamiṇaṁ ॥ 37 ॥ 5888 ॥ 
ēkkaṁ tā maṇuyasamō bīyaṁ puṇa paṁcavaṇṇapiṁchadharō । tā saṁpai saddaṁ pi hu saṁbhālāvēhi suisuhayaṁ ॥ 38 ॥ 5889 ॥ 
tō ēsō pāiṇaya ghēttuṁ vidhēi tikkhaārāē । bhaṇai ya 'lava sussarayaṁ, tō sō jaṁpēi kiṁjaṁpi' (pī ? ) ॥ 39 ॥ 5890 ॥ 
rāyā vi tassa daṁtē dahuṁ ōlakkhiūṇa pabhaṇēi । 'bhō samitta ! sāhasa kimapuvaṁ sāhasaṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 40 ॥ 5891 ॥ 
jamhā karālapiṁga ēyaṁ mannēma'haṁ sacittēṇaṁ' । tō bhaṇai imō 'sāmiya ! ēvamimaṁ na'tthi saṁdēhō ' ॥ 41 ॥ 5892 ॥ 
pucchai ṇivō vi 'tā kiṁ ēyārisarūvadhāraō vihiō ? ' । sō bhaṇai 'dēva ! ēsō paradāraraō mahāpāvō ॥ 42 ॥ 5893 ॥

jamhā hu majjha bhajjaṁ aṇicchamāṇi pi icchaē raṁtuṁ । ēēṇa pavacēṇaṁ, tō tīē maha imaṁ sihaṁ ॥ 43 ॥ 5894 ॥ 
ēmāipaōgēṇa ya maē vi ēyārisa imaṁ vihiyaṁ' । taṁ sōuṁ naranāhō kuviō palayāṇalasamāṇō ॥ 44 ॥ 5895 ॥ 
'rē ! rē ! mārēha imaṁ nāṇāvihajāyaṇāhiṁ jāēuṁ । maha āṇābhaṁgakaraṁ pāvaṁ paradāriyaṁ duhuṁ' ॥ 45 ॥ 5896 ॥

tattō ya lōhamaiyaṁ phuliṁgajālāsamāulaṁ mahilaṁ । āliṁgiō samāṇō mariuṁ narayammi uvavannō ॥ 48 ॥ 5899 ॥

mayaraddhaō vba rūbī, sūrō thya payāvasaṁpayākaliō । sūrataṇēṇa sarahō, rivusalahāṇaṁ paībō vva ॥ 4 ॥ 5905 ॥ 
guṇarayaṇāṇaṁ rayaṇāyarō vya, caṁdō vya barakalā kaliō । viṇḍu vya lacchinilaō, kiṁ bahuṇā ? paḍa iva guṇaḍḍhō ॥ 5 ॥ 5906 ॥ 
tassa'tthi varā dēvī sōhaggasamanniyā surūvā ya । nāmēṇaṁ caṁdatilayā, niyapairattā ya bhattā ya ॥ 6 ॥ 5907 ॥ 
ēttō ya tammi nayarē asēsavaṇivagganāyagō sēṭṭhī । nivasai bahuriddhijuō sāyaradattō tti nāmēṇa ॥ 7 ॥ 5908 ॥ 
tassa'tthi piyā pariyaṇauciyattaṇakaraṇalālasā ahiyaṁ । nāmēṇaṁ viṇayasirī kala kōilakōmalālāvā ॥ 8 ॥ 5909 ॥ 
sō tīē samaṁ bhōē bhuṁjai buhapuṇṇaniyarasaṁjaṇiē । aha annayā ya jāyā viṇayasirī gabbhabharakaliyā ॥ 9 ॥ 5910 ॥ 
jāē ya pasavasamaē sammāṇiyasuipasaṁtthadōhalayā । pasavai pavaraṁ puttaṁ pasariyataṇukaṁtisōhillaṁ ॥ 10 ॥ 5911 ॥ 
baddhāviō ya sēṭṭhī suputtajammēṇa dāsacēḍīhiṁ । baddhāvaṇayaṁ rammaṁ karēi bahutōsasaṁjaṇayaṁ ॥ 11 ॥ 5912 ॥ 
battē baddhāvaṇaē saṁpattē nāmakaraṇadivasammi । kayakōuyassa nāmaṁ samuddadattō tti ṭhāvēi ॥ 12 ॥ 5913 ॥ 
varddhatō ya kamēṇaṁ saṁpattō jōvvaṇammi ramaṇīē । nīsēsakalākusalō piuṇā pariṇāviō tattō ॥ 13 ॥ 5914 ॥ 
tatthēva ya nayarammiṁ vikkhāō vaṇiyanāyagō atthi । nāmēṇa iṁdadattō dhaṇēṇa dhaṇiyaṁ mahiḍuḍhīō ॥ 14 ॥ 5915 ॥

tassa'tthi rūviṇīē bhajāē sayalaguṇakalākaliyā । dhūyā aṇannasarisā rūvēṇa rai vva paccakkhā ॥ 15 ॥ 5916 ॥ 
nāmēṇa sīlavaī 'itthīrayaṇaṁ' ti bhaṇiyasupasiddhā । sā tassa kaē variyā sāyaradattēṇa puttassa ॥ 16 ॥ 5917 ॥ 
gaṇiē pahāṇalaggē samatthasāmaggisaṁjuē pattē । bahutūranināēhiṁ vivāhavaramaṁgalaṁ vihiyaṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 5918 ॥ 
sō tīē samaṁ ciṭui lalamāṇō vivihavisayabhōgēhiṁ । kīlai kīlāhiṁ tahā pariyariō mittavaggēhiṁ ॥ 18 ॥ 5919 ॥ 
aha annayā kayāī sēṭṭhī viddhattaṇammi saṁpattē । sayalamahāyaṇasahiō puraō naranāhamāīṇaṁ ॥ 19 ॥ 5920 ॥ 
vē yiyaputtaṁ niyayapaē appaṇā vi dhammammi । dēi savisēsacittaṁ, dāṇāīyaṁ pavattēi ॥ 20 ॥ 5921 ॥ 
pūēi dēvayāō, gurūṇa bhattiṁ payāsaē ahiyaṁ । annaṁ pi dhammakiñcaṁ karēi savvaṁ pi savisēsaṁ ॥ 21 ॥ 5922 ॥ 
ēvaṁ vaccatēhiṁ kahiṁ vi divasēhiṁ tassa sēṭuissa । vihipuvvayaṁ ca jāyaṁ maraṇaṁ niyayammi samayammi ॥ 22 ॥ 5923 ॥ 
sō vihu samuddadattō pālai taṁ kulakamāgayaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । aha annayā ya jāyā kallōlā tassa cittammi ॥ 23 ॥ 5924 ॥ 
"gaṁtūṇa dūradēsaṁtaramma viḍhavittu aibahuṁ davvaṁ । kārēmi kittaṇāī, dēmi jahicchāē taha dāṇaṁ" ॥ 24 ॥ 5925 ॥ 
iya ciṁtiūṇa cittē, savvaṁ sāhēi piyayamāē tayaṁ । sā vi hu jaṁpai 'piyayama ! tuha virahō dūsahō majjha' ॥ 25 ॥ 5926 ॥ 
bhaṇiyaṁ ca sēdviṇā vihu 'saccamiṇaṁ piyayamē ! tahavi ēyaṁ । kāyavyaṁ cēva mayā, jamhā aīuḍuyaṁ cittaṁ ' ॥ 26 ॥ 5927 ॥

tō mahayā kaṭṭēṇaṁ tīē parimanniyaṁ tayaṁ vayaṇaṁ । tēṇā'vi hu sāmaggī savvā kāuṁ samādattā ॥ 27 ॥ 5928 ॥ 
lēviṇu kayāṇayāiṁ cauvvihāī pi gaṇimamāīṇi । tattō mahāyaṇaṁ pi hu mēlittā akkhaē savvaṁ ॥ 28 ॥ 5929 ॥ 
puṇaravi gamaṇadiṇammiṁ bhaṇiyā sā piyayamā imaṁ tēṇa । 'savvaṁ gharamāīyaṁ sammaṁ pālēja pīīē ॥ 29 ॥ 5930 ॥ kiṁca-
savvāṇa vi gōravyaṁ daiē rakkhēja appayaṁ ēgaṁ । jamhā hu aidurakkhaṁ ēvaṁ ciya hōi nārīṇa' ॥ 30 ॥ 5931 ॥ 
'ēvaṁ, ti hōu piyayama !, kiṁtu tumē cēva jāi saha sōkkhaṁ । maha savvaṁ, tō sigdhaṁ puṇō vi niyadaṁsaṇaṁ dēja' ॥ 31 ॥ 5932 ॥ 
'āvissāmi lahuṁ ciya suṁdari ! mā ūsugā bhavējjāsi । jamhā hu imaṁ davvaṁ tuṭṭaī thōvavyaṇā'vi ॥ 32 ॥ 5933 ॥ 
aṇuvajraṇō u tēṇaṁ ahayaṁ vaccāmi annadēsammi । taṇumēttēṇa, kisōyari ! jattha tumaṁ, tattha maha cittaṁ ' ॥ 33 ॥ 5934 ॥

jaṁ kira tumaṁ pi niddhaya ! maē samaṁ ēttha calliō ajja । taṁ sukaḍhiyapayamajjhē saṁjāō sakkarākhēvō' ॥ 37 ॥ 5938 ॥

tattha ya kayāṇagāī daṁsaṁti mahāyaṇassa savvāī | bahuṇā lābhēṇa taō vikkīyāṁiṁ tahiṁ tēhiṁ ॥ 39 ॥ 5940 ॥

vittē vaddhāvaṇaē sīlamaī nisuṇiūṇa taṁ pattaṁ । niyapaipauttipucchaṇahēuṁ sā jāi tassa gihē ॥ 46 ॥ 5947 ॥

ēyāō chuṭṭiyavvaṁ, rakkhēyavvaṁ ca sīlavararayaṇaṁ । ēgāgiṇī ya ahayaṁ, tahā paviṭṭhā ya ēgatē ॥ 61 ॥ 5962 ॥ 
tā uttaraṁ payacchiya niggacchāmī dvayaṁ payattēṇa" । iya ciṁtiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ 'kassa ṇa ēvaṁ maṇē ruiyaṁ ॥ 62 ॥ 5963 ॥ 
sōmaṇōrahōci majjhavi cittammi saḍiō bhadda ! । kiṁtu avēlā ēsā, tā ējjasu paḍhamapaharammi ॥ 63 ॥ 5964 ॥ 
rayaṇīē tuma sigdhaṁ maṇōrahē jēṇa tujjha pūrēmi' । ' ēvaṁ ' ti hōu tēṇa vi. paḍivannē niggayā ēsā ॥ 64 ॥ 5965 ॥ 
niggaṁtūṇa ya ciṁtai “chuṭṭā haṁ tāva ēyapāsāō । saṁpai puṇa pāviṭṭu ēyaṁ pi hu sikkhavēmi " ti ॥ 65 ॥ 5966 ॥

paṭuviyaṁ sārayaraṁ maha jōggaṁ pāvajālayaṁ kiṁpi । tō appāvēha tayaṁ, sikkhavaha ya taṁ durāyāraṁ ' ॥ 67 ॥ 5968 ॥ 
iya jaṁpiyammi ēsō jā tīē sammuhaṁ nirikkhēi । tā sō vi hu tēṇēva ya kamēṇa vihalaṁghalīhūō ॥ 68 ॥ 5969 ॥ 
bhaṇai ya 'savvaṁ kāhaṁ, para kiṁtu karēhi tāva maha ruiyaṁ । icchāhi mamaṁ suṁdari ! kāuṁ supasannayaṁ cittaṁ ' ॥ 69 ॥ 5970 ॥ 
ēsā vi taō ciṁtai "itthaṁ pi hu uttaraṁ tayaṁ cēva । dēmi" taō paḍijaṁpai 'majjha vi ēvaṁ maṇē ruiyaṁ ॥ 70 ॥ 5971 ॥ 10
para kiṁtu bīyajāmē āgaṁtavyaṁ taē na saṁdēhō' । iya bhāṇiūṇa ēsā viṇiggayā tassa gēhāō ॥ 71 ॥ 5972 ॥ 
ciṁtai ya “imō vi tahēva mōhiō tā imaṁ pi sāsēmi । iya paribhāviya cittē vaccai maṁtissa pāsammi ॥ 72 ॥ 5973 ॥ 
1. bhāviūṇa kā0 ॥

tassa vi tahēva savvaṁ, jā akkhai tāva aha amacō vi । puvvakamēṇaṁ viddhō paṁcasarēṇaṁ sabāṇēhiṁ ॥ 73 ॥ 5974 ॥ 
tēṇa vi tahēva vr̥ttā sā vi hu taṁ cēva uttaraṁ dāuṁ । pabhaṇai 'taiē paharē ējaha rayaṇīē mama gēhē ' ॥ 74 ॥ 5975 ॥ 
maṁtī vi hu parituṭṭhō paḍivajjai tīē taṁ lahuṁ vayaṇaṁ । niggaṁtūṇaṁ sā vi hu baccai rāyassa pāsamma ॥ 75 ॥ 5976 ॥ 
gaṁtuṁ duvāradēsē paḍihāraṁ bhaṇai 'bhadda ! naranāhaṁ । jāṇāvēhi' taō sō navaipāē paḍiūṇa ॥ 76 ॥ 5977 ॥ 
1
jaṁpai 'sāmiya ! dārē ciṭui sēṭṭissa saṁtiyā bhajjā । kiṁcivi vinnaviumaṇā, tā viyaraha kō mamā''ēsō ? ' ॥ 77 ॥ 5978 ॥ 5
rannā vihu āiḍō paḍihārō 'bhadda ! lahu pavēsēhi' । tēṇa vi pavēsiyā sā vaccai naranāhapāsammi ॥ 78 ॥ 5979 ॥ 
divvavasēṇaṁ rāyā vi ciṭṭhaē vāsabhavaṇamajjhatthō । sā vi tahēva paviṭṭhā ēgatamayāṇamāṇī u ॥ 79 ॥ 5980 ॥ 
taha caiva ya vinnattō paḍhamaṁ aha baṁbhaṇassa kajrēṇa । bīyaṁ balāhiyassa u taiyaṁ puṇa maṁtiṇō hēuṁ ॥ 80 ॥ 5981 ॥ 
'sāmi ! jahā sō vippō na appaē majjha kaṁtapēsaviyaṁ । tattō balāhiyassa u kahiyaṁ tavbilasiyaṁ dēva ! ॥ 81 ॥ 5982 ॥ 
avahīriyā ya tēṇaṁ, na pāviyaṁ uttaraṁ maē kiṁpi । tattō maṁtisayāsaṁ, saṁpattā na ya parittāṇaṁ ॥ 82 ॥ 5983 ॥ 
tēṇā'vi kayaṁ sāmiya ! tattō tumhāṇa āgayā pāsē । tamhā tiṇha vi tāṇaṁ sikkhavaṇaṁ kuṇaha naranāha ! ' ॥ 83 ॥ 5984 ॥ 
tō rāyā taṁ daṭṭu tīsē rūvēṇa suḍu vimhaiō । sūrō vi hu mayaṇēṇaṁ viddhō tikkhāē bhallīē ॥ 84 ॥ 5985 ॥

bhaṇai ya ' tinni vi ēē niggahiūṇaṁ karēmi tuha ruiyaṁ । kiṁtu taē vi hu bhaddē ! maha maṇaiṭuṁ vihēyavvaṁ ' ॥ 85 ॥ 5986 ॥ 
aha jaṁpai sīlavaī 'sāmiya ! āisasu jaṁ maē kajaṁ' ।
bhaṇai ṇivō vi hu 'suṁdari ! tuha saṁgamalālasō ahayaṁ ॥ 86 ॥ 5987 ॥ 
sā vi huhiē bhāvai " hā divva ! hayāsa ! kiṁ taē ēyaṁ । maha rūvaṁ nimmaviyaṁ ahilasaṇīyaṁ bahunarāṇaṁ ॥ 87 ॥ । 5988 ॥ 
jē savyuttamakulavaṁsasaṁbhavā jē viḍhattajasapasarā । jēsiṁ paṇamaṁti sayā naranāhā paṇayasirakamalā ॥ 88 ॥ 58989 ॥ 
tē vihu kaha viddaviyā imēṇa pāvēṇa majjha rūvēṇa ? | hā hā ahō ! akajaṁ, aṇatthakhāṇī ahaṁ jāyā ॥ 89 ॥ 5990 ॥ 
ēvaṁviharāīṇa vi majjāyavilōyaṇammi maha rūvaṁ । jāyaṁ ahō ! akajaṁ, dhiddhī maha jammabhāvassa ॥ 90 ॥ 5991 ॥ 
hā divya ! pāva ! ṇigghiṇa ! kiṁ maha cittaṁ na yāṇasē taṁ si ? । jēṇa imē maha uvariṁ daḍhāṇurāyā taē vihiyā ॥ 91 ॥ 5992 ॥ 
jīvaṁtīē majjha sīlaṁ na hu kōvi khaṁḍaē niyamā । jai kōvi balāmōḍī karissaē tā marissāmi ॥ 92 ॥ 5993 ॥ 
vari aggimi pavēsō jalaṁtajālā kalāvakaliyammi । nō cēva sīlarayaṇassa khaṁḍaṇaṁ jujjaē kaha vi" ॥ 93 ॥ 5994 ॥ 
iya ciṁtatī bhaṇiyā raṇṇā 'kiṁ uttaraṁ na mē dēsi ?' । tō paccāgayacittā jaṁpai ēyārisaṁ vayaṇaṁ ॥ 94 ॥ 5995 ॥ 
'dēva ! na jaṁ jammē vihu maṇōrahāṇaṁ pi gōyarē āsi । laṁbhēṇa tassa majjha appā aiāulō jāō ॥ 95 ॥ 5996 ॥

tā dēva ! taē samayaṁ saṁgō amhārisīṇa sumiṇē vi । saṁbhavai jō na kaiya vi sō ajja uvaḍiō majjha ॥ 96 ॥ 5997 ॥ 
tā āvējjaha rayaṇīē carimajāmammi majjha gēhammi । jēṇaṁ maha tumhāṇa ya jāyai maṇavaṁchiyaṁ kajaṁ ॥ 97 ॥ 5998 ॥ 
ajaṁ ciya haṁ jāyā, ajjaṁ ciya puṇṇapāyavō phaliō । ajaṁ ciya sakayatthā, jaṁ tumhē kuṇaha atthittaṁ' ॥ 99 ॥ 5999 ॥ 
iya ēvamāiēhiṁ vayaṇēhiṁ raṁjiūṇa naranāhaṁ । vāsabhavaṇāō sigdhaṁ viṇiggayā taha gihāō vi ॥ 100 ॥ 6000 ॥ 
gaṁtuṁ niyadhavalaharē ciṁtai " kaha saṁgayaṁ imaṁ hōhī । kajaṁ aivisamataraṁ ? huṁ nāyaṁ asthi hu uvāō ॥ 101 ॥ 6001 ॥ 
ēsā maha maṁjūsā vakkhārayacauvibhūsiyā rammā । cautālayasaṁjuttā tīē pavēsittu savvē vi ॥ 102 ॥ 6002 ॥ 
dāūṇa tālayāī saṁjhērittā tahā siṁhaṁ savvaṁ । kāūṇa sēvittaṁ niyasīlaṁ tāva rakkhēmi ॥ 103 ॥ 6003 ॥ 
pacchā jaṁ
puṇa uciyaṁ hōhī taṁ caiva ēttha kāhāmi " । iya bhāviya hiyayammi savvaṁ saṁjhēraē gēhaṁ ॥ 104 ॥ 6004 ॥ 
pakkhiviya annagēhēsu dharai savvaṁ pi sunnayaṁ bhavaṇaṁ । ēvaṁ jāva viyālō pattō tā baṁbhaṇō ēi ॥ 105 ॥ 6005 ॥ 
phārīkayasiṁgārō taṁbōla - bilēvaṇāisusamiddhō । tā uḍiyā imā vi hu jhaḍatti aha sāgayaṁ kāuṁ ॥ 106 ॥ 6006 ॥ 
dinnaṁ ca āsaṇaṁ sē pāradvā pavaraṇhāṇasāmaggī । haviyavilittammi taō bhuṁjāvai bhōyaṇaṁ surasaṁ ॥ 107 ॥ 6007 ॥ 
pallaṁkammi nibēsai jāva ya tā jhatti khōṭṭiyaṁ dāraṁ । taṁ sōūṇaṁ ēsā sahasa tti samāulīhūyā ॥ 108 ॥ 6008 ॥ 
1. tubbhē pā0 kā0 ॥

tō pucchai sō vippō 'bhaddē ! kō ēsa dāradēsammi' । sā jaṁpai 'vippa ! imō balāhiō bīyapaharammi ॥ 109 ॥ 6009 ॥ 
āgacchai maha gēhē' paidiyahaṁ siṁghadattanāmō tti । tuha gōravakaraṇēṇaṁ, na jāṇiō jaṁtaō paharō' ॥ 110 ॥ 6010 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ ēsō bhayabhīō jāva jhatti saṁjāō । tō tīē saṁlattaṁ ' mā ētthaṁ kuṇasi kiṁpi bhayaṁ ॥ 111 ॥ 6011 ॥ 
jāvuttaraṁ payacchiya kiṁcivi pēsēmi ajamahamēyaṁ । tā ētthaṁ prāhi khaṇaṁ maṁjūsāmajjhayārammi' ॥ 112 ॥ 6012 ॥ 
tō uḍiuṁ paviḍō ēsō vakkhārayammi paḍhamammi । ḍhakkēūṇa kavāḍaṁ tīē taō tālayaṁ dinnaṁ ॥ 113 ॥ 6013 ॥ 
ēttō balāhiyassa vi gaṁtuṁ ugghāiē kavāḍāī । tassa vi tahēva vihiyaṁ ātitthamaō visēsēṇa ॥ 114 ॥ 6014 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi ḍhakkābhāyaṇasaddēṇa dōnni paharā u । jā vajraṁtī tāva ya dārammi samāgaō maṁtī ॥ 115 ॥ 6015 ॥ 
puṭṭē balāhiēṇa vi, tīē vi tahēva tassa akkhāyaṁ । sō vi hu bhayasaṁbhaṁtō chūḍhō vakkhāraē bīē ॥ 116 ॥ 6016 ॥ 
ēttō ya subuddhissa vi savvaṁ karaṇijjayaṁ kayaṁ tīē । jāva taō sahasa ciya pavajiō taiyajāmō vi ॥ 117 ॥ 6017 ॥ 
ētthaṁtaramma pattō rāyā kayavajvēsasiṁgārō । nīlaṁbarapāvaraṇō tamāladalasarisakhaggadharō ॥ 118 ॥ 6018 ॥ 
jā āhaṇēi dāraṁ tāva subuddhī vi pucchaē 'bhaddē ! | kō ēsa dāradēsē ?' tō ēsā saṁbhamubhaṁtā ॥ 119 ॥ 6019 ॥ 
pabhaṇai 'maṁtigaṇuttama ! ēsa cautthammi ēi paharammi । maha gēhammi narēṁdō tā jāyaṁ dugdharḍa ēyaṁ ॥ 120 ॥ 6020 ॥ 
1. gēhē balāhiō siṁgha pā0 ॥ 2. sō kā0 ॥ 3. jāyai du° jē0 ॥

5
para kiṁtu mā bhaējjaha, ēttha ya maṁjūsiyāē paṁvisaraha । jēṇuttarēṇa kēṇa vi ēvaṁ pēsēmi naranāhaṁ ' ॥ 121 ॥ 6021 ॥ 
tō taiyammiṁ vakkhārayammi ghattēvi tāliō maṁtī । aigaruyagauravēṇaṁ pavēsaē jhatti naranāhaṁ ॥ 122 ॥ 6022 ॥ 
tassa vi jā ātitthaṁ bahugōravagabbhiṇaṁ samādattaṁ । tā puvvamēva saṁkēyāviyā āgayā dārē ॥ 123 ॥ 6023 ॥ 
sīlamaīē sāsū sā jaṁpai 'putti ! bahuē ! maha dāraṁ । ugghāḍēhi lahuṁ ciya' tō pucchai naravarō 'bhaddē ! ॥ 124 ॥ 6024 ॥ 
kā ēsā dārammiṁ puṇō puṇō kiṁpi jhakhaē vayaṇaṁ ? ' । tīē vi hu paḍibhaṇiyaṁ 'dēva ! imā sāsuyā majjha ॥ 125 ॥ 6025 ॥ 
ṇicaṁ pi ēi ēttiyavēlāē gihassa sōhaṇaṭṭāē । tā jā pēsēmi imaṁ ālappālaṁ kimavi bhaṇiuṁ ॥ 126 ॥ 6026 ॥ 
tā tubbhē maṁjūsāē ḍāha khaṇamēttayaṁ ahaṁ jāva । pēsēmi kiṁpi dāūṇa uttaraṁ bīyagēhammi ॥ 127 ॥ 6027 ॥ 
annaha jai jāṇissai kahamavi ēsā u vaiyaraṁ ēyaṁ । tō maha tumhāṇaṁ ciya dāhī ayasaṁ na saṁdēhō ॥ 128 ॥ 6028 ॥ 
kijjau kajaṁ mā vā avavāō dūsahō bhavē ēttha । jaṁmhā lōyammi imaṁ paḍhaṁti āhāṇayaṁ payaḍaṁ ॥ 129 ॥ 6029 ॥ 
“phuṭṭau bhāṇaṁ mā vā mārai ṭaṇakāraō aō dēva !" । hōha khaṇaṁ maṁjūsāē' taṁ nisāmittu tō rāyā ॥ 130 ॥ 6030 ॥ 10
pavisai cautthavakkhārayammi ēsā vi tālayaṁ dāuṁ । saṁjhēriya savisēsaṁ gihaṁ, taō uggaē sūrē ॥ 131 ॥ 6031 ॥ 
laggā akkaṁdēḍaṁ, taṁ sōuṁ sāsuyāē sā puṭṭhā। 'kiṁ puttē ! ruyasi tumaṁ ?' sā rōvaṁtī imaṁ bhaṇai ॥ 132 ॥ 6032 ॥

<pb n="715"/>

'tubbhaṁ suyassa abē ! kahiyā battā u tassa mittēṇaṁ' । taṁ sōūṇaṁ sā vi hu akkaṁdai garuyasaddēṇa ॥ 133 ॥ 6033 ॥ 
tīē saddēṇa taja pucchaṁti samōsiyāiṇō savvē । tāṇa vi tahēva akkhaṛa, tē vi hu sayaṇāṇa akkhati ॥ 134 ॥ 6034 ॥ 
tattō savvē sayaṇā kuṇati mēlāvayaṁ gihassa vahiṁ । 'apputtaō' tti kāuṁ milaṁti annattha prāṇammi ॥ 135 ॥ । 6035 ॥ 
ālōciūṇa tattō vaccaṁti narēṁdapāyamūlammi । jā ṇatthi ṇivō gēhē pauttimavi muṇai nō kōvi ॥ 136 ॥ 6036 ॥ 
tā jaṁti maṁtipāsē, maṁtī vi hu tāva na'tthi gēhammi। na ya vattā vihu najjai, tō jaṁti balāhiyagihammi ॥ 137 ॥ 6037 ॥ 
tassa vi ya sa ēva gamō jā tā vaccaṁti kumarapāsammi । āsaṇadāṇāīyaṁ karēi kumarō vi paḍivattiṁ ॥ 138 ॥ 6038 ॥ 
jaṁpēi tō kumarō 'dhannō haṁ jēṇa majjha gēhammi । ajja sayaṁ saṁpattaṁ mahāyaṇaṁ rāyagōravvaṁ ॥ 139 ॥ 6039 ॥ 
bhaṇai ya mahāyaṇaṁ tō 'daṭuvvā kumara ! tumha pāya tti । hōṁti sayā amhāṇaṁ, visēsakajaṁ paraṁ aja' ॥ 140 ॥ 6040 ॥ 
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ 'vinnavaha jahicchiyaṁ ahaṁ jēṇa । saṁpāḍēmi asēsaṁ' vinnavai mahāyaṇaṁ tattō ॥ 141 ॥ 6041 ॥ 
'aja puranāyagassa u sēṭuissa samuddadattanāmassa । dēsaṁtarajattāē gayassa vattā samāyāyā ॥ 142 ॥ 6042 ॥ 
lōyācāranimittaṁ pi tassa pavisāmu kumara ! nō gēhē । jēṇaṁ aputtaō sō tā jōyaha tassa pahu ! gēhaṁ ॥ 143 ॥ 6043 ॥ 
jēṇa pavisittu gēhē lōiyakiccaṁ karēmu savvaṁ pi' । kumarēṇa vi tō bhaṇiyaṁ 'kima vinnappa majjha ॥ 144 ॥ 6044 ॥ 
1. tumhaṁ su° jē0 । tujjhaṁ su kā0 ॥ 
<pb n="716"/>

tāyammi vijamāṇē ? ahigārō ēsa tāyapāyāṇaṁ' | jaṁpai mahāyaṇaṁ tō ' na dīsaē aja dēvō' ti ॥ 145 ॥ 6045 ॥ 
'jai na vi dīsai tāō, tō vinnattī karēha maṁtissa' । tēhiṁ vi bhaṇiyaṁ 'sō vi hu na dīsaē' bhaṇai tō kumarō ॥ 146 ॥ 6046 ॥ 
'karaṇammitāyamuddāsamanniyaṁ tō balāhiyaṁ bhaṇaha' । bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ 'taṁ pi hu mannēmō tāṇa pāsatthaṁ ॥ 147 ॥ 6047 ॥ 
tē tinniva kēṇā'vi hu kajēṇēgāgiṇō gayā mannē | jamhā hu pariyaṇō vi hu na jāṇaē kōvi tabvattaṁ ॥ 148 ॥ 6048 ॥ 
tā kumara ! na kāyavyaṁ gavēsaṇaṁ tāṇa tāva mā kahavi । nāūṇa kōvi sattū ciṁtējja amaṁgalaṁ sahasā ॥ 149 ॥ 6049 ॥ 
tā tumbhē ciya ēvaṁ vinnatti amha sāmi ! sāhēha' । iya bhaṇiē kumarō vi hu pēsai niyaē tahiṁ purisē ॥ 150 ॥ 6050 ॥ 
tē bi tahiṁ gatūṇaṁ majjhaṁ gēhassa jā nirūrvēti । tā pēcchaṁti na kiṁcivi tattō kumarassa sārhēti ॥ 151 ॥ 6051 ॥ 
'sāmiya ! tattha gihammi bārasahatthō bhamēi akkhaliō । mōttūṇa mahapamāṇaṁ ēkkaṁ ciya tattha maṁjūraṁ ॥ 152 ॥ 6052 ॥ 
annaṁ na kiṁci dīsai' iya bhaṇiē jāi taṁttha tō kumarō । jāva na kiṁcivi pēcchai, tā pucchai sēṭṭhiṇiṁ ēvaṁ ॥ 153 ॥ 6053 ॥ 
'kiṁ gēhē tuha kiṁcivi na dīsaē ?' jaṁpaē imā 'kumara ! । taiya ciya savvaṁ pi hu saṁjhērittā gaō sēṭṭhī ॥ 154 ॥ 6054 ॥ 
mōttūṇa majjha jōggaṁ bhōyaṇa - acchāyaṇāiyaṁ annaṁ । uviyaṁ na kiṁci gēhē mōttūṇēkkaṁ tu maṁjūsa ॥ 155 ॥ 6055 ॥ 
jā accaṁtamahallā saṁjhērēuṁ na tīraē kahavi । ēttha vi ya tālayāī dāūṇa sayaṁ gaō sēṭṭhī ॥ 156 ॥ 6056 ॥ 
1
1. rūvaṁti jē0 kā0 ॥ 2 tattha kumarō sō jē0 ॥ । 3. tō nāsti kā0 ॥ । 4. sēṭṭiṇī jē0 kā0 ॥

jaṁtēṇaṁ kuṁciyāō vi nīyāō samappiyāō nō majjha । iya nāuṁ kumara ! tumaṁ jaṁ juttaṁ hōi taṁ kuṇasu' ॥ 157 ॥ 6057 ॥ 
kumarēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ 'gēhaha ēkvaṁ imaṁ tu maṁjūsa । sēsaṁ dhannāīyaṁ ēīē bhōyaṇaṁ muyaha' ॥ 158 ॥ 6058 ॥ 
'āēsō ' tti bhaṇittā purisā gēṇhittu jaṁti maṁjūsa । 'kiṁ hōhī ēttha ?' taō kōḍēṇaṁ jāi lōgō vi ॥ 159 ॥ 6059 ॥ 
rāyaṁgaṇammi nēuṁ vēttu bhajēttu tālayaṁ paḍhamaṁ । ugghārḍēti kavāḍaṁ jā tattō jhatti nīsariō ॥ 160 ॥ 6060 ॥ 
siyapharaharaṁtajannōbaittaparighōlamāṇa kaṁḍillō । diṭṭhō sō vippasuō kumarēṇaṁ pucchiō tattō ॥ 161 ॥ 6061 ॥ 
'hā vippaputta ! kimiyaṁ mahadabhuyaṁ dīsaē jaō ēttha । kattō tumaṁ paviḍō ? kiṁ vā vihu kāraṇaṁ ? kahasu' ॥ 162 ॥ 6062 ॥ 
sō jaṁpai ‘acchērayatarayaṁ pēcchihiha, aggaō niyaha । kanjē puṇa jāṇissaha, nirūviē agga ōhuttē ' ॥ 163 ॥ 6063 ॥ 
tō bītālayaṁ pi hu bhaṁjittā jā vihāḍiyaṁ arariṁ । tā varamuddālakiyamaha niyahi balāhiyaṁ tattha ॥ 164 ॥ 6064 ॥ 
tattō pucchaṁti tayaṁ 'ahaha ! kimēyaṁ balāhiya ! auvvaṁ ? ' । sō bhaṇai 'apuvvayaraṁ puraō pēcchēha jōēuṁ' ॥ 165 ॥ 6065 ॥ 
tattō taiyakavāḍaṁ jāvugdhāḍaṁti tālayaṁ bhēttuṁ । tā tattō niggacchai maṁtī lajjāē namiyasi ॥ 166 ॥ 6066 ॥ 
1
taṁ daṇaṁ kumarō jaṁpai 'hā maṁti ! sāhasaṁ kimiyaṁ ?' | maṁtī vi āha 'puraō jōēha taō kahissāmi' ॥ 167 ॥ 6067 ॥ 
tattō utthayaṁ piha bhaṁjittā tālayaṁ vihāṁḍiṁti । jāva kavāḍaṁ tāva ya viṇiggaō naravariṁdō vi ॥ 168 ॥ 6068 ॥

taṁ daddūṇa'bhui kumarō 'hā tāya ! tāya ! kiṁ ēyaṁ ? । kēṇā 'vi aṇajēṇaṁ vihiyamavatthaṁtaraṁ garuyaṁ ॥ 169 ॥ 6069 ॥ 
tā sōhēha niruttaṁ jēṇa tayaṁ pāvakāriṇaṁ dahuṁ । ajjēva sahatthēṇaṁ karēmi sīsēṇa parihīṇaṁ' ॥ 170 ॥ 6070 ॥

taṁ kōvavasapphuraṁtaṁ kumaraṁ daṭṭuṇa jaṁpaē rāyā । ' mā putta ! kuṇasu ēyaṁ, kiṁtu vibhāvēhi paramatthaṁ ॥ 171 ॥ 6071 ॥ 
tattō uvavisa nivō sahāē sīhāsaṇammi rammammi । sayalanivavaggasahiō puvyamuhō kuṁmarasaṁjuttō ॥ 172 ॥ 6072।
āṇavai annamaṁtī jaha 'mahayā gōravēṇa āṇēhi । taṁ sēṭṭiṇi ihaṁ bhō ! jēṇaṁ sāhēmi nīsēsa' ॥ 173 ॥ 6073 ॥ 
tattō paṇamaṁtasirō maṁtī ‘āēsa' mii pabhāsēuṁ । vaccai samuddadattassa sēṭuiṇō maṁdirē pavarē ॥ 174 ॥ 6074 ॥ 
taṁ daṭuṁ sīlavaī sahasā abbhuṭuiūṇa viyarēi । maṁtissa pavaramāsaṇamuvabisai imō vi tattha taō ॥ 175 ॥ 6075 ॥ 
uvaviṭummi suhāsaṇagayammi maṁtimmi bhaṇai sīlavaī । 'bhaṇaha jamāgamaṇapa ōyaṇaṁ' ti jaṁpēi tō maṁtī ॥ 176 ॥ 6076 ॥ 
'bhaddē ! namaṁtasāmaṁtamaulimaṇimaliṇī ōrukamavīḍhō । hakkārai taṁ rāyā sagōrakhaṁ, ēha tā sigdhaṁ ॥ 177 ॥ 6077 ॥ 
sōūṇa vayaṇamēyaṁ cittammi abhīyamāṇasā jāi । naravaiṇō pāsammiṁ taṁ daddr̥ṇuṭṭiō rāyā ॥ 178 ॥ 6078 ॥ 
viyarāvē varāsaṇamuvavisai imā vi tattha parituḍā । uvaviṭṭhāē tīē paṇamaī rāyā saparivārō ॥ 179 ॥ 6079 ॥

sāmiṇi ! mahāsaīō kuddhāō jamālayammi naitiṁ dhuvaṁ । ahavā vi diṁti sāvaṁ, ahavā annaṁ aṇatthaṁ ti ॥ 181 ॥ 6081 ॥ 
kāūṇa'mha pasāyaṁ tumaē dinnaṁ tu jīviyaṁ ajja । tā duvvilasiyamēyaṁ majjhaṁ savvaṁ khamējāsu ॥ 182 ॥ 6082 ॥ 
na puṇō vi hu avarāhaṁ suviṇē vi mahāsaī tuhaṁ kāhaṁ ' । ii jaṁpatammi nivammi dēi ēsā vi āsīsaṁ ॥ 183 ॥ 6083 ॥ 
'jīvasu tumaṁ narīsara ! ākappaṁ jāva kuṇasu taha rajaṁ । akkhaya-avyayadēhō pālitō sayaladharaṇiyalaṁ ॥ 184 ॥ 6084 ॥ 
dēvāṇa pasāēṇaṁ, māhappēṇaṁ tahā gurūṇaṁ ca । viddhāṇāsīsāē mahāsaīṇaṁ ca tēēṇaṁ ॥ 185 ॥ 6085 ॥ 
bharahō iva sagarō iva asēsariddhīhiṁ naṁda rijjha tumaṁ । jō ēvaṁ dhammaparō, mahāsaīṇaṁ ca taha bhattō ॥ 186 ॥ 6086 ॥ 
tā uvavisasu narīsara ! karēhi mā saṁbhamaṁ aimahaṁta' । iya bhaṇiō naranāhō ubaviṭṭhō niyayāṇammi ॥ 187।6087 ॥
