aṭṭhāhiya jiṇabhavaṇihiṁ kijahiṁ dīṇā'ṇāhaṁ dāṇaiṁ dijahiṁ ।
saṁdhu asēsu vi sakkārijai, sattu vi āgau navi vārijai ॥ 203 ॥ 6103 ॥ 
annu vi kiṁcivi jaṁ jasu jōgauṁ, taṁ tasu dijai vatthu samaggauṁ ।
iya annu vi kiu kiṁpi jē jāṇiu vaddhāvaṇauṁ asēsu sa vāṇiu ॥ 204 ॥ 6104 ॥ 
vattē baddhāvaṇa savyamma visajjiyammi lōgammi । kayabhōyaṇāvasāṇē gēhaṁ saṁbhālaē sēṭṭhī ॥ 205 ॥ 6105 ॥ 
puṭṭhā ya taō ghariṇī 'kiṁ bhaddē ! kiṁci kiṁci na niēmi ?' । sā jaṁpai 'nāha ! imaṁ ciṭṭhaī savvaṁ pi annattha' ॥ 206 ॥ 6106 ॥ 
pucchai ya tayaṁ ēsō 'suṁdari ! kiṁ kāraṇaṁ tayaṁ uviyaṁ । annattha ? ' taō sā vi hu bhaṇai 'mahallā kahā ēsā ॥ 207 ॥ 6107 ॥ 
kāuṁ majjha pasāyaṁ uvavisasu suhāsaṇammi kaṁta ! tumaṁ । jēṇa kahēmi asēsaṁ vittaṁtaṁ ēttha jaṁ vittaṁ ' ॥ 208 ॥ 6108 ॥ 
tattō suhāsaṇammi sēṭṭhī uvavisai tassa suṇaṇatthaṁ । namiuṁ sīlavaī vi hu akkhaṛa 'suṇa ramaṇa ! paramatthaṁ ॥ 209 ॥ 6109 ॥ 
taiyā vijayāē tuma appāhēuṁ mamaṁ bahupayāraṁ । siddhāviō si sāmiya ! tattō ahayaṁ tuhāēsaṁ ॥ 210 ॥ 6110 ॥ 
kuṇamāṇī dhammaparā jiṇa - jaipūyāē jāva ciṭṭhāmi । tā kēttiē vi kālē tuha mittō ēttha saṁpattī' ॥ 211 ॥ 6111 ॥ 
iccāi niravasēsaṁ akkhāyaṁ pucchaṇāya pajaṁtaṁ । sōūṇa imaṁ sēṭṭhī na māi niyayammi aṁgammi ॥ 212 ॥ 6112 ॥ 
1. jaṁ jē0 ॥ 2. i annaṁ pi savvattha jē0 ॥

bhaṇai ya 'taṁ cēva piē ! majjha vi āṇaṁ payaccha nissaṁkaṁ । jā ēvaṁguṇakaliyā mahāsaī savvajaṇapayaḍā' ॥ 213 ॥ 6113 ॥

ēvaṁ tu khaṇaṁ ēvaṁ uttara - paccattarēhiṁ ciṭṭhēuṁ । 'savvatsa vi sāmittaṁ tuha dinnaṁ' jaṁpaē sēṭṭhī ॥ 215 ॥ 6115 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca baṭṭamāṇē kālē susāvagattaṇaparāṇaṁ । aha annayā kayāī purisēōgēṇa vinnattaṁ ॥ 216 ॥ 6116 ॥ 
' vaddhāvijjasi sāmiya ! ētthaṁ kusumāgārammi ujjāṇē । bahusamaṇasaṁghasahiō samōsaḍhō tiyasakayapūō ॥ 217 ॥ 6117 ॥ 
nāmēṇa sīlasūrī sūrīvarasatthakaṇayakasavaṭṭō । bhavvāraviṁdabhāṇū nāṇacaukkaṇa dippatō' ॥ 218 ॥ 6118 ॥ 
āṇiūṇa sēṭṭī sīlamaīsaṁjuō pahaṭṭamaṇō । dēi pabhūyaṁ davyaṁ vaddhāvayapavarapurisassa ॥ 219 ॥ 6119 ॥ 
kāūṇa ya sāmaggiṁ bahuparivārēṇa parigaō sēṭṭhī । sūripayavaṁdaṇatthaṁ pattō kusumāgarujjāṇē ॥ 220 ॥ 6120 ॥ 
paṁcavihābhigamēṇaṁ pavisai sūrissa pāyamūlammi | vaṁdittu muṇivariṁda sēsē vi ya baṁdiuṁ sāhū ॥ 221 ॥ 6121 ॥ 
uvavisa uciyāṇē sūrī vi hu kahai tō jiṇuddiddhaṁ । dhammaṁ sivasuhamūlaṁ saṁsārasamuddanittharaṇaṁ ॥ 222 ॥ 6122 ॥ 
nāūṇa kahatarayaṁ sīlamaī bhaṇai paṇayasirakamalā ।
'sāmiya ! kimannajammē maē kayaṁ ? kiṁca maha uvariṁ ॥ 223 ॥ 6123 ॥

" ētthēva jaṁbudī vē dīvē ēravayavāsamajjhami । atthi puraṁ supasiddhaṁ divitilayaṁ nāma guṇakaliyaṁ ॥ 1 ॥ 6125 ॥ 
taṁ paripālai rāyā varanayaraṁ tilayasuṁdarō nāma । ninnāsiya aritimirō sūrō vva payāvaparikaliō ॥ 2 ॥ 6126 ॥ 
tassa'tthi varā dēvī supasiddhā rayaṇasuṁdarī nāma । ēttō ya tammi nivasai sivabhūīnāma purasēṭṭī ॥ 3 ॥ 6127 ॥ 
tarasa ya pavarā bhajjā atthi pasiddhā mahāsirī nāma । tīē ya samaṁ bhōē bhuṁjai puṇṇajiē sēṭṭhī ॥ 4 ॥ 6128 ॥ 
aha annayā kayāī rayaṇīē pacchimammi jāmammi । pēcchaī ya suhapasuttā mahāsirī suhayaraṁ sumiṇaṁ ॥ 5 ॥ 6129 ॥ 
jaha kira maha ucchaṁgē caṁdakalāsaṁjuō harikisōrō । līlāē uvaviṭṭō sasaṁkakaraniyarasaṁkāsō ॥ 6 ॥ 6130 ॥ 
 ॥ 
dahūṇa tayaṁ sumiṇaṁ jaṁbhāyaṁtī samuṭṭiyā ēsā । sāhai paiṇō gaṁtuṁ taṁ sumiṇaṁ harisiyā saṁtī ॥ 7 ॥ 6131 ॥ 
'sōmiya! sīhakisōrō ucchaṁgatthō kalā ya caṁdassa । jayalamiṇaṁ daṭṭuṇaṁ, sahasā haṁ ajja paḍibuddhā ॥ 8 ॥ 6132 ॥ 
tā kiṁ maha kallāṇaṁ hōhī ēyassa pavarasumiṇassa ?' । ēsō vi bhaṇai 'dēiē ! mannē tuha juvalayaṁ hōhī ॥ 9 ॥ 6133 ॥ 
jaṁ kira sīhakisōrō diṭṭhō taṁ tujjha hōhiī puttō । jaṁ puṇa caṁdassa kalā, taṁ hōhī suṁdarā dhūyā ॥ 10 ॥ 6134 ॥

vibaddhāvayaṁ karē sēṭṭhī pahaṭumuhakamalō । pattē ya nāmakaraṇassa vāsarē kuṇai tō nāmē ॥ 13 ॥ 6137 ॥ 
kumarassa sīhasēṇō nāmaṁ vihiyaṁ samatthajaṇapuraō । kannāē puṇō nāmaṁ vihiyaṁ siricaṁdalēha tti ॥ 14 ॥ 6138 ॥ 
baddhatāī kamēṇaṁ, dōnni vi pattāiṁ jōvvaṇabharammi । nāūṇa taō jaṇaō kumaraṁ pariṇāvaē tuṭṭō ॥ 15 ॥ 6139 ॥ 
siridharasēṭṭhissa suyaṁ dēvasiriṁ nāma kannayaṁ pavaraṁ । kannāē puṇō jōggaṁ nirūvaē jāva pavaravaraṁ ॥ 16 ॥ 6140 ॥ 
tāva'nnayā ya sēṭṭhī ujjāṇē kāraṇēṇa aiyāō । tattha ya puvvapaviddhaṁ caṁdappuranāyagaṁ sēḍiṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 6141
niyai mahēsaradattaṁ puvyaṁ ciya vihiyamittayābhāvaṁ । tattō miliyā dōnni vi karēṁti ēvaṁ samullāvaṁ ॥ 18 ॥ 6142 ॥ 
bhaṇai mahēsaradattō 'sēṭṭhi ! tuhaṁ atthi jā varā dhūyā । nāmēṇa caṁdalēhā, sā dijau majjha puttassa ॥ 19 ॥ 6143 ॥ 
nāmēṇa saṁkhadēvassa sayalavinnāṇakalasamaggassa' । sēṭṭī vi bhaṇai 'niddhaya ! kimajuttaṁ hōu ēvaṁ ' ti ॥ 20 ॥ 6144 ॥ 
tattō ya haṭutuṭṭā dōnni vi vaccaṁti niyayagēhēsu । ēttō sivabhūissa vi kaṇiṭṭabhāyā dharō nāma ॥ 21 ॥ 6142 ॥ 
sō kaṇayapurammi gaō uttariō tattha naṁdimittassa । sēṭṭhissa gihē tēṇa ya saha jāyā aighaṇā mēttī ॥ 22 ॥ 6143 ॥ 10
tēṇa ya tatthaṭhiēṇaṁ diṭṭhō puttō u naṁdimittassa । guṇa-rūva - jōvvaṇadharō guṇadharō nāma supasiddhō ॥ 23 ॥ 6144 ॥ 
taṁ dahuṁ tuṭṭēṇaṁ “jōgō ēsō” tti caṁdalēhāē । iya bhāviūṇa dinnā sayamēva ya tēṇa sā dhūyā ॥ 24 ॥ 6145 ॥ 
1. nāma jē0 ॥ 2. sirihara jē0 kā0 ॥

iyarēhiṁ vi hihiṁ sammaṁ aha sā paḍicchiyā kannā । ēttō ya siṁhasēṇassa asthi caṁpāgaō mittō ॥ 25 ॥ 6146 ॥ 
nāmēṇa sūradēvō tēṇa ya diṭṭhā kahiṁci sā kannā । tīē ya jōvvaṇammi akkhittō sō taō ahiyaṁ ॥ 26 ॥ 6147 ॥ 
bhaṇiō ya siṁhasēṇō tēṇaṁ abbhatthiūṇa jaha 'mitta ! |
dēhi mama niyayabhagiṇi' tēṇa vi bahumāṇajuttēṇaṁ ॥ 27 ॥ 6148 ॥ 
'abbharahiō' tti kāuṁ dinnā bahumāṇa - nēhajuttēṇaṁ । sō vi huṁ caṁpa gaṁtuṁ kahēi savvaṁ pi jaṇayāṇaṁ ॥ 28 ॥ 6149 ॥ 
ēttō ya mahasirīē guṇamālānāma varasahī sā ya । pariṇīyā inbhēṇaṁ caṁdaṇanāmēṇa kaṇayapurē ॥ 29 ॥ 6150 ॥ 
tāṇaṁ ca atthi puttō guṇacaṁdō nāma guṇagaṇāvāsō । tassa kaē guṇamālā mahāsiriṁ jāyaē kannaṁ ॥ 30 ॥ 6151 ॥ 
tīya vi 'sahi' tti kāuṁ bhaṇiyaṁ 'hala ! sahi ! kimēttha battavyaṁ ? |
dinnā hu ṇicchaēṇaṁ uṭusu taṁ kuṇasu sāmaggiṁ' ॥ 31 ॥ 6152 ॥ 
tō jāi imā hiṭṭhā niyaē nayarammi kuṇai sāmaggiṁ । sāhittu imaṁ savvaṁ niyapaiṇō caṁdaṇinbhassa ॥ 32 ॥ 6153 ॥ 
ēvaṁ savvavarāṇa vi gēhēsu varā vivāhasāmaggī । parivaḍḍhiuṁ pavattā, āḍhavaī mahāsirī vi taō ॥ 33 ॥ 6154 ॥ 
sēṭṭhī vi hu sivabhūī hakkārittāṇa pavarajōisiyaṁ । sōhāvai varalaggaṁ bhāuyamāīṇa pañcakkhaṁ ॥ 34 ॥ 6155 ॥ 
1. dēha mama jē0 ॥

niyayā'bhippāēṇaṁ jāṇēi dharō maē vidinnāē । kannāē laggamiṇaṁ, ēvaṁ sēsāṇi vi muṇaṁti ॥ 35 ॥ 6156 ॥ 
tattō tuṭumaṇāī jāṇāvaṁtī ṇiyāṇa varayāṇa । tē vihu tammi diṇammi saṁvahiuṁ iṁti tattha purē ॥ 36 ॥ 6157 ॥ 
pavisaṁti cauṇhaṁ pi hu taṇayā vaddhāvayā samaṁ cēva । vaddhāvaṁti ya sēṭṭhi 'samāgayā jannayatta' tti ॥ 37 ॥ 6158 ॥ 
baddhāvayapurisāṇaṁ juyalacaukkaṁ niēvi tō sēḍḍī । acaṁtaṁ vimhaiō cittammi viyakkaē ēvaṁ ॥ 38 ॥ 6159 ॥ 
"haṁta ! kimēyaṁ dīsai maha'bbhuyaṁ, jēṇa jannayattāō । cattāri samāyāō, varasēṭṭhisuyāṇa taṇiyāō ॥ 39 ॥ 6160 ॥ 5
ēkkassēva puṇa maē dinnā kannā, aō kimannāō ?" । jāvēvaṁ pariciṁtai tā bhaṇiō bhāuṇā namiuṁ ॥ 40 ॥ 6161 ॥ 
'kiṁ na vi ajavi dijai ṭhāṇaṁ kira bhāi ! jannayattāē ?' |
sō bhai 'kaha cauṇhaṁ ṭhāṇamahaṁ saṁpayacchāmi ?' ॥ 41 ॥ 6162 ॥ 
jaṁpai imō vi 'ēkkassa cēva dinnā maē kimannāō ?' । jā dēi uttaraṁ na vi aja vi lahubhāuṇō sēṭṭhī ॥ 42 ॥ 6163 ॥ 
tā ēvaṁ ciya bhaṇiō ēsō sahasa tti putta - puttīhiṁ । tō jāṇiyaparamatthō jaṁpai sēṭṭī vi vayaṇamiṇaṁ ॥ 43 ॥ 6164 ॥ 
'kiṁ tunbhēhiṁ na nāō, ahayaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ karēmāṇō ? ' । iyarēhiṁ vi paḍibhaṇiyaṁ 'nāō, para kiṁtu na vi nāyaṁ ॥ 44 ॥ 6165 ॥ 
jaha annēhiṁ vi dinnā kannā ēsa tti nēya amhāṇaṁ । gōttammi samāyārō jaṁ kuṁkumapattiyālihaṇaṁ ॥ 45 ॥ 6166 ॥ 
hakkāraṇamēttaṁ ciya taṁ puṇa dinnaṁ asēsaēhiṁ pi । jā puṇa tuha sāmaggī sā nāyā appavisaya' tti ॥ 46 ॥ 6167 ॥ 
iya jaṁpiyammi tēhiṁ sēṭṭhī ciṁtāurō daḍhaṁ jāō । pucchai 'tā kahamēyaṁ, ēva liē kīraū kajaṁ ? ॥ 47 ॥ 6168 ॥

<pb n="727"/>

kaha maha vayaṇaṁ aliyaṁ hōu ? imāṇi vi bhaṇati sarisamiṇaṁ' । ēvaṁ vayaṇavirōhō saṁjāō aha cauṇhaṁ pi ॥ 48 ॥ 6168 ॥ 
ēvaṁvihammiya taō vayaṇavirōhammi vaṭṭamāṇammi । miliō asēsasayaṇō ṇa ya sō ṇiccāliuṁ tarai ॥ 49 ॥ 6149 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca mahavivāē vaṭṭaṁtē kannagā imaṁ sōuṁ । ciṁtai " hā ! kaha jāō haṁta vivāō kuṭuṁbassa ॥ 50 ॥ 6150 ॥ 
tā saṁvarēmi ēyaṁ vivāyamahamappayaṁ viṇāsēuṁ " । iya ciṁtiya ṇiggacchai gēhāō maraṇakayacittā ॥ 51 ॥ 6151 ॥ 
“ubbaṁdhaṇaṁ vihēmi" tti ciṁtiuṁ jāva jāi ujjāṇē । tā pēcchai varasūriṁ dhammaṁ lōyāṇa kahayaṁtaṁ ॥ 52 ॥ 6152 ॥ 
taṁ daddr̥ṇaṁ ciṁtai “dhannā ēē mahāṇubhāva tti । mūlāō jēhiṁ cattō ēsō visayāṇa saṁgō tti ॥ 53 ॥ 6153 ॥ 
visayāsattāṇa puṇō nāṇārūvāṇi hōti dukkhāṇi । jaha majjha cēva jāyaṁ, ēyaṁ asamaṁjasaṁ savvaṁ ॥ 54 ॥ 6154 ॥ 
tā ēyāṇaṁ pāē vaṁdāmiṁ dukkhaṇiggahasamatthē । pucchāmi ya jaṁ uciyaṁ" iya ciṁtiya jāi gurupāsē ॥ 55 ॥ 6155 ॥ 
vaṁdittā viṇaṇaṁ uvaviṭṭhā bhattinibbharā dhaṇiyaṁ । jā kira pucchai tāva ya guruṇā muṇiūṇa nāṇāō ॥ 56 ॥ 6156 ॥ 
bhaṇiyā 'kiṁ ciṁtāē acchasi ciṁtāurā tumaṁ bhaddē ! । maraṇammi ya kayacittā ? tō caya ēyaṁ visayasaṁgaṁ ॥ 57 ॥ 6157 ॥ 
jēṇa duhabhāiṇī taṁ na hōsi jammaṁtarē vi tā sigdhaṁ । paḍivaja savvaviraiṁ' iya bhaṇiē raṁjiyā bālā ॥ 58 ॥ 6158 ॥ 
jaṁpara jōḍiyahatthā 'ahaha ahō sāmi ! tumha vipphurai । vimhāviyatēlōkkaṁ nāṇaṁ savvattha akkhaliyaṁ ॥ 59 ॥ 6159 ॥ 
tā jā jaṇayāīē āpucchāmiṁ gihammi gaṁtūṇaṁ । tā pahu ! tumhā''ēsaṁ āgaṁtūṇaṁ karissāmi ॥ 60 ॥ 6160 ॥

bhaggaṁ taṁ sayakhaṁḍaṁ niṣpuṇṇayajaṇamaṇōrahasamāṇaṁ । sulasō vi tammi bhaggē saṁpāvai phalahayaṁ ēvaṁ ॥ 35 ॥ 6244 ॥ 
tēṇaṁ ca taō ēsō ōbujjhatō diṇēhiṁ paṁcahiṁ u । kaṁṭhagayajīviō aha uttiṣṇō jalahimajjhāō ॥ 36 ॥ 6245 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca jīviyasēsō saṁpāviūṇa thāhaṁ mēllai phalahayaṁ, laggō ya tīraṭṭiyataruvaragahaṇēsuṁ phalāṇi pāṇiyaṁ ca gavēsiuṁ । 5
pāviūṇa kayaligāiphalāī kayā pāṇavittī, pīyaṁ ca pāṇiyaṁ, satthīhūō ya laggō ciṁtiuṁ, avi ya-
"pēcchaha pāvassa phalaṁ, aṇaṇṇasarisaṁ pi pāviuṁ riddhiṁ । puṇaravi viōiō haṁ saṁjāō hatthabīō tti ॥ 37 ॥ 6246 ॥ 
taha vi hu purisakkārō mōttavvō nēya uttamanarēṇa । jamhā hu bhāṁti imaṁ viusā vayaṇaṁ visēsēṇa ॥ 38 ॥ 6247 ॥ uktaṁ ca-
" prārabhyatē na khalu vighnabhayēna nīcaiḥ, prārabhya vighnavihatā viramanti madhyāḥ ।
vighnaiḥ sahasraguṇitairapi hanyamānāḥ prārabdhamuttamaguṇā na parityajanti ।” ॥ 39 ॥ 6248 ॥ 
tā puṇō vi kiṁci uvāyaṁtaraṁ karissāmi" tti bhāvēṁtō payaṭṭō puraō । taō ēgattha samuddatīrē pēcchaē giddhanivāyaṁ ।

thūla adattādāṇassa kayā nivittī, tā na kappaṁti majjha ēyāṇi, paraṁ ēēsiṁ jō sāmī sō paṁcattamuvagaō, tā
nihāṇalābhatullāṇi ēyāṇi na maē ērisassa adattādāṇassa kayā nivittī, tō giṇhāmi ēyāṇi, ēyamōllaṁ ca
ēyassa kassai ēēsiṁ sāmiyassa puṇṇaṭṭhā jiṇamaṁdirāiṭṭhāṇēsu vaissāmi, na ya ēyasāmiṇō kiṁci puṇṇaṁ bhavai, paraṁ 5
suddhāsayakaraṇāō mama caiva suhaphalaṁ bhavai, " yata uktaṁ-
“yadyasya satkamanucitamiha vittē tasya tadyamiha puṇyaṁ । bha̭vati śubhāśayakaraṇādityēvaṁ bhāvaśuddha syāt" ॥ 40 ॥ 6249 ॥ 
iccāi ciṁtiūṇa gahiūṇa tāṇi rayaṇāṇi pattō samuddatīrāē cēva । taō laṁghiūṇa tihiṁ diṇēhiṁ tamaraṇaṁ pattō

sāmaggī । ' thōvaṁ' ti puṇō vi vikkīyaṁ bīyarayaṇaṁ । tēṇa vi davvēṇa gahiyāṇi kayāṇagāṇi, kayā mahāsatyasāmaggī ।
payaṭṭō niyadēsābhimuhaṁ, gacchaṁtō ya pattō mahāḍaīē, avi ya-
jā ya bahutaruvarēhiṁ samāiṇiyā, jā ya bahubhillanivahēhiṁ parivaṇiyā ।
jāya bahusīha - bagghāisattāulā, jattha pavisaṁti saṁghāya ai āulā ॥ 41 ॥ 6250 ॥ 
jattha kavvā ya hiṁḍaṁti naraluddhayā, jattha ghāyaṁti hariṇāiē luddhayā ।
jā ya girighaṭṭasaṁghaṭṭa aiduggamā jattha dīsaṁti girisarihiṁ bahu saṁgamā ॥ 42 ॥ 6251 ॥ 
jattha dīsaṁti davanivaha pajalaṁtayā, jattha gulugulahiṁ karināhagurudaṁtayā ।
tattha aḍavīē majjhammi gacchaṁtaō, pattu sō satthu girigahaṇi bītaō ॥ 43 ॥ 6252 ॥ 
tattha ya ēgammi uppaṁsulayappaēsē kaō saṁghāyanivēsō, taō samāḍhattā savvē vi satthillayā bhōyaṇasāmaggiṁ kāuṁ,
avi ya-
āṇiṁti iṁdhaṇāī dāruyamāīṇi cittarūvāṇi । pāḍiṁti taō jalaṇaṁ, khaṇaṁti tiṁvaṇīō tō tattha ॥ 44 ॥ 6253 ॥ 
āṇaṁti jalaṁ, tō addahaṁti tivaṇīsu tāsu piḍharāī । ōvaṁti tattha dhannaṁ, uttārēti ya taō siddhaṁ ॥ 45 ॥ 6254 ॥

<pb n="60146"/>

kaṇikāiyaṁ payaṁtī, kuṇaṁti taha sālaṇāiyaṁ kiṁci । ēvaṁ siddhāē rasavaīē aha bhōyaṇanimittaṁ ॥ 46 ॥ 6255 ॥ 
uvavisai sayalasatthō bhōyaṇakajrēṇa jāva bhuṁjēi । tāva ya jaṁ saṁjāyaṁ tamēgacittā nisāmēha ॥ 47 ॥ 6256 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca bhōyaṇavāulāṇaṁ pamattayāṇaṁ satthillaya narāṇaṁ cārapurisēhiṁtō viyāṇiūṇa bhillasaṁghāyā 'haṇa haṇa haṇa' tti
gaddabhavayaṇasammissapaḍahayasiṁgayārāvabhayakarā nivaḍiyā tammi satthē । taō asēsaniyapurisaparivuḍō sannaddhabaddhakavaō—
'rē rē durāyārabhillā ! purisā havējjāha' tti bhaṇamāṇō laggō jujjhiuṁ sulasō । jāva khaṇamēkkaṁ jujjhai tāva thōvattaṇaō "
āḍattiyāṇaṁ, aipabhūyattaṇaō ya bhillāṇaṁ bhēlliō saṁghāō, pāḍiyā āḍattiyanarā hayasēsā ya naṭṭhā। sulasō vi
purisakāramamuṁcaṁtō gahiō pharaēhiṁ ōhaḍiūṇa nīō sabhavaṇē । taō 'pabhūyaṇiyasuhaḍaviṇāsagō' tti ruṭṭhēhiṁ vikkīō
parakūlagāmimahaṇasatthavāhasamīvē । tēṇa vi nīō parakūlē, davvalōbhēṇa ya vikkiō ṇēṇa । 'uvaciyagattō' tti gahiō
māṇusaruhiratthiṇā tavvatthavvagēṇa । tattha ya māṇusaruhirēṇa kijjaē kimirāgō, avi ya
pōsittu māṇusāī savvaṁga paṁcchiūṇa gālēṁtiṁ । taddēhāō ruhiraṁ kuṁḍīō bharaṁti tē rōddā ॥ 48 ॥ 6257 ॥ 
taṁ ca ruhiraṁ jayaṁtī jāyammi paḍaṁti tattha aha kimiṇō । parikammiēsa tēsuṁ kimirāgō jāyaē raṁgō ॥ 49 ॥ 6258 ॥

tammiya rayati vatthē, daḍharāgō hōi jēṇa sō ahiyaṁ । daddhammi vivatthammiṁ jāyai chārō vi sē rattō ॥ 50 ॥ 6259 ॥ 
pōsaṁti māṇusāī, puṇō vi gārlēti tāṇa puṇa ruhiraṁ । ēvaṁ niddayacittā kuṇati kimirāyalōbhēṇa ॥ 51 ॥ 6260 ॥ 
tāṇa ya majjhē sulasō dukkhaṁ aṇuhavai patthaṇājaṇiyaṁ । aha annammi diṇammiṁ kaha vi pattāṇa purisāṇa ॥ 52 ॥ 6261 ॥ 
ruhirādiddhasarīrō ukkhittō maṁsalōhaludvēṇa । sāmuddiyasauṇēṇaṁ garuyasarīrēṇa acaṁtaṁ ॥ 53 ॥ 6262 ॥ 
nīō ya rōhaṇammi girimmi mukkō tahiṁ silāvaṭṭē । jā kira bhakkhai tā jhatti āgaō pakkhiō annō ॥ 54 ॥ 6263 ॥ 5
tassa karaṇaṁ tāṇaṁ āvaḍiyaṁ dāruṇaṁ mahājujjha । ētthaṁtarammi sulasō nahō vakkhittacittāṇaṁ ॥ 55 ॥ 6264 ॥

nijjharaṇē, pakkhāliyamaṁgaṁ । daṭṭuṇa tattha nijjharaṇasayāsē saṁrōhiṇi gahiūṇa vaṭṭiyā nīrēṇa, vilitaṁ ca niyasarīraṁ tīē
rasēṇa, puṇō pakkhāliyaṁ salilēṇaṁ, jāyaṁ puṇannavaṁ savvakkhayavajjiyaṁ । kayā ya phalēhiṁ pāṇavittī jāva ya
saṇiyasaṇiyamuttarai rōhaṇāō tāva pēcchai aṇēgāī kayāṇi kajamāṇāṇi ya dhūlisamukkuḍurāī, aṇēgāō ya 10

tattha vi kaha āṇīō sirirōhaṇagirivarammi ēyammi । jattha mahārayaṇāī labbhaṁtī khaṇaṇamēttēṇa ॥ 57 ॥ 6266 ॥ 
tā saṁjāyaṁ ēyaṁ payaḍaṁ āhāṇayaṁ jamiha lōē । chūḍhō jaṁ bhuṁkkhālū, ōvaraē bhakkhabhaviyammi ॥ 58 ॥ 6267 ॥ 
tā tā khaṇāmi ahaṁ pi rōhaṇaṁ jāva'ṇagghamōllāī । pāvēmi bajjarayaṇāī pavarachakkō ṇa kaliyāī ॥ 59 ॥ 6268 ॥

gēhē । 'pāhuṇagō' tti bhuṁjāviō tēṇaṁ । bhuttuttarāvasāṇē ya pucchiō jahāṁ- 'kuō pāhuṇagō ?' tti । tēṇa jaṁpiyaṁ—
'tāya ! amarapurāō' tti । sēṭṭiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - 'kinnimittaṁ ?' | sulasēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - 'tāya ! rayaṇatthī, tā karēhi

aigahaṇā'ḍavīē । tattha ya bhaviyavvayāvasēṇa pañjaliō mahādavaggī, avi ya-

bahuvaṁsajālipagharisasamuṭṭhiō dhagadhagatasaddālō । guruvaṁsaniyaraphuṭṭaṁtataḍayaḍārāvaduvvisahō ॥ 60 ॥ 6269 ॥ 
huyavahajāluttāviyaphuṭṭiramahujālasēyaucchaliō । supayaṁḍapavaṇavasahūhuyaṁtasaddēṇa dhāvēi ॥ 61 ॥ 6270 ॥ 
naccēi taruṇatarupallavēsu, vilasēi uccarukkhēsu । rōvai ijjhirabahusattaniyara ārāḍisaddēhiṁ ॥ 62 ॥ 6271 ॥ 
gāyai phulliyapāyavaḍajjhirauḍḍīṇabhamaraviruēhiṁ । vihasai dhūmavivajjiyapajñjaliyatarukhaṁdhanivahēhiṁ ॥ 63 ॥ 6272 ॥ 
iya nāṇāviharūvō gahagahiō iva dabāṇalō jāō । taṁ daddr̥ṇaṁ satthiyalōō sabbō vi nāsēi ॥ 64 ॥ 6273 ॥ 
mōttūṇa vāhaṇāī nāṇāvihapaṇiyaniyarapuṇṇāiṁ । ghēttūṇaṁ niyapāṇē kōvi palāṇō kahiṁ cēva ॥ 65 ॥ 6274 ॥ 
sulasō vi satthavāhō dahuṁ taṁ dāruṇaṁ mahādāvaṁ । naṭuṁ ca sayalalōyaṁ nivāraṇē tassa asamatthō ॥ 66 ॥ 6275 ॥ 
ghēttūṇa niē pāṇē ēgadisiṁ jāi jhatti nāsēuṁ । girisariyāpuliṇammi thakkō taṇavajiē ṭhāṇē ॥ 67 ॥ 6276 ॥ 
jhīṇammi vaṇadavammi callai maggēṇa tēṇa cēvēsō । vacchaṁtō taiyadiṇē pattō ēgammi gāmammi ॥ 68 ॥ 6277 ॥ 
diṭṭhō ya tattha tēṇaṁ ēgō parivāyagō bahiṁ tassa । gaṁtūṇa tassamīvē uvabiṭṭō ēgaṭhāṇammi ॥ 69 ॥ 6278 ॥

ēgā ya maṁciyā taha, dō cēva ya tuṁbayāī sudiṭhāī । pupphāiyaṁ ca gahiuṁ sulasassa vi matthaē dinnaṁ ॥ 71 ॥ 6280 ॥ 
pavarabalīē piḍayaṁ, huyavahaaggiṭṭhiyāsaṇāhillaṁ । iṁdhaṇamāī vi tahā gahiuṁ gacchēti girivivarē ॥ 72 ॥ 6281 ॥ 
pūittu tattha dārammi saṁpriyaṁ jakkhasaṁtiyaṁ paḍimaṁ । pavisaṁti taō kamasō pōtthayalihiyāṇusārēṇa ॥ 73 ॥ 6282 ॥ 
uṭui ya tattha jō kōvi bhūya-vēyāla - rakkhasāīō । tassa ya samuhaṁ sulasō pakkhivai baliṁ abhīyamaṇō ॥ 74 ॥ 6283 ॥ 
ēvaṁ vaccaṁtā tē ratta'cchī pucchadīvadiṭṭēṇa । maggēṇa jōyaṇadugaṁ vōlēuṁ kūvayaṁ pattā ॥ 75 ॥ 6284 ॥ 
tattha ya pēcchaṁti taō taṁ kūvaṁ aisurammayaṁ pavaraṁ । caurayaṇīvitthiṇṇaṁ, dīhaṁ cattāri rayaṇīō ॥ 76 ॥ 6285 ॥ 
cauraṁsaṁ suvibhattaṁ additalaṁ tamaṁdhayārillaṁ । taṁ daddr̥ṇaṁ kūvaṁ dō vi hu cittammi parituṭṭā ॥ 77 ॥ 6286 ॥

sajjittu maṁciyaṁ tō rajjudugaṁ baṁdhiūṇa tō bhaṇai । parivāyagō jahā 'taṁ pavisasu bhō sulasa ! kūvammi ॥ 78 ॥ 6287 ॥ 
giṇhittu tuṁbayāī, bhariūṇa rasassa ēhi taṁ sigdhaṁ । gahiyammi tammi jēṇaṁ pujaṁti maṇōrahā tujjha ॥ 79 ॥ 6288 ॥ 
iya bhaṇiō tō sulasō āruhiuṁ maṁciyāē ōyarai । ōsārai iyarō vi hu jā pattō kūvayatalammi ॥ 80 ॥ 6289 ॥ 
tā cālai sō rajjuṁ ōsāraṁtō imō vi thakkēi । sulasō vi namōkkāraṁ paḍhamāṇō lēi tuṁbāī ॥ 81 ॥ 6290 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi sahō rasamajhāō viṇiggaō jhatti । 'mā rasamēyaṁ supurisa ! hatthēṇaṁ chivasu aivisamaṁ ॥ 82 ॥ 6291 ॥

mā hu imēṇaṁ chittō viṇāsamaha nicchaēṇa pāvihasi । tā tuha supurisa ! sāhammiyassa jiṇa sāhubhattassa ॥ 83 ॥ 6292 ॥ 
sāhējayaṁ vihēmiṁ, appasu mama tuṁbayāī jēṇa ahaṁ । appēmi tuha bharēuṁ rasassa ēyassa divvassa' ॥ 84 ॥ 6293 ॥ 
taṁ sōūṇaṁ sulasō pabhaṇai 'vaṁdāmi, kō tumaṁ ēttha ? । jiṇapayapaṁ kayamahuyara ! sāhasu maha kōuyaṁ garuyaṁ ॥ 85 ॥ 6294 ॥ 
sō bhai 'suṇa suṁdara । jaṁbuddīvammi bhūvi sammi । nayarammi ahaṁ vaṇiō vasāmi jiṇasēharō nāma ॥ 86 ॥ 6295 ॥ 
aha annayā kayāī gaō samuddammi atthalōbhēṇa । tattha ya bhaggaṁ vahaṇaṁ, uttiṣṇō kaha vi jalahīō ॥ 87 ॥ 6296 ॥ 
miliō ya ahaṁ parivāyagassa tēṇā'vi ēttha pakkhittō । rasalōbhēṇa paviṭṭhō, sō vi gaō taṁ rasaṁ ghēttuṁ ॥ 88 ॥ 6297 ॥ 
tākahasu tumaṁ pi kahaṁ, ēttha paviḍō si ?' bhaṇai sulasō vi । 'parivāyagēṇa ahamavi pavēsiō ēttha kūvammi' ॥ 89 ॥ 6298 ॥ 
taṁ sōuṁ iyarō vi hu jaṁpai 'na hu suṁdaraṁ kathaṁ tumaē । jamhā hu imē ṭuṭṭhā hōṁti parivvāyagā pāvā ॥ 90 ॥ 6299 ॥ 
tā appasu tuṁbāī, jēṇaṁ bhariūṇa tujjha appēmi । para kiṁtu imassa tumaṁ khaṇamavi mā vīsasējāsu' ॥ 91 ॥ 6300 ॥ 
tō tassa appiyāī, bhariyāī tēṇa gihiuṁ sulasō । baṁdhittu maṁciyāē cālai rajjuṁ puṇō sulasō ॥ 92 ॥ 6301 ॥ 
rajjūsannaṁ muṇiuṁ baī vi kaḍūḍhēi maṁciyaṁ hiṭṭō । jāva taḍē saṁpattō jaṁpai parivāyagō tāva ॥ 93 ॥ 6302 ॥ 
'kiṁ gahiō bhadda ! rasō tumaē ?' sulasō vi bhaṇai 'āmaṁ 'ti । parivāyagō vi jaṁpai 'appasu tā tuṁbaē paḍhamaṁ ' ॥ 94 ॥ 6303 ॥

sulasō vi bhaṇai 'naṇu maṁciyāē hēṭummi tāiṁ baddhāī । tā uttārēhi mamaṁ, jēṇa suhaṁ tāī chōḍēmi ' ॥ 95 ॥ 6304 ॥ 
iyarō vi āha 'naṇu kūvayassa kaṁummi hōhihi pamāō' । iya jāva na uttārai tā muṇiyaṁ tēṇa sē cittaṁ ॥ 96 ॥ 6305 ॥ 
"taṁ hōhī naṇu ēyaṁ jaṁ maha sāhammiēṇa parikahiyaṁ । tā mārēhī niyamā mamaṁ imō pāvapariṇāmō ॥ 97 ॥ 6306 ॥ 
tā mā imassa vi imō hōu rasō" ciṁtiūṇa sulasēṇa । khittāiṁ tuṁbāī kūvayamajjhami vēgēṇa ॥ 98 ॥ 6307 ॥ 
taṁ da iyarēṇa vi mukkō sō jhatti kūvamajjhammi । paḍiō daḍa tti kūvayakhaḍḍāē dēvbajōgēṇaṁ ॥ 99 ॥ 6308 ॥ 
jaṁ ca ghasaṁtō paḍiō taṁ dukkhaviō na tārisaṁ kiṁpi । bhaṇai ya mahasaddēṇaṁ 'namō jiṇāṇaṁ' ti bhāvēṇa ॥ 100 ॥ 6309 ॥ 
" hā jīva pāvakammaya ! jai taiya cciya taē vayaṁ gahiyē । hutaṁ āsi taō taṁ ṇa ya pāvēṁtō imaṁ vasaṇaṁ ॥ 101 ॥ 6310 ॥ 
hā jīva ! jai gurūṇaṁ hiyāṇa sikkhā taē kayā hōtā। tō na hu iya dukkhāṇaṁ bhāyaṇamaṇahaṁ tumaṁ hutō' ॥ 102 ॥ 6311 ॥ 
hā jīva ! jai ṇivittī pariggahāō taē kayā hōtā । tā na hu ēttha paḍatō narayāgārammi kūvammi ॥ 103 ॥ 6312 ॥ 
tā iṇhi pi na naṭuṁ gahiūṇaṁ savvaviraisāmannaṁ । gēṇhasu aṇasaṇamaṇahaṁ jēṇa'ja vi tarasi saṁsāraṁ" ॥ 104 ॥ 6313 ॥ 10
iya vōttūṇaṁ jā lēi aṇasaṇaṁ savvaviraisaṁjuttaṁ । tā hēṭṭhillayapurisēṇa vāriō 'mā imaṁ kuṇasu' ॥ 105 ॥ 6314 ॥ 
bhaṇiyaṁ sulasēṇa taō 'kiṁ baṁdhava ! asthi kō vi hu uvāō। ēttō niggamaṇammi jēṇaṁ maṁ vārasē taṁ si ?' ॥ 106 ॥ 6315 ॥ 
1. khaḍahāē jē0 kā 0 ॥ 2. divvajō kā0 | dēvajō pā0 ॥ । 3. hōtō pā0 ॥ । 4. jēṇēvaṁ vā jē0 kā0 ॥

tō tēṇa īmō bhaṇiō 'kalladiṇē ēttha pāṇiyaṁ pāuṁ । gōhā kila nikkhatā kēṇavi maggēṇa niyaēṇa ॥ 107 ॥ 6316 ॥ 
tā jai pucchē tīē vilaggasē kaha vi aighaṇō hōuṁ । tā jaṛa para niggamaṇaṁ, annaha puṇa ēttha avasāṇaṁ' ॥ 108 ॥ 6317 ॥ 
sulasēṇa taō puṇaravi payaṁpiyaṁ 'jai imaṁ taō kīsa । taṁ mitta ! na nikkhaṁtō ? ' sō bhaṇai 'rasēṇa ēēṇa ॥ 109 ॥ 6318 ॥ 
mahatalabhāṁgō khaṛō uvarimabhāgassa saṁpayaṁ ḍhukkō । tā gahiyā'ṇasaṇō hē saṁpai sumarāmi paramēṭṭhī ॥ 110 ॥ 6319 ॥ 
tā majjha jai kahiṁcivi tumaē pāsaṭṭhiēṇa gacchaṁti । pāṇā tā majjha tumaṁ vihēhi ārāhaṇaṁ paramaṁ ॥ 111 ॥ 6320 ॥ 
abbhatthiō si supurisa ! niggacchaṁtammi majjha jīvammi । ēsō bhavasayadulahō dāyavvō paṁcaṇavakārō' ॥ 112 ॥ 6321 ॥ 
iya jā sō anbhatthai khaṇamēttaṁ tāva tassa jīhāē । khalaṇaṁ kiṁcī jāyaṁ taṁ nāuṁ jaṁpaē sulasō ॥ 113 ॥ 6322 ॥ 
'bhō bhō mahāyasa ! tuhaṁ jīhākhalaṇēṇa saṁpayaṁ mannē । paccāsannaṁ maraṇaṁ, tā saṁpai hōsu uvauttō' ॥ 114 ॥ 6323 ॥ 
" jē na vi ruhaṁti ihaī rāgāībīyadaḍūḍhabhāvāō । saṁsārajalahipōē, tē aruhaṁtē sarasu iṇhi ॥ 115 ॥ 6324 ॥ 
jē vaṁdaṇāi arahaṁti jē ya mahapāḍihērapūyāō । bhavaaḍavisatthavāhē, tē arahaṁtē sarasu iṇhi ॥ 116 ॥ 6325 ॥ 
jēhiṁ hayā mōhāī mahāriṇō bhavanibaṁdhaṇā ghōrā । vīriyavaradaṁḍēṇaṁ, tē arihaṁtē sarasu ihi ॥ 117 ॥ 6326 ॥ 
jēsiṁ na vijjai rahō aṁtō majjhaṁ va giri-guhāīṇaṁ । varakēbalanāṇēṇaṁ, tē arahaṁtē sarasu ihi ॥ 118 ॥ 6327 ॥

ahava rahō vā jāṇaṁ aṁtō ya jarāisaṁbhavō na'tthi । jēsiṁ jayapujjāṇaṁ, tē arahaṁtē sarasu ihi ॥ 119 ॥ 6328 ॥

jē jaṁtubaṁdhubhūē paramasaraṇē ya divvanāṇadharē । tēlōkkacahiyamahiē, tē arahaṁtē sarasu ihi ॥ 121 ॥ 6330 ॥ 
iya paramēṭṭīṇaṁ jē paḍhamā titthaṁkarā mahābhāgā । saggā - 'pavaggajaṇayā tē arahaṁtē sarasu ihi ॥ 122 ॥ 6331 ॥

jēhiṁ siyaṁ kira baddhaṁ, dhamiyaṁ kampidhaṇaṁ asēsaṁ pi । jhāṇāṇalajōēṇaṁ, tē sumarasu saṁpayaṁ siddhē ॥ 124 ॥ 6333 ॥

jē ya arūva agaṁdhā arasa aphāsā asaddayā taha ya । tēlōkkuddharaṇasahā, tē sumarasu saṁpayaṁ siddhē ॥ 126 ॥ 6335 ॥

jē ya atitta akaḍuyā akasāyā taha aṇaṁbilā cēva । jē ya amaharā rasaō, tē sumarasu saṁpayaṁ siddhē ॥ 128 ॥ 6337 ॥ 10

īsīpa bhāragaē lōyaggapaṭṭhiē ya jē ṇicaṁ । daṁsaṇa-nāṇasamaggē, tē sumarasu saṁpayaṁ siddhē ॥ 132 ॥ 6341 ॥ 
iya jē paramēṇaṁ bīyāṇammi saṁṭhiyā sayayaṁ । savvēsiṁ pi jiyāṇaṁ havai mahāmaṁgalaṁ bīyaṁ ॥ 133 ॥ 6342 ॥ 
jē bhaviyakamalapaḍibōhaṇammi abbhujjayā mahāsūrā । dēsaṇakiraṇakarālā, tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 134 ॥ 6343 ॥ 
paṁcappayāra ōyāra karaṇanicchujjayā ya annēsiṁ । tavahaṇasamujuttā tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 135 ॥ 6344 ॥ 
nāṇācāraṁ phāsiṁti jē u aṭuppayārapavibhattaṁ । kāla- viṇayāibhēyaṁ, tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 136 ॥ 6345 ॥ 
taha aṭupayāraṁ pi ya nissaṁkiyamāidaṁsaṇāyāraṁ । cittammi dharaṁti sayā, tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 137 ॥ 6346 ॥ 
cārittāyāraṁ pi hu aṭuvihaṁ āyaraṁti jē guṇiṇō । samiī- guttisarūvaṁ, tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 138 ॥ 6347 ॥ 
bārasavihaṁ tavaṁtī taba āyāraṁ samāhiyā jē u । dhīdhaṇiyabaddhakacchā, tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 139 ॥ 6348 ॥ 
bīriyaāyāraṁ pi hu aṇigr̥hiyasaṁttavīriyā dhaṇiyaṁ । jē khaṁḍaṁti na kaiya vi, tē paṇamasu sūriṇō ihi ॥ 140 ॥ 6349 ॥ 
iya paramēsara - paramētiiyāṇammi jē u vaṭṭaṁti । tē tijagassa vi sayayaṁ havaṁti iha maṁgala taiyaṁ ॥ 141 ॥ 6350 ॥ 
jē aṁgāṇagagayaṁ suyanāṇaṁ pāḍhayaṁti ujuttā । nijjarahēuṁ sīsē, tē ujjhāē nama̭sāhi ॥ 142 ॥ 6351 ॥

jē saṁtarasavihasaṁjama sīlaṁga'dvārasahasadhuradhavalā । uddharadhāriyakhaṁdhā, tē baṁdasu muṇivarē bhadda ! ॥ 156 ॥ 635 ॥ 
iya paṁcamāṇapriyā muṇiṇō paramēṭṭiṇō namasaṁti । bhāvēṇaṁ jē tēsiṁ paṁcamayaṁ maṁgalaṁ hōī ॥ 157 ॥ 6366 ॥ 
siripaṁcamaṁgalamimaṁ bhattivasullasiyabahalarōmaṁcō । cittammi dharasu suddhō, tarasi imaṁ jēṇa bhavajalahiṁ ॥ 158 ॥ 6367 ॥

khāmēhi savvajīvē saṁsāratthē tahēva siddhē ya । mēttībhāvamubagaō payaccha micchukkaḍaṁ sōma ! ॥ 166 ॥ 6375 ॥

jalayara-thalayara - khahayaragaēṇa paṁcidiēsa vivihēsu । jē kēbi hu dukkhaviyā jīvā khāmēhi tē savvē ॥ 169 ॥ 6378 ॥ 
bahuṇakkacakka macchaya- gōhiya-mayarāijalayarajiēsu । jē kēvi dumpiyā tē khāmēhi samuḍiō savvē ॥ 170 ॥ 6379 ॥ 
dupaya-cauppaya bahupaya- apayāīthalayarēsu jīvēsu । jē kēvi bērabhāvē uviyā khāmēhi tē vi tumaṁ ॥ 171 ॥ 6380 ॥ 
aṁḍaya - lōmaya-cammaya - sāmuggaya - viyayapakkhimāīsu । savvēsu khahayarēsuṁ khāmasu jē dummiyā tumaē ॥ 172 ॥ 6381 ॥ 
kammā - kammaya- aṁtaradīvayamaṇuēsa majjhapattēṇa । maṇa - vāyā- kāēhiṁ jē dūmiyā tē vi khāmēhi ॥ 173 ॥ 6382 ॥ 
bhavaiṇavai-vāṇamaṁtara-jōisa-vēmāṇiēsu dēvēsu । jēhiṁ kayaṁ saha vēraṁ tumaē khāmēhi tē savvē ॥ 174 ॥ 6383 ॥ 
rayaṇāīpuḍhavīsuṁ gaēṇa nēraiyabhāvapattēṇa । bahusō vihiyaṁ vēraṁ tassa vi micchukkaḍaṁ dēhi ॥ 175 ॥ 6384 ॥ 
iya caugaipattēṇaṁ caṁurāsījōṇilakkhagahaṇammi । micchāukkaḍamaṇahaṁ dēhi kayaṁ jēhiṁ saha vēraṁ ॥ 176 ॥ 6385 ॥ 
uvasamabhāvammi ḍiō khittō jēṇēha kūvamajjhami । taṁpi khamāvēhi tumaṁ, ēsō tē khāmaṇākālō ॥ 177 ॥ 6386 ॥ 
samasattu - mittabhāvō visahējjasu vēyaṇaṁ imaṁ jēṇa । ēsō sō kasabaṭṭō baṭṭai guruvayaṇakaraṇammi ॥ 178 ॥ 6387 ॥ 
jai vēyaṇāsamūhē vaṭṭaṁtō visahiūṇa taṁ sammaṁ । ārāhaṇāpaḍāgaṁ harasi taō hōsi taṁ sūrō ॥ 179 ॥ 6388 ॥

cēiyapūyāīyaṁ bhāvēṇaṁ kuṇasu taha ya āhāraṁ । vōsira cauvvihaṁ pi hu tivihaṁ tivihēṇa dhīra ! tumaṁ ॥ 182 ॥ 6391 ॥

bhāvēhi bhāvaṇāō aṁṇiccayāīō taha va bārasa vi । bittharanavakāraṁ pi hu bhāvēhi suhēṇa cittēṇa ॥ 184 ॥ 6393 ॥ 
aha vittharaṁ na sakkasi tō saṁkhēvēṇa jiṇanavakkāraṁ । 'asiyāusā ṇamō' tti ya bhāvēhi imaṁ pi bhāvēṇa ॥ 185 ॥ 6394 ॥ 
aha na vi imaṁ pi sakkasi tō maha huṁkārayaṁ karējjāsi । jēṇa ahamēva tujjhaṁ dēmi imaṁ paṁcanavakāraṁ " ॥ 186 ॥ 6395 ॥ 
iya sulasēṇa bhaṇiō saḍūḍhō jiṇasēharō mahāsattō । duguṇāṇiyasaṁvēgō ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ samāḍhattō ॥ 187 ॥ 6396 ॥ 
'sāvaya ! mahapuṇṇēhiṁ aigaruēhiṁ tumaṁ iha pattō । ēyāvatthagayassa vi jaṁ maha ārāhaṇā ēsā ॥ 188 ॥ 6397 ॥ 
duhajalahinivaḍiyassa vi jaṁ sāmaggī imā mahaṁ jāyā । taṁ maha puṇṇavasēṇaṁ ēkkaṁ ciya suṁdaraṁ ēyaṁ ॥ 189 ॥ 6398 ॥

" jai pāviyaṁ nihāṇaṁ tā kiṁ taṁ thōvamēttayaṁ jāyaṁ ? । jai vihiyaṁ vāṇijjaṁ kimappalābhaṁ huyaṁ taṁ pi ? ॥ 222 ॥ 6431 ॥

jai pāviyāī rayaṇāī kahavi pattaṁ ca tēhiṁ bahu mōllaṁ । tā kiṁ aḍavīmajjhē paḍiyā bhillāṇa dhāḍi ? tti ॥ 224 ॥ 6433 ॥ 
tattha vi parakūlambhi sahiyaṁ aidāruṇaṁ mahādukkhaṁ । jai kahavi taō chuṭṭō aciṁtaṇīyappaōgēṇa ॥ 225 ॥ 6434 ॥ 
jai rōhaṇamma pattō tattha vi ladvāiṁ pavaravajjāī । tā kiṁ aḍavīmajjhē daḍūḍhaṁ savvaṁ pi dāvēṇa ? ॥ 226 ॥ 6435 ॥ 
jai pattō kaha vi rasō tā kiṁ vasaṇammi dāruṇē paḍiō ? । jai nikkhatō tattō tā kiṁ kariṇō uvassaggō ? ॥ 227 ॥ 6436 ॥ 
jai āḍhattō dhāū tā kiṁ maha sō vi niṣphalō jāō ? । jai laddhaṁ vararayaṇaṁ tā kiṁ maha taṁ pi avahariyaṁ ? ॥ 228 ॥ 6437 ॥ 
hā dēva ! majjha bisaē ainigghiṇa ! nihirō tuma jāō। jaṁ jaṁ karēmi kiṁcivi taṁ taṁ vihalēsi maha savvaṁ ॥ 229 ॥ 6438 ॥ 
tā kiṁ karēmi saṁpai parammuhē visamadēvvapariṇāmē । ēvaṁvihammi ya kahaṁ putraṁti maṇōrahā majjha ? ॥ 230 ॥ 6439 ॥ 
tā kiṁ ēttō vi paraṁ kāyavyaṁ ? huṁ viyāṇiyaṁ aha ca । gaṁtuṁ mahāmasāṇē sāhēmi mahābalaṁ bhūyaṁ ॥ 231 ॥ 6440 ॥ 
siddhaṁ ca tayaṁ saṁtaṁ pucchāmī 'kiṁ khayaṁ gayē kammaṁ । maha aṁtarāiyaṁ taṁ, ahavā nō' jai imō bhaṇihī ॥ 232 ॥ 6441 ॥

bhaṇai mahāsaddēṇaṁ 'bhō bhō ! ṇisuṇaṁtu bhūya-vēyālā ! | vikkēmi mahāmaṁsaṁ jai kōvi hu lēi uṭṭhēu' ॥ 235 ॥ 6444 ॥ 
taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ sahasā kilikilikilaṁtasaddālā । urduti bhūya-pēyā naccaṁtā kattiyakaraggā ॥ 236 ॥ 6445 ॥ 
pabhaṇaṁti 'tumaṁ jai bhō ! ētthaṁ vikkiṇasi kira mahāmaṁsaṁ । tā paḍasu ēttha ḍāṇē, lēmō jēṇaṁ mahāmaṁsaṁ' ॥ 237 ॥ 6446 ॥ 
iya jaṁpiyammi tulasō sōvai bhūmīē ṇinbhaō saṁtō। tē vi hu savvadisāsuṁ dukkaṁtī maṁsagahaṇatthaṁ ॥ 238 ॥ 6447 ॥

tō pēcchai taṁ sulasaṁ savvattō kattiyākaraggēhiṁ । parivēḍhiyaṁ surēhiṁ taṁ dahuṁ ciṁtaē ēvaṁ ॥ 240 ॥ 6449 ॥

kuṇau mayaṁkō ēyaṁ jō hu parō visayamōhiō saṁtō। aṁbāē puṇa ēyaṁ kaha nillajjāē paḍivannaṁ ? ॥ 15 ॥ 6526 ॥ 
tāyassa pasāyāṇa vi na lajjiyā paranarammi jaṁ sattā । ahavā vi kuṇau rāyaṁ, ainiṁdaṇiyaṁ tu puttavahō ॥ 16 ॥ 6527 ॥ 
caṁḍālāṇa vi gēhē nippajjai nēya ērisaṁ kammaṁ । iha-paralōyaviruddhaṁ aṁbā paḍivajjai imaṁ pi ॥ 17 ॥ 6528 ॥ 
ahavā na hi acchariyaṁ, jaṁ ēsā vavasaē imaṁ kammaṁ । jēṇa parapurisasattā mārai puttaṁ padaṁ cēva ॥ 18 ॥ 6529 ॥ 
tāmaha cittaṁ ēvaṁ āsī kira dō vi niggahissāmi । tā pujjau rajjēṇaṁ saṁjamarajjaṁ pavajjāmi " ॥ 19 ॥ 6530 ॥ 
iya nicchyaṁ bihēuṁ rayaṇīē baṁciūṇa parivāraṁ । niggacchai sīhō iva gavakkhadārēṇa ullaliuṁ ॥ 20 ॥ 6531 ॥ 
nayarāō viniggacchai vaccai ēgaṁ disaṁ gahēūṇa । sāhasamēttasamēō kahiṁci suguruṁ gavēsaṁtō ॥ 21 ॥ 6532 ॥ 
aha annamma diṇammiṁ pāsai khīsuṁdarambhi nayarammi । ujjāṇatthaṁ sūriṁ nariṁda- sura-asurapaṇivaiyaṁ ॥ 22 ॥ 6533 ॥ 
nāṇaṁ guṇabhūiṁ aṇēyamuṇiniyarasēviyaṁ saṁtaṁ । nāṇacaukkasamaggaṁ taṁ daṭṭu harisiō ēsō ॥ 23 ॥ 6534 ॥ 
uvasappaūṇa viṇaṇa baṁdaē bhattinibbharō ahiyaṁ । sūrī vi dhammalābhaṁ dēi pasannēṇa cittēṇa ॥ 24 ॥ 6535 ॥

dāūṇa dhammalābha saṁbhāsa sāyarēhiṁ vayaṇēhiṁ । 'siriamaracaṁdanaravai ! kattha tumaṁ ēttha saṁpattō ॥ 25 ॥ 6536 ॥ 
parivāravipyamukkō saṁsārajiō vva bhamasi ēgāgī ?' । taṁ guruvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ parisā ukkaṇṇiyā savvā ॥ 26 ॥ 6537 ॥ 
vālēi kaṁdharā u nirūvaṇatthammi amaracaṁdassa । daṭṭhūṇa tassa rūvaṁ pucchai paramēṇa viṇaṇaṁ ॥ 27 ॥ 6538 ॥ 
' kō ēsa amaracaṁdō naranāhō ?' tō paryapaē bhayava । 'sāēyapurāhivaī puttō sirisūrasēṇassa ॥ 28 ॥ 6539 ॥

pucchēi taō parisā 'sāmiya ! dīsai vaēṇa lahu ēsō । tā kēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ nivvinnō kāmabhōgāṇaṁ ?' ॥ 30|6541 ॥ 
bhayavaṁ pi kahai parisāē tīē nivvēyakāraṇaṁ tassa । taṁ sōuṁ parisā bihu paramaṁ saṁvēgamāvannā ॥ 31 ॥ 6 542 ॥ 
uṭṭittu amaracaṁdō pabhaṇai 'nāṇēṇa jāṇiyaṁ sāmi ! | maha cariyaṁ savvaṁ pi hu tā kaha sāhijaē tumha ? ॥ 32 ॥ 6543 ॥ 
tā sāmi ! majjha maṇavaṁchiyassa āpūraṇaṁ kuṇaha sammaṁ । jēṇa na puṇō vi ētthaṁ paḍāmi saṁsārakūbammi ॥ 33 ॥ 6544 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ca puṇō bhayavaṁ ! jāō khīrammi khaṁḍanikkhēvō । jaṁ majjha cullapiuṇō tubbhē kira ēttha saṁjāyā' ॥ 34 ॥ 6545 ॥ 10
taṁ sōuṁ nayaravaī tō rāyā viriyadattaṇāmō tti । jaṁpara pahuṁ 'mahāyasa ! karēmi nikkhamaṇamahima sē ॥ 35 ॥ 6546 ॥ 
jamhā hu imō rāyā aigaruō majjha mittattō ya । jaidhammaujjuō taha tō arihai majjha pūyaṁ' ti ॥ 36 ॥ 6 547 ॥ 
aṇumanniyammi guruṇā rāyā saṁviggamāṇasō jāi । ghēttūṇa amaracaṁdaṁ pavisai niyayammi gēhammi ॥ 37 ॥ 6548 ॥

sāhū vi amaracaṁdō gahiyavaō bārasaha aṁgāṇaṁ । jā pacaṁtē pattō tā sūripayammi saṁviō ॥ 39 ॥ 6550 ॥

ētthaṁtarammi ya kahataraṁ viyāṇiūṇa pucchiyaṁ sulasēṇa - 'bhayavaṁ ! kiṁ puṇa kāraṇaṁ, jaṁ maha laddhā laddhā lacchī khayaṁ
gayā ?' | taō bhayavayā bhaṇiyaṁ - 'sōma !,
"jaṁ dāṇaṁ ditēhiṁ khaṁḍija aṁtaraṁtarā bhāvō । taṁ aṁtariyā riddhī jāyai natthēttha saṁdēhō ॥ 1 ॥ 6553 ॥ 
tā sōma ! tumaē vi annajammē dāṇaṁ dētēṇa aṁtaraṁtarā khaṁḍiō bhāvō, tā tassa kammassa phalamēyaṁ ti । jaō tuma
annajammē iō taiē bhavē taṁbāyarē gāmē tāracaṁdō nāma kōiṁbiō ahēsi । tattha ya tumaṁ payaīē cēva dāṇasaddhaō dēsi 1

tattha vi paḍilāhēsi paidiṇaṁ bhattibharaṇinbharō susāhuṇō, khaṁḍēsi ya aṁtaraṁtarē bhāvaṁ, jahā - 'saṁpayaṁ na dāhāmi' । daṭṭuṇa

laṁghiūṇa pattō girimaggē । tattha ya pavvayakaḍaṇīē acaṁtamappamattēhiṁ gaṁtavvaṁ । jai kahiṁ pi taō ṭhāṇāō chuṭṭija
taō sayakhaṁḍīhūēhiṁ bhūmī pāvijjai । kiṁ bahuṇā ? ēvamāimahāduggē laṁghīūṇa paccāsannīhūō cilāyadēsassa ।
ētthaṁtarammi ya samuṭṭhiō cilāyarāiṇō siddharāīhiṁ saha viggahō । taō 'cilāyadēsaṁ pavisai' tti viruddhēhiṁ iyararāīhiṁ 5
gahiō sayalasatthō । lūḍiyāī kayāṇagāī, uddāliyāī pavahaṇāī, saṁvalayamēttaṁ dāūṇa vāliyā vaṇiṇō । taō ciṁtiyaṁ
sayaṁbhūdēvēṇa avi ya-
"nūrṇa apuṇṇabhāī majjha jiō aiadinnadāṇō tti । jēṇa phalai na hu kiṁcivi jamiha uvāyaṁ karēmi ahaṁ ॥ 3 ॥ 6566 ॥ 
ahavā vi sacamēyaṁ paḍhijaē jamiha lōgamajjhammi । sukkai taṁ ciya ḍālaṁ kavōḍaō jattha alliya " ॥ 4 ॥ 6567 ॥ 
ēvaṁ ciṁtaṁtō sō vaṁcittā kahavi tāṇa diṭṭhīō । baliūṇa jāva pavisai cilāyadēsassa majjhami ॥ 5 ॥ 6568 ॥ 
tā gāgiṁ daṭṭu cilāyabhillāṇa ḍiṁbharūbēhiṁ । gahiō giddhanimittaṁ baṁdhēuṁ tō biliṁpati ॥ 6 ॥ 6569 ॥ 
ruhirēṇa taō aḍavīmajjhē ḍārvēti jēṇa kira giddhā । nivaḍaṁti āmisatthī kaḍēvaraṁ mayagamii kaliuṁ ॥ 7 ॥ 6570 ॥ 
1. ṇāō vi chuṭṭi pā0 ॥ । 2. niruddhē jē0 ॥

nivaḍaṁti taō giddhā nāṇāvihapiṁchadhāriṇō bahavē । bahubhēyajāi bhinnā sayaṁbhudēvaṁ taō tē u ॥ 8 ॥ 6571 ॥ 
viṁdhati caṁcupahārēhiṁ tikkhanaharēhiṁ tō viluṁpati । jā tā bhillasuēhiṁ bāṇapahārēhiṁ hammēti ॥ 9 ॥ 6572 ॥ 
puṇaravi giramāṇēuṁ chōḍēti sayaṁbhudēvamaha ḍiṁbhā । bhōyaṇadāṇāīhiṁ uvayariya dharaṁti gēhammi ॥ 10 ॥ 6573 ॥ 
ēvaṁ diya diyahē jāva sahārvēti dāruṇaṁ dukkhaṁ । tāva'nnadiṇē vagghī samāgayā tammi ṭhāṇammi ॥ 11 | 6574 ॥ 
uppāḍiō ya tīē uḍḍāvittāṇa giddhasaṁghāyaṁ । nīō ya vaṇaniguṁjē ḍibhāṇāhārakajjammi ॥ 12 ॥ 6575 ॥ 
muṁcatīē kahamavi dāḍhāē vilaggiūṇa taṁ tassa । tuṭṭaṁ kara caraṇāṇaṁ jaṁ dinnaṁ baṁdhaṇaṁ āsi ॥ 13 ॥ 6 576 ॥ 
vagghī vihu ḍiṁbhāṇaṁ gavēsaṇatthaṁ kahiṁ pi jāva gayā । tāva imō uḍēuṁ paṇassaē turiyapayakhēvō ॥ 14 ॥ 6577 ॥ 
vaccaṁtō ya ṇaīē tīrē āvāsiyaṁ niyai satthaṁ । taṁ daddūṇāsasiō naīē pakkhālaē aṁgaṁ ॥ 15 ॥ 6578 ॥ 
tēṇa ya satyēṇa samaṁ valiō niyadēsasammuhaṁ jāi । kaha kahavi hu kālēṇaṁ pattō jattha'cchaē thērī ॥ 16 ॥ 6579 ॥ 
pavisai ya tīē gēhē daddūṇa imā vi gōrakhaṁ kuṇai । pucchai ya sayalavattaṁ sō vi hu akkhēi nīsēsaṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 6580 ॥ 
thērī vi hu rōvaṁtī pabhaṇai ' hā putta ! putta ! kaha taṁ si । maha vāraṁtīē gaō dukkhāṇaṁ bhāyaṇaṁ jāō ॥ 18 ॥ 6581 ॥ 
aja vi maha puṇṇēhiṁ valiō jīvaṁtaō iha pattō । tā majjha aputtāē vaccha ! tumaṁ puttaō jāō ॥ 19 ॥ 6582 |

tā acchasu vilasaṁtō majjha dhaṇaṁ kuṇasu kiṁpi mā kaṭuṁ' । ēvaṁ tīē vr̥ttō bhai 'tuhaṁ aba ! maha jaṇaṇī' ॥ 20 ॥ 6583 ॥

pālēttu saṁjama sō saṁpattē maraṇadēsakālammi । aṇasaṇavihiṇā mariuṁ saṁpattō dēvalōgammi” ॥ 30 ॥ 6593 ॥

jai puṇa paḍhamaṁ caiva ya uvavisai narēsarō tahiṁ gaṁtuṁ । tō sēsāṇa na ṭhāṇaṁ ēvaṁ ētthaṁ pi nāyavvaṁ ॥ 21 ॥ 6639 ॥

tattō sō āhārō apariṇamaṁtō visūiyaṁ kuṇai । tīē bisūiyāē pīḍiyadēhō gaō nihaṇaṁ ॥ 25 ॥ 6643 ॥ 
aṭṭajjhāṇēṇa maō uvavannō vaṁtarēsu dēvēsu । tattō ya cuō saṁtō uvavannō tiriyajāīsu ॥ 26 ॥ 6644 ॥

tēṇa vi dinnaṁ maggatayassa, tattō visāō thōvayaraṁ । tēṇa vi taṁ gahiūṇaṁ talāṁyamajjhammi pakkhittaṁ ॥ 31 ॥ 6685 ॥

tē tuṭṭē nāūṇaṁ āsa mēllēi tāṇa sō sāmī । vasahā vi marēūṇaṁ dōnni vi. aha vaṁtarā jāyā ॥ 50 ॥ 6704 ॥

jaṁpai imā vi 'piyayama ! kiṁ tuha ēēṇa hōhī (hii) vaēṇa । jai tuha pēcchaṁtassa vi maha sīlaṁkhaṁḍaē ēsō ? ' ॥ 25 ॥ 6810 ॥ 
iya jaṁpiyāvasāṇē dēvō pāḍēi tassa taṁ puraō । dhāhāvētiṁ bahusō bhujaṁtiṁ daṁsaē pāvō ॥ 26 ॥ 6811 ॥ 
taṁ daṇa vi ēsō “uvasaggamimaṁ " ti bhāviuṁ cittē । na vi muyai dhammajhāṇaṁ puṇō vi tiyasō kuṇai ruvaṁ ॥ 27 ॥ 6812 ॥ 
varavaṇijārayasarisaṁ āgaṁtu jaṁpaē taō ēsō । 'sāhu ! mahaṁ rayaṇāī giṇhāhi mahaṁtamōllāī ॥ 28 ॥ 6813 ॥ 
ahayaṁ māṇikavaṭṭō vikkiṇaṇatthaṁ imāṇa iha pattō । appēṇa vi mōllēṇaṁ tujjha payacchāmi ēyāṇi ॥ 29 ॥ 6814 ॥ 
jamhā hu majjha jaṇagassa saṁtiō āgaō lahu purisō । jaṁpai ya tujjha jaṇayassa atthi naṇu kāraṇaṁkiṁci ॥ 30 ॥ 6815 ॥ 
tā sigdhaṁ ciya tumaē gaṁtavvaṁ ' tēṇa ūsugō ahayaṁ । mōllēṇa thōyaēṇa vi tujjha payacchāmi nibrbhataṁ ॥ 31 ॥ 6816 ॥ 
tā giṇhasu, mā maṁcasu, dāhiṁti imāṇi tujjha mahalābhaṁ' । ēvabhaṇiō vi nō jāva jacchaē uttaraṁ kiṁci ॥ 32 ॥ 6817 ॥ 
tō jōi nāṇēṇaṁ dēvō jā pēcchaē tayaṁ saḍūḍhaṁ । varadhammajjhāṇagayaṁ kuddhō ya surō visēsēṇa ॥ 33 ॥ 6818 ॥ 
gaya-sīha - pisāyāī paḍikūlē vi hu karēi uvasaggē । taha vi na khubbhai ēsō, tuṭṭhō hiyaē taō tiyasō ॥ 34 ॥ 6819 ॥ 
kāūṇa pavararūvaṁ calaṁtamaṇikuṁḍalaṁ suhārillaṁ । vaṁdai puṇō puṇō vi hu giramērisayaṁ payaṁpatō ॥ 35 ॥ 6820 ॥ 
'tujjha kayatthō jammō, tujjha suladdhaṁ ca māṇusattamiṇaṁ । jaṁ ēvaṁvidhammō na muyasi maraṇē vi jiṇadhammaṁ ॥ 36 ॥ 6821 ॥ 
kiṁca tumaṁ varasāvaya ! tiyasasamūhāṇa majjhayārammi । aiharisaninbharēṇa sakkēṇa pasaṁsiō ahiyaṁ ॥ 37 ॥ 6822 ॥

bhaṇasu ya jaṁ tuha dijai kiṁci varaṁ jēṇa taṁ payacchāmi' । saḍūḍhō vi bhaṇai 'kiṁ tuha varamannaṁ daṁsaṇāō vi ॥ 39 ॥ 6824 ॥ 
annamiha atthi lōē ? tā pujjau majjha tiyasa ! annēṇa' । tiyasō vi bhaṇai 'sāvaya ! suradaṁsaṇamimamamōhaṁ ti ॥ 40 ॥ 6825 ॥ 
tā bhaṇasu kiṁpi sāvaya ! taṁ kāuṁ jēṇa jāmi niyaṭhāṇē' । āha imō 'jai ēvaṁ tō sāsaṇaunnaī kuṇasu' ॥ 41 ॥ 6826 ॥ 
dēvō vi hu tavvayaṇaṁ paḍivajjiya jāi jiṇavaragihēsu । niyaparivārasamēō karēi aṭṭhāhiyāmahimaṁ ॥ 42 ॥ 6827 ॥ 
kāūṇa taō pūyaṁ nāṇāvihajalaya-thalaya kusumēhiṁ । rahasavasapūriyaṁgō hārōtthayaraiyavacchyalō ॥ 43 ॥ 6828 ॥

daṭṭūṇa ya nañcaṁtaṁ dēvaṁ aṭṭhāhiyaṁ ca jiṇabhavaṇē । sabbō vi nayaralōgō bāhiralōō ya jaṁpēi ॥ 45 ॥ 6830 ॥ 
'bhō bhō ! pēcchaha ēvaṁ acchariyaṁ sirijiṇidadhammassa । jaṁ dēvā vi hu ēvaṁ biṁbē pūyaṁti vadati ॥ 46 ॥ 6831 ॥ 
gāyaṁti ya, vāyaṁti ya, ubvēllabhuyā tahā paṇacaṁti । jiṇapaḍimāṇaṁ puraō pēcchaha bhō ! dhammamāhappaṁ ॥ 47 ॥ 6832 ॥ 
tā ēsō yi aikkō iha dhammō jiṇavariṁdapaṇṇattō । jēṇa tiyasā vi ēvaṁ kuṇaṁti aṭṭhāhiyāmahimaṁ' ॥ 48 ॥ 6833 ॥ 
ēvaṁ pasaṁsamuhalaṁ lōyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa jaṁpai surō vi । 'bhō ! bhō ! bhō ! puralōyā ! maha vayaṇaṁ avahiyā suṇaha ॥ 49 ॥ 6834 ॥

jamabhiruiyaṁ, ēyāē puṇa cautthīē ukkharabaḍiḍaḍriḍhallayasōggarayamāiyaṁ annaṁ pi jamacaṁtamaṇiṭuṁ kayasaṇaṁ taṁ piṁ
ukkhāṇaya-vēkkhāṇayaṁ paidiṇaṁ parivēṁsējjāhi, jaō ēsā accatamasaṁbaddhapalāviṇī' । ēvamāi samāisiūṇa sō vi gaō
khēttē । tattha ya savvāṇi vi kammaṁ kāūṇa samāgayāṇi । bhōyaṇavēlāē dhāriṇīē vi jamāiṭuṁ paiṇā taṁ savvaṁ 10

"haṁta ! jama amhēhiṁ maṁtiyaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ tayaṁ cēva । amhāṇaṁ saṁjāyaṁ kēṇā'vi hu kāraṇavasēṇa ॥ 32 ॥ 6883 ॥

maṇōrahō kaō sō amhāṇaṁ saṁpattō, tumaē puṇa jō kayasaṇamaṇōrahō kaō sō cēva tujjha saṁjāō, tā maṇōrahō vina
tucchō kāyavyō' । sīlamaīē bhaṇiyaṁ - 'halā ! kimaṇēṇa bhōyaṇamaṇōrahēṇa ? jaō jai tumhēhiṁ maṇōja bhōjaṁ bhuttaṁ tahā

ciṁtiō sō jai saṁpajaṛa tā kayatthamattāṇayaṁ mannēmi । ēvaṁ jaṁpatīō gayāō khēttē । taō paidiṇamēyaṁ vihijamāṇa

diṇē di ki i" । sīlamaīē bhaṇiyaṁ - 'hōu ēvaṁ pi, kō ēttha dōsō ? jaō jaṁ sāsuyā aṇihuṁ pi dēi taṁ majjha
iṭuyaṁ cēva' । iyarāhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ - 'jai ēvaṁ tō jāṇāmō tāva ēyaṁ ti' । taō annammi diṇē bhaṇiyā jēāhiṁ sāsū,

samōiṇṇō । diṭṭhāō ya sīlasuṁdarīē dubē nārīō, pucchiyāō ya - 'halā ! kāō tubbhē ?' tāhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ - 'jō
tuha pāsē samāgaō āsi vijjāharō tassa bhāriyāō' । 'jai ēvaṁ tā kiṁ nimittamihāgayāō ?' tāhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ-
'mannija amha ajauttassa vayaṇaṁ, āruhijjau ēttha vimāṇē ' । sīlasuṁdarīē jaṁpiyaṁ- 'nirāsāō ! vijāharīō
hōūṇa viguttāō niyapaiṇō vi dūittaṇaṁ karatīō ?' । tāhiṁ laviyaṁ 'halā ! mā ēvaṁ bhaṇasu, savvuttamō amha
daiō, tā mannijjau tassa vayaṇaṁ' । tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - 'savvajahannō tumha bhattā jō paranāriṁ patthēi' । ēvaṁ ca tīē
samullaviē puṇō dinnaṁ pacattaramaṇāhiṁ, jahā - ' mā ēvaṁ karēhi, amha piyayamēṇa saha gayāē tuha sōhaṇaṁ bhavissai' ।
tīē jaṁpiyaṁ- ' na, majjha tēṇa sōhaṇēṇa vi kiṁci kajaṁ, tā ōsaraha mama diṭṭigōyarāō, mā bhaṇihaha jahā - na
kahiyaṁ' ti । ēvaṁ ca bhaṇiyāō gayāō savimāṇaṁ । taō pavaṇavēgō saha ṇiyakaṁtāē tīē guṇē vantō pattō vēyaṁ । 10
gaō ya suddagarāyasamīvaṁ । kahiyaṁ ca niravasēsaṁ taṁ suddagassa । rāyā vi tamasaddahaṁtō bhaṇiō pavaṇavēgēṇa - ' jai
dēvassa mama vayaṇē na'tthi paccaō, tā pasāyaṁ kāūṇa āruhau vimāṇē, jēṇa sayaṁ cēva pēcchai niyapiyayamā sarūvaṁ' ।

vilavahiṁ iṁda niraṁtara duhiyā, vilavahiṁ dēvanivaha parikhuhiyā ।
vilavahiṁ dēvi asēsa duhattiya, saṁtijiṇidaha guṇa sumaratiya ॥ 97 ॥ 7407 ॥ 
vilavahiṁ khēyara khēyari dukkhiya sōyamahādavajālāluṁkhiya ।
vilavahiṁ maṇuya sōyaḍajjhatā, vilavahiṁ nārinivaha mujjhatā ॥ 98 ॥ 7408 ॥ 
ēvaṁ vilavai savvō duhiō lōgō jiṇidasivagamaṇē । jēṇa jaṇē supasiddhaṁ niyakajjuṁ vallahaṁ hōi ॥ 99 ॥ 7409 ॥ 
niyaka sīyaṁta dahuṁ rōbai jaṇō imō sabbō । bhayavaṁ saṁtijiṇidō pattō puṇa mōkkhasōkkhammi ॥ 100 ॥ 7410 ॥

naṁdaṇavaṇāō āṇiya hariyaṁdaṇasarasabahalapakēṇa । ghāṇa maṇamaṇaharēṇaṁ vilēviyaṁ saṁtijiṇadēhaṁ ॥ 102 ॥ 7412 ॥ 
kappūramāiēhiṁ pahāṇavāsēhiṁ vāsiyaṁ taha ya । acchāiyaṁ ca taha dēvadūsavatthēṇa saṇhēṇaṁ ॥ 103 ॥ 7413 ॥ 
mayaṇāhi-agaru-silhaya-macchya ōgālamāidhūvēhiṁ । dhūyaṁti savvaō cciya sirisaṁtijiṇassa taṁ dēhaṁ ॥ 104 ॥ 7414 ॥

sēsajaīṇa ya kicaṁ kuṇaṁti vēmāṇiyā asēsaṁ pi । tattō aggimuhēhiṁ muhēṇa khittō tahiṁ jalaṇō ॥ 108 ॥ 7418 ॥ 
vāu kumārāvi taō dēvā pañjālayaṁti ciyagāō । viurubbiūṇa, suhasurahimaṁthara pavaṇasaṁghāyaṁ ॥ 109 ॥ 7419 ॥ 
tattō ya maṁsa - ruhirammi jhāmiē surahi- sīyalaṁ salilaṁ । mōttuṁ mēhamuhēhiṁ jhaḍatti vijjhāviyā ciyayā ॥ 110 ॥ 7420 ॥

gayadaṁtasu viyā sikkayamajjhammi gōlayasamuggā । vairamayā ciṭṭaṁtī tēsu payattēṇa ṭhārvēti ॥ 114 ॥ 7424 ॥ 
pūyaṁti ya paidiyahaṁ aha kō vi parābhavaṁ jai karējā । tō pakkhāliya tāō salilēṇa kuṇati niyarakkhaṁ ॥ 115 ॥ 7425 ॥ 
ēvaṁ kayasakkārā tiyasiṁdā jiṇavariṁdadēhassa । tattō ya tammi ṭhāṇē rayaṁti thūbhaṁ mahārammaṁ ॥ 116 ॥ 7426 ॥

[ siridēvacaṁdasūrīṇa patthaṇā ]
" kaha vaṇiuṁ samatthō sirisaṁtijiṇēsarassa bhavagahaṇē । jēṇa ahaṁ chaumatthō, maṁdamaī taha ya accatthaṁ ॥ 1 ॥ tahā ya-
bahujōyaṇagaṁtavvē maggē kaha jāu paṁgulō purisō ? । kaha vā vihu dummēhō paḍhau asēsa pi suyanāṇaṁ ? ॥ 2 ॥ 
bhūmiṭṭiō bāmaṇaō kaha vā gēṇhau phalāṇi tālassa ? । kaha vā vi maṁdacakkhū pēcchēu bara'kkharē suhumē ? ॥ 3 ॥ 
kaha vā vi uccakannō suṇēu aiguttamaṁtamaṁtaṇayaṁ ? । kaha vā vi bāhutaraō jāu mahājalahipārammi ? ॥ 4 ॥ 
kaha vā vi vāyabhaggō dēu jaṇāṇaṁdagāṇi karaṇāṇi ? | kaha vā vi appavijjō viyarau āyāsamaggēṇa ? ॥ 5 ॥ 
ēyasamō ahayaṁ pi hu vaṇṇēmi kahaṁ nu saṁtijiṇacariyaṁ ? | ahavā vi 'bhattivasagā muṇaṁti nō attaṇō sattiṁ ' ॥ 6 ॥ 
jaha jalahimajjhaḍiō vi dughaō lēi attaṇō pūraṁ । bahubhōjē vi hu pattē lēi narō udarabharamēva ॥ 7 ॥ 
jaha bahutārē vi nahē gaṇai sugaṇaō vi tāraē kaivi । jaha bahudavbē vi jaē niyai narō thōvarūbāī ॥ 8 ॥ 
jaha varavakkhāṇē vi hu maṁdamaī suṇai kaivi hu payatthē । jaha sāmannanariṁdō kiṁcī bhuṁjēi bharahassa ॥ 9 ॥ 
taha saṁtiṇāhacariē apamāṇaguṇē aṇēgavr̥ttaṁtē । acaṁtamaṁdamaiṇā maē vi kiṁci samakkhāyaṁ ॥ 10 ॥ 
jō niyayasattiviyalō uppāḍai garuyabhārapabbhāraṁ । hāsadvāṇaṁ jāyai niyamā sō sattijuttāṇaṁ ॥ 11 ॥ 
taha ahamavi maṁdamaī payaṭṭamāṇō imammi kavvammi । jāō viusajaṇāṇaṁ hāsadvāṇaṁ mahamaīṇaṁ ॥ 12 ॥ 
ahavā nahi nahi ēyaṁ hasaī kaiyā vi sajaṇō annaṁ । jō hiyayamajjhakalusō sō' jai para dujaṇō hasai ॥ 13 ॥

asthi dharittīē iha paiḍiō caumahallasāhālō | sumaṇasauṇāhivāsō kōḍiyagaṇaṇāmapavaratarū ॥ 1 ॥ 
tassa vairābhihāṇā sāhā acaṁtavitthaḍā jāyā । tīē siricaṁdakulaṁ kusumaṁ va samujjalaṁ sahai ॥ 2 ॥ 
tassa ya phalasāricchō samatthasauṇāṇa vihiyauvayārō । khaṁtiramaṇīyahārō ṇiccaṁ ciya ujjayavihārō ॥ 3 ॥ 
mēhasarisasaddō kōhāikasāyajaṇiyauvamaddō । āgāmiyapavarabhaddō sūrī ṇāmēṇa jasabhō ॥ 4 ॥ 
jēṇa ya ṇīrōgēṇa vi saṁlihiūṇaṁ daḍhaṁ ṇiyasarīraṁ । ujjēṁtasēlasiharē caubbihāhāracāēṇaṁ ॥ 5 ॥ 
siripuṇṇātallagacchubbhavēṇa kayamaṇasaṇaṁ vihāṇēṇa । kalikālē vihu vaṭṭaṁtayammi divasāī tērasa u ॥ 6 ॥

saṁvyuttamasuisuhaō bāitō jaṇēṇa aṇavarayaṁ । ṭhāṇayapagaraṇarūvō jassa jaē bhamai jasapaḍahō ॥ 8 ॥ 
vāyaraṇa-takka-siddhaṁta-kavva - 'laṁkāra kaṇayakasavaṭṭō । ṇissaṁbaddhavihārī mahīyalē vihariō sayayaṁ ॥ 9 ॥

ṇihayamayaṇāridappō jēṇaṁ ṇicaṁ pi pāliō kappō । jō saṁjamē aṇappō bhavaṇaitaraṇammi baratappō ॥ 11 ॥ 
vakkhāṇacārumayaraṁdalaṁpaḍuppēhaḍēhiṁ aṇavarayaṁ । sōyārayabhamarēhiṁ sēvijai jassa payakamalaṁ ॥ 12 ॥

-: praśastiḥ :-
prājñō gōtrādhipatvaṁ rasabharavilasannandanārāmaramyaḥ, sarvasyāśāprakāśī sakalasumanasāṁ sēvanīyaḥ sadaiva ।
nānā kalpāgamānāmupacayajanakō rājasammānabhāvaṁ prāptaḥ śrīdharkaṭānāṁ prakaṭitagarimā vaṁśamēruḥ samasti ॥ 1 ॥ 
sacchāyaḥ sarasaḥ sapatranicayaḥ śākhāpraśākhāṁcitaḥ, pīnaskaṁdhavirājitaḥ pratipadaṁ santāpahārī satām ।
cintāgōcaracārivastuvisaraṁ dātuṁ samarthō'rthinām, tatrā'jāyata kalpapādapasamaḥ śrījāvaḍaḥ śrāvakaḥ ॥ 2 ॥ 
tasyā'bhavannakhilakalmaṣadōṣahīnāstisraḥ priyāstripathagā iva pūritāśāḥ ।
lōkatrayaprathitaśīlayutāstathāpi prāptāḥ kadācana na dīnapathātithitvam ॥ 3 ॥ 
jinadēvī babhūvā''sāmādyā madhuravādinī । straiṇōcitaguṇōpētā jinēndrapadapūjikā ॥ 4 ॥ 
rākāsudhāraśmisamānaśīlā śuddhāśayā nanditadīnalōkā । rūpaśriyā tarjitakāmakāntā kāntā dvitīyā'jani sarvadēvī ॥ 5 ॥ 
kundāvadātadyutiśīlaśālinī mātēva sarvasya janasya vatsalā ।
pūrṇī tathā pūrṇamanōrathasthitiḥ jātā tr̥tīyā gr̥hiṇī vivēkinī ॥ 6 ॥ 
yaḥ sarvadā sarvajanōpakārī gambhīra - dhīrō jinadharmakārī । taṁ durlabhaṁ durlabhamatyapuṇyaiḥ prāsūta tatra prathamā tanūjaṁ ॥ 7 ॥ 
sātau bhuvi vikhyātau sarvadēvyāḥ sutāvubhau । udayācalacūlāyāḥ sūryā - candramasāviva ॥ 8 ॥ 
10
<pb n="900"/>

ādyastayōḥ sajjanacittahārī nayī vinītaḥ sakalōpakārī | jinēndrapūjāvihitānurāgaḥ sādhupriyō'jāyata dēvanāgaḥ ॥ 9 ॥ 
dvitīyaśca guṇāvāsaḥ satya - śaucasamanvitaḥ । kalāvānujjilō jātaḥ kulakairavacandramāḥ ॥ 10 ॥ 
sūrēḥ śrījinavallabhasya gaṇinaḥ pādaprasādēna tallabdhaṁ yēna vivēkayānamasamaṁ duḥprāpamalpāśayaiḥ ।
yēnā'dyāpi sukhaṁ sukhēna kr̥tinaḥ saṁsārabārāṁnidhēḥ pāraṁ yāṁti paraṁ nirastasakalaklēśāvakāśōdayāḥ ॥ 11 ॥ 
śirasi namanaṁ yaḥ sādhūnāṁ dr̥śōratiśāntatāṁ vadanakamalē satyāṁ vāṇīṁ śrutau śravaṇaṁ śrutēḥ ।
manasi vimalaṁ bōdhaṁ pāṇau dhanasya visarjanaṁ jinagr̥hagatiṁ pādāṁbhōjē cakāra vibhūṣaṇam ॥ 12 ॥ 
prālēyaśailaśikharōjjvalakāntikāntaśrīnēmināthabhuvanacchalataśca yēna ।
mūrtaḥ svadharma iva sarvajanīya dāturāviḥ kr̥taḥ sakalalōkahitāvahēna ॥ 13 ॥ 
cāritrācaraṇaikadhīramanasō gītārthacūḍāmaṇēḥ, vidyānāṁ maṇidarpaṇasya śaminaḥ sēvyasya puṇyārthibhiḥ ।
yaśca śrīmunicandrasūrisugurōḥ pādāmbujaṁ sēvituṁ vāñchan matsaravarjitaḥ suravadhūprāṇēśvaratvaṁ gataḥ ॥ 14 ॥ 
niḥsīmadharmanilayaṁ kalitaṁ sadarthaiḥ sadvr̥ttatāvirahitaṁ na kadācanā'pi ।
khyātaṁ jagattrayamivāpadanantasattvaṁ pūrṇī sutatrayamatīvagabhīramadhyam ॥ 15 ॥ 
lakṣmīvilāsakalitō balidarpahantā satyānurāgihr̥dayō vidhipakṣapātī ।
lakṣmīdharaḥ sutavarō'jani tatra mukhyaścitraṁ tathāpi na janārdanatāmupētaḥ ॥ 16 ॥ 
10
<pb n="901"/>

ārādhitaśrījinanēmināthaḥ sampāditānantakhalapramāthaḥ । āsīd dvitīyō dhanadēvasaṁjñaḥ sadā sadācāravicāravijñaḥ ॥ 17 ॥ 
yasyā'samānaphala kāntaguṇābhirāmam, saṁruddharandhramavilāsijalapravēśam ।
saddhīvarairanugataṁ matiyānapātraṁ gambhīra kāryajaladhēḥ parabhāgamēti ॥ 18 ॥ 
vivēkijanavallabhaḥ sphaṭikaśailaśuddhāśayaḥ, kalaṁkavikalaḥ sadā sakalalōkasaṁtōṣadaḥ ।
babhūva jinapūjakaḥ suguruvandakaśrāvakaḥ tr̥tīya iha nandanaḥ sujananandanaḥ śrīdharaḥ ॥ 19 ॥ 
tatrōjilasya samajāyata dharmapatnī mandākinīsalilanirmalaśīlayuktā ।
lakṣmīḥ samastajanavāñchitadānadakṣā citraṁ na nirguṇaratā na calasvabhāvā ॥ 20 ॥ 
ullāsakāḥ sumanasāṁ viditānubhāvāḥ sampādakāḥ samayināṁ bahulaṁ phalānām ।
nityaṁ nijakramayutā bhuvanaprasiddhāḥ putrāstayōḥ r̥tusamāḥ ṣaḍihō jātāḥ ॥ 21 ॥ 
1
kāruṇyaratnāṅkuramēruśailaḥ saujanyapīyūṣarasāmburāśi: । ādyaḥ sutō'jāyata vardhamānastēṣāṁ kalābhiḥ parivardhamānaḥ ॥ 22 ॥ 10
apāragāmbhīryanivāsabhūmirvidvatsu śrāddhādijanōpakārī । analpalāvaṇyayutō dvitīyaḥ putraḥ pavitrō'jani mūladēvaḥ ॥ 23 ॥ 
kīrtēḥ pātraṁ nijagurugirāṁ pālanē labdhalakṣaḥ, sthānaṁ nītērjana kanayanānandadāyī sadaiva ।
dūrībhūtākhilakhaṇaulō jātavān putraratnaṁ tārtīyīkaḥ kuśalavasutāvallabhō rāmadēvaḥ ॥ 24 ॥ 
283
<pb n="902"/>

ta-
ē
babhūva kāruṇyaparigrahāya kr̥tāgrahaḥ kugrahadarpahantā । vipattisaṁpattisamānurāgī yaśōdharō dhīrimadhāma turyaḥ ॥ 25 ॥ 
jinēndrapūjāracanānubandhaḥ baddhōdyamō nirmalakīrtiśēṣaḥ । bhaktyā samāsēvitasarvadēvastatō'nujō'jāyata sarvadēvaḥ ॥ 26 ॥ 
muktāphalāraṁbharatirna dīnō viśrāmabhūmiḥ puruṣōttamānām । payōdhivannityagabhīrabhāvaḥ paṣṭhastanūjō''jani cāpadēvaḥ ॥ 27 ॥ 
tatrāsīd rāmadēvasya vallabhā śīlaśālinī । āsadēvīti vikhyātā surūpā rūpikā'parā ॥ 28 ॥ 
yaśōdharasya jāyā ca thēhikā hitakāriṇī | śōbhanā sarvadēvasya cāpadēvasya śāntikā ॥ 29 ॥ 
asti sma thēḍa iti prathitābhidhānaḥ kundāvadātahr̥dayaḥ sadayaḥ sadaiva ।
dhīrō yaśōdharasutaḥ kalitaḥ kalābhiḥ nityaḥ praśastacaritaḥ praṇatō gurūṇām ॥ 30 ॥ 
ānandakaḥ sumanasāṁ satataṁ sudharmā baddhādaraḥ kr̥tavimānamanapravr̥ttiḥ ।
āstē mahēndra iva vallabhacitralēkhaḥ śrī rāmadēvatanayō vinayī mahēndraḥ ॥ 31 ॥ 
haricandrābhidhānaśca dvitīyō'bhūttanūdbhavaḥ । vallabhaḥ sarvalōkānāṁ pratipaccandramā iva ॥ 32 ॥ 
vinayī nayasaṁvāsō cāpadēvasya nandanaḥ । gōsalākhyaḥ suśīlō'bhūd guṇaratnamahānidhiḥ ॥ 33 ॥ 
āsīdādyā mahēndrasya mahāśrī - rūpasapriyāḥ । rājya śrīḥ śīla- kāruṇya-dānaucityādiśālinī ॥ 34 ॥ 
rājyaśriyastrayaḥ putrā vīsalō'tha yaśōbhaṭaḥ । vōcisthaścēti saṁjātā guṇaratnaugharōhaṇāḥ ॥ 35 ॥ 
rājyaśrīranyadā tatra śuddha śraddhānabaṁdhurā । ityēvaṁ cintayāmāsa nissamānaguṇōjjvalā ॥ 36 ॥ 
5
<pb n="903"/>

"prāṇā vāyumayāḥ, svabhāvataralā lakṣmīḥ kaṭākṣasthirā, svāmyaṁbālavilaṁbitā tanuśilāvasthānasthaṁ sadā ।
bātāṁdōlitadīpa kuḍmaladalaprāyaḥ priyaiḥ saṁgamastannāstīha kimapyudāramanasāmāśāmivēśāspadaṁ ॥ 37 ॥ 
tallabdhvā manujēṣu janma vimalaṁ saṁprāpya dēśādikam, śrutvā śrījinacandravācamucitāṁ śrīmadgurūṇāṁ puraḥ ।
svādhīnē ca dhanē ca saṁgatavati svīyē kuṭumbē satām, yuktō dharmavidhāna ēva satataṁ kartuṁ mahānudyamaḥ ॥ 38 ॥ 
samyagjñānapuraḥsaraśca mahatāṁ dharmādaraḥ sammataḥ, prāyastacca jināgamādavikalaṁ saṁjāyatē dhīmatām ।
sarvaṁ lōkamavēkṣya śāntaviśadaprajñāprakarṣōdyamaṁ kālē sō'pi kalau nyavēsi munibhiḥ saṁghōttamaiḥ pustakē ॥ 39 ॥ 
cāritrabhāracaraṇāsahamānasēna paṁcaprakāraviṣayāmiṣalālasēna ।
pātrādidānamayadharmavatā tadēvaṁ lēkhyaṁ parigrahavatā gr̥hiṇā tadēva ॥ 40 ॥ 
ēvaṁ vicintya suciraṁ śrēyōrthaṁ svasya sāṁbarājyaśrīḥ । śrīśāntināthacaritasya pustakaṁ lēkhayāmāsa ॥ 41 ॥ 
viracitavicitrarēkhaṁ suvarṇapatrāvalīkalitaśōbham । yadbhāti karē viduṣāṁ kaṁkaṇamiva kīlikāramyam ॥ 42 ॥ 
rākāśītāṁśuśubhrasphuradamaladr̥śaḥ sarvavastuprakāśī samyagjñānapradīpastribhuvanabhavanābhyantarē bhāsamānaḥ ।
yāvanmōhāndhakāraṁ śamayati sakalaṁ pūritāśēṣadōṣam, tāvannandyānmunīndrairayamiha satataṁ pustakaḥ paṭhyamānaḥ ॥ 42 ॥ 
 ॥ iti ॥ śrī śubhaṁ bhūyāt ॥

dvitīyaṁ pariśiṣṭam
prastuta 'sirisaṁtināhacariya mantargatāni granthagatāni subhāṣitāni
aidulahā pavvajjā ēsā saṁsāramajjhayārammi । paḍiyāṇaṁ pāṇīṇaṁ jiṇidacaṁdēhi jā diṭṭhā ॥ 2315 ॥ 
aipabalapavaṇavihuṇiyadēulasihara'ggasaṁṭhiyadhaō vva । mahilāmaṇaṁ na ghēppaṛa, tā dhī dhī thīsahāvassa ॥ 5061 ॥ 
aisayāṇaṁ samaggāṇaṁ sīlaṁ kāraṇamīriyaṁ । thaṁbhiyā jēṇa sīlāō damayaṁtīē gayādaō ॥ 91 ॥ 
accaṁtakurūvāṇa vi narāṇa rūvaṁ varaṁ bhavē sīlaṁ । jaha ṇaṁdisēṇasāhū dēvāṇa vi dullahō jāō ॥ 88 ॥ 
aṇavarayajahicchiyasaṁpaḍaṁtabhōgēhiṁ lāliō jīvō । saggammi na uṇa tittī jalaṇassa va dāruniyarēṇa ॥ 5046 ॥ 
aṇasaṇu tāsu pahillauṁ aṁgū, kammakhayaha jaṁ kāraṇu caṁgū । ūṇōyariya biiya paviyāraha, jahiṁ ūṇattaṇu niyaāhāra ॥ 5569 ॥ 
adattacāēṇa bhavaṁti bhōgā, adattacāēṇa visiṭṭhajōgā । adattacāēṇa na hōi daṁḍō, adattacāēṇa bhavē supiṁḍō ॥ 3318 ॥ 
annaha paricitijjai saharisakaṁḍujjaē hiyaēṇa । pariṇamai annaha cciya kajjāraṁbhō vihivasē ॥ 7132 ॥ 
annahā ciṁtaī jīvō hāsa - tōsaparavvasō । annahā taṁ vihāḍē divvō paramavēriō ॥ 330 ॥ 
anyathaiva vicintyantē puruṣēṇa manōrathāḥ । daivāhitasadbhāvāḥ kāryāṇāṁ gatayō'nyathā ॥ 7131 ॥ 
apariggaṇaṁ bhavaī suvittaṁ, apariggahēṇaṁ varavattha- pattaṁ । apariggahēṇaṁ dhaṇa - dhannariddhī, apariggahēṇaṁ tu kamēṇa siddhī ॥ 3320 ॥

avamāṇēi māṇāō māyaraṁ piyaraṁ guruṁ । tēsimavamāṇaṇāē u duggaiṁ vaccaē ṇarō ॥ 5113 ॥ 
asārō ēsa saṁsārō, savvadukkhāṇa ālaō । ēttha maccubhayaṁ ghōraṁ jāyaī caugaīsu vi ॥ 2232 ॥ 
āī kōhō bhavē tēsi savvā'ṇatthaṇibaṁdhaṇaṁ । hiyāhiyaṁ na yāṇāī jēṇa jīvō vasīkaō ॥ 5110 ॥ 
ājammaṁ ciya payaī ēsā iha hōi supurisajaṇāṇa । jaṁ duhiyaparajaṇāṇaṁ pāṇēhiṁ vi karahiṁ uvayāraṁ ॥ 4137 ॥ 
āyāsa-pāyāla-vaṇaṁtarālē abbhuggayā maṁdapasappamāṇā । kittīlatā viddhimuvēi sammaṁ sittā tavēṇaṁ sujalappaṇaṁ ॥ 96 ॥ 
ihalōē āyāsaṁ ayasaṁ ca karaṁti guṇaviṇāsaṁ ca । pasavaṁti ya paralōē sārīra - maṇōgaē dukkhē ॥ 639 ॥ 
uvayārēhiṁ parō cciya ghēppai agghaṁti tē tarhi cēva । iyarammi paujjaṁtā nēhābhāvaṁ payāsēṁti ॥ 5051 ॥ 
ēgadivasaṁ pi jīvō pavvajjamuvāgaō aṇannamaṇō । jai vi ṇa pāvai mōkkhaṁ avassa vēmāṇiō hōi ॥ 16819 ॥ 
ēgadivasaṁ pi jīvō pālai jō savvaviraimaccatthaṁ । sō jai na vi lahai sivaṁ, mahiḍḍiō hōi tō dēvō ॥ 3463 ॥ 
ēvaṁ māyā vi savvāṇaṁ aṇatthāṇaṁ ṇibaṁdhaṇaṁ । jīē vasīkaō pāṇī savvaṁ cēva ṇigūhai ॥ 5114 ॥ 
kāurisāṇaṁ visamō visamasarō, nēya dhīrapurisāṇaṁ । maṁsammi khaggadhārā tiṇhā, na uṇāi vajjammi ॥ 5045 ॥ 
kāūṇaṁ pāṇavahaṁ jīvā paṁcēṁdiyāṇa jīvāṇa । nivaḍaṁti mahānaraē, bhāvēhi imaṁ sacittammi ॥ 3777৷৷
kāmadhēṇū jahā dēi dujjhamāṇī maṇicchiyaṁ । dēvacaṁdēhiṁ sūrīhiṁ vaṇṇiyā bhāvaṇā tahā ॥ 108 ॥ 
kāyavvō iha jattō viraīē uttamēhiṁ purisēhiṁ । jamhā viraī saggā - 'pavaggasaṁsaggasaṁjaṇaṇī ॥ 3461 ॥

kiṁ jaṁpiēṇa bahuṇā ? jaṁ jaṁ cittēṇa citaē jīvō । taṁ taṁ annaṁ pi phuḍaṁ pāvai varapattadāṇāō ॥ 83 ॥ 
kiṁpāgaphalasamāṇā visayā accatavirasaavasāṇā । aidāruṇadukkhakarā satti - balāṇaṁ viṇāsayarā ॥ 756 ॥ 
kē vihu aṇubaṁdhēṇaṁ bahuvēraparaṁparāō kāūṇa । avarōpparaghāēṇaṁ paḍaṁti jīvā mahānaraē ॥ 3397 ॥ 
kō kuṇau tāṇa mōllaṁ supurisarayaṇāṇa ēttha puhaīē । jāṇa maṇē saṁkappō parakajjaṁ cēva niyakajjaṁ ॥ 1556 ॥ 
kō dukkhaṁ pāvējjā ? kassa va sukkhēhiṁ vimhaō hōjjā ? । kō va na labhējja mōkkhaṁ ? rāga-ddōsā jai ṇa hōjjā ॥ 641 ॥ rāgadvēṣatyāgē
kōhāiyā kasāyā u cattāri vi duraṁtayā । hōṁti dukkhāya jaṁtūṇaṁ kijjaṁtā bhavacāra ॥ 5109 ॥ 
khaṁtī cēva ya jāyai asēsakallāṇakāraṇaṁ paramaṁ । tamhā sa cciya ṇiccaṁ jaīhi paḍhamaṁ vihēyavvā ॥ 5564 ॥ 
khaṇamēttaṁ pi hu virayāṇa dullahaṁ jēṇa vanniyaṁ samaē । tattha vi ya savvaviraī vaṇijjai jēṇimaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ॥ 3462 ॥ 
khalasaṁgasaṁgayāō siṇēhapaurāō lōhasārāō । cakkiyasālāō iva mahiliyāō mailaṁti sāḍīō ॥ 6513 ॥ 
gayajōvvaṇā vi kēī bāla vva samāyaraṁti kammāī । duggainibaṁdhaṇāī, jōvvaṇavaṁtā vi nō kēi ॥ 5043 ॥ 
gaha-visa- bhūyapaṇāsaṇa atthi aṇēga gara । atthi ji vāhiṁ paṇāsahiṁ takkhaṇi vējjavara ॥ 
jāṇami vijja suvējjasusatthaggama vahai, nēhagahillaha cittaha jō ōsahu kahai ॥ 1919 ॥ 
* guṇā savvē vi tā hōṁti jāva sīlaṁ samujjalaṁ । sīlammi khaṁḍiē ṭhāṇaṁ savvadōsāṇa sō bhavē ॥ 89 ॥ 
camma -'ṭṭhi-ṇhārubaddhaṁ nārīṇa kalēvaraṁ asuipuṇṇaṁ । dhiddhī jīvasahāvō jaṁ rajjai tattha māhaṁdhō ॥ 5742 ॥

chijjau sīsaṁ, aha hōu baṁdhaṇaṁ, cayau savvahā lacchī paḍivannapālaṇēsu purisāṇaṁ jaṁ hōī taṁ hōu ॥ 2426 ॥ 
jaṁ ajjiyaṁ caritaṁ dēsūṇāē vi puvvakōḍīē । taṁ pi kasāiyamēttō nāsēi narō muhuttēṇa ॥ 5562 ॥ 
jaṁ ajjiyaṁ samīkhallaēhiṁ tava - niyama - baṁbhamaiēhiṁ । mā hu tayaṁ kalahaṁtā, chaḍḍēhiha sāgapattēhiṁ ॥ 5563 ॥ 
jaṁ annāṇī kammaṁ khavēi bahuyāhiṁ vāsakōḍīhiṁ । taṁ nāṇī tihiṁ guttō khavēi ūsāsamēttēṇa ॥ 2288 ॥ 
jē iṁdiēhiṁ purisā na hōṁti maraṇē vi laṁpaḍasahāvā । tē mahamuṇiṇō vva daḍhaṁ na ya ummaggaṁ pavajjaṁti ॥ 2936 ॥ 
jaṁ uyaraṁ airuiraṁ vibhāviyaṁ mōhamōhiyamaṇēhiṁ । taṁ asuinivahasaṁpūriyaṁ va, kira kōṭṭhayaṁ muha ॥ 5748 ॥ 
jaṁ jaṁ kappai cittammi jīvō kajjaṁ maṇicchiyaṁ । taṁ taṁ saṁpāḍaē savvaṁ sīlaṁ kappahumōvamaṁ ॥ 93 ॥ 
jaṁ jammaṁtari kammu kiu jīvi asuhu maṇēṇa । taṁ cūrijjai nittulauṁ rasamasatavalōḍhēṇa ॥ 3736 ॥ 
jaṁ pi muhaṁ airammaṁ visadr̥kaṁdōṭṭasacchahaṁ kaliyaṁ । taṁ pi galaṁtayalālākarāliyaṁ kiṁ na bhāvēha ? ॥ 5746 ॥ 
jaṁ pi varaṁgaṁ ṇīsēsavisayarasasuhasamūhayaṁ muṇiyaṁ । taṁ bībhacchaṁ asuīpavāhanijjharaṇamii muṇasu ॥ 5750 ॥ 
jai jīviyaṁ pi dijjai rāyaṇurattēṇa kēṇa vi ṇarēṇa । nārī tahavi ṇa ghippai, tā dhī dhī thīsahāvassa ॥ 5059 ॥ 
jai nēcchasi paḍiuṁ jē saṁsāramahāsamuddamajjhammi | navajāṇavattasarisaṁ tō pavvajjaṁ pavajjāhi ॥ 2711 ॥ 
jai nēcchasi nivaḍēuṁ saṁsāramahāgahīrakūvammi । navadaḍharajjusaricchaṁ tō pavvajjaṁ pavajjāhi ॥ 2712 ॥ 
jai nēcchasi vasiuṁ jē bhavaguttiharammi bhīsaṇatarammi । tassugghāḍaṇavijjaṁ tō pavvajjaṁ pavajjāhi ॥ 2713 ॥

jassa puṇō pāsammi samasuha - dukkhā samāṇacittillā । atthi piyā guṇakaliyā raṇṇaṁ pi jaṇāulaṁ tassa ॥ 7032 ॥ 
jaha kō vi rayaṇadīvē gaṁtuṁ laddhūṇa viviharayaṇāiṁ । niddapamāyapamattō hārai rayaṇāṇi maṁdamaī ॥ 3886 ॥ 
taha jō laddhuṁ sammattamāivivihāraṁ dhammarayaṇāī । kuṇai pamāyaṁ mūḍhō sō hārai tāṇi nibdhaṁtaṁ ॥ 3887

jā kuṇai savvatati kammayarāṇaṁ tahēva baṁdhūṇa । uciyammi saṁpayaṭṭai gharassa lacchī, na sā ghariṇī ॥ 3240 ॥ 
jā vi kaḍī suvisālā, mōhijjai jīē ēsa kira jīvō। sā haḍḍa-camma- maṁsēhiṁ ṇimmiyā, kiṁ na citēhi ? ॥ 5749 ॥ 
jā sā ahiṁsā paḍhamā vayāṇaṁ, sā bhāyaṇaṁ hōi sayā suhāṇaṁ । sā vajjatullā duhapavvayāṇaṁ, sā kāraṇaṁ sāsayasaṁpayāṇaṁ ॥ 3315 ॥

jīvā pamāyavasayā paḍaṁti saṁsārasāyarē ghōrē । tamhā tayaṁ vivajjaha, mā mujjhaha niyayakajjammi ॥ 4858 ॥ 
jē uttamakulajāyā sumaraṁtā tē kulakkamaṁ dhīrā । mattagayaṁda vva sayā na ya ummaggaṁ pavajrjjati ॥ 2933 ॥ 
jē uttamajāīē saṁbhūyā hōṁti māṇavā kēi । jaccaturaya vva niccaṁ na ya ummaggaṁ pavajjati ॥ 2934 ॥ 
jē kaṇayakummasarisā pāyā varakāmiṇīṇa parikaliyā । tē aṭṭhipaṁjaramayā jīva ! tumaṁ dharasu cittammi ॥ 5752 ॥ 
jē kuṁdakaliyavarapaṁtisacchahā manniyā imē dasaṇā । tē haḍḍakhaṁḍamālaṁ, paccakkhaṁ muṇasu rē jīva ॥ 5745 ॥

* jē kēi lōyammi guṇā pasatthā dīsaṁti jīvāṇa hiēkkakārī । nissēsayāṇaṁ pi tavappahāṇī ṭhāṇaṁ bhavē tāṇa narō paḍō vva ॥ 100 ॥ 
jē niyakajjaṁ mōttuṁ kuṇaṁti parakajjamēva aṇudiyahaṁ । kira supurisāṇa tāṇaṁ kō ṇu samō hōu puhavīē ? ॥ 1557 ॥

jēmēi savvajimiē, suyai pasuttammi pariyaṇē savvē । paḍhamaṁ cēva viujjhai gharassa lacchī, na sā ghariṇī ॥ 3239 ॥ 
jēhi samaṁ paccūsē kīlijjai haṇibbharamaṇēhiṁ । tē vi diṇaṁtē rujjaṁti virasa - akaṁdasaddēhiṁ ॥ 2490 ॥

dāṇaṁ ti dhammassa ya āimaṁgaṁ, sīlaṁ biijjaṁ jiṇaṇāhadiṭṭaṁ । taiyaṁ tavō bhāvaṇamō cautthaṁ, suṇēha ēyāṇi visēsaō vi ॥ 75 ॥ 
dāṇu bhūya vasikarai, dāṇu sōhaggu payāsai । dāṇu vigghu niddalai, dāṇu jaṇi jasu ullāsa ।
dāṇu saggu apavaggu dēi annu vi jaṁ jaṁ maṇi । dāṇatullu na hu atthi ētthu tihuyaṇi ciṁtāmaṇi ॥ 76 ॥ 
divvassa matthaē pāḍiūṇa savvaṁ sahaṁti kāvurisā । divvō vi tāṇa saṁkai, jāṇaṁ tēō paripphurai ॥ 5020 ॥ 
* divvāṇi māṇusāṇi ya ṇāṇārūvāṇi jāṇi vigghāṇi । savvāṇi vi tāṇi phuḍaṁ dāṇāō jaṁti uvasāmaṁ ॥ 79 ॥ 
dukkhassa uvviyaṁtō haṁtūṇa paraṁ karēi paḍiyāraṁ । pāvihihī puṇa dukkhaṁ bahuyayaraṁ tannimittēṇa ॥ 3773 ॥ 
duggaīō aṇēgāō jāō dukkhāṇa bhāyaṇaṁ । ṇārayāīsu ṭhāṇēsu māyāsīlō ṇarō lahē ॥ 5116 ॥ 
duddamā iṁdiyā paṁca hayā ummaggagāmiṇō । bhāvaṇāē dharijjati mōkkhamaggē suhāvahē ॥ 105 ॥ 
dōhaggiṇō vi purisā rūvavihūṇā vi aguṇajuttā vi । varadāṇaṁ viyaraṁtā bhaṇa kassa ṇa vallahā hōṁti ? ॥ 78 ॥ 
dhammammi jō pamāyaṁ kuṇai narō mōhamōhiō saṁtō । sō pāvai dukkhāī nāṇārūvāiṁ bhavagahaṇē ॥ 3885 ॥ 
I
dhammō kappadumō lōē, dhammō kāmaghaḍō varō । dhammō kāmaduhā ghēṇū, dhammō ciṁtāmaṇī parī ॥ 58 ॥ 
dhammō dukkhōhakaṭṭhāṇaṁ dāhadāvāṇalōvamō । dhammō siva- saggamaggammi pahāṇō sigghasaṁdaṇō ॥ 59 ॥ 
dhārijjai ēṁtō sāyarō vi kallōlabhinnakulasēlō । na hu annajammaniyakammanimmiō dēvvapariṇāmō ॥ 2213 ॥

na guṇēhiṁ pavarēhi pahāṇapurisubbhavēhiṁ ghēppaṁti । ēyāō nārīō, tā dhī dhī thīsahāvassa ॥ 5056 ॥

sanmārgē tāvadāstē prabhavati puruṣastāvadēvēndriyāṇām, lajjāṁ tāvadvidhattē vinayamapi samālambatē tāvadēva ।
bhrūcāpākṣēpamuktāḥ śravaṇapathayuṣō nīlapakṣmāṇa ētē yāvallīlāvatīnāṁ na hr̥di dhr̥timr̥ṣō dr̥ṣṭibāṇāḥ patanti ॥ 1916 ॥ 
sappurisacēṭṭhiyāṇaṁ mōllaṁ na hu atthi jīvalōgammi । jamhā supurisacēṭṭhā labbhai na hu davvasaṁkhāē ॥ 1555 ॥ 
savvā vi hu pavvajjā pāyacchittaṁ bhavaṁtarakaḍāṇa । pāvāṇaṁ kammāṇaṁ tā jattō tattha kāyavvō ॥ 2488 ॥ 
savvāṇi mārīpamuhāṇi jāṇi duṭṭhāṇi jīvāṇa bhayaṁkarāṇi । bhattīē tattēṇa tavēṇa ṇiccaṁ khippaṁ viṇāsaṁ duriyāṇi jaṁti ॥ 95 ॥ 
sā dēi kallāṇaparaṁparāō, sā dāraē dāruṇaāvayāō । sā dēi saggammi suraṁgaṇāō, sā dēi mōkkhē suhasaṁpayāō ॥ 3316 ॥ 
sīlu pavaru ābharaṇu sīlu tiyasāṇa vi dullahu, sīlu rūva-guṇaṇilau sīlu muṇijaṇamaṇavallahu ।
sīlu sayalaaisayasamaggu, bhavasāyaraviddumu, sīlatullu ṇa hu atthi ētthu tihuyaṇi kappahumu ॥ 85 ॥ 
sīhaha kēsara, saihi thaṇa, saraṇāiu suhaḍassa । maṇi matthai āsīvisaha na vi ghēppai amuyassa ॥ 7146 ॥ 
sutthēhiṁ dutthēhiṁ ya āvayapaḍiēhi taha apaḍiēhiṁ । dhammō cciya kāyavvō bhaṇiyamiṇaṁ jiṇavaridēhiṁ ॥ 7143 ॥ 
sō dhūlī hōi ṇarō, sō hu tiṇaṁ sō hu chārapuṁjō tti । jō avamāṇijjaṁtō sattūrhi vi ciṭṭhaī satthō ॥ 856 ॥ 
haṁtūṇaṁ parapāṇē appāṇaṁ jō karēi sappāṇaṁ । appāṇaṁ divasāṇaṁ karaṇa nāsēi appāṇaṁ ॥ 3772 ॥ 
hālāhalaṁ piva visaṁ jaha bhuttaṁ māraē ṇa saṁdēhō । taha ēē vi hu visayā māriti bhavē ṇa saṁdēhō ॥ 758 ॥

111 tamapr̥ṣṭhasyāntimapaṁktitaḥ 112 tama pr̥ṣṭhasyādimapaṁktatrayaparyantaḥ sandarbhaḥ dvi-dvicaraṇarūpāsu ṣaṭsu paṁktiṣu vibhaktavyaḥ ।
289 tamapr̥ṣṭhasya tr̥tīyapaṁktērārabdhaḥ saptamapaṁktigata kannu paryantaḥ caturdaśacaraṇātmakaḥ sandarbhaḥ dvi-dvicaraṇarūpāsu saptasu paṁktiṣu
vibhaktavyaḥ । tathā saptamapaṁktigata 'tikkhaṁkusu 'ityārabdhaḥ aṣṭamapaṁktigata rāyaṁgaṇaha 'paryantaḥ sandarbhaḥ apabhraṁśakāvyasya 'ghattā 'nāmakachandaḥ-
prakārasya pūrvārdharūpō jñēya:, tadanantaragataḥ aṣṭamapaṁktisandarbhaśca 'ghattā 'nāmakachandaḥ prakārasyōttarārdharūpō'vagantavyaḥ ।

sīhō vi paidiṇaṁ ciya gēṇhai sāmāiyaṁ sunicchayaō । paḍikamaṇaṁ kuṇai tahā dōsu vi saṁjhāsu uvauttō ॥ 7 ॥ 6734 ॥ 
aha kēttiē vi kālē hittu kayāṇagāī bahuyāiṁ । vaccai uttaradēsaṁ sāmaggijuēṇa satthēṇa ॥ 8 ॥ 6735 ॥ 
tattōya aḍavimajjhē satthō āvāsiō naītīrē । sīhēṇa vi parigahiyaṁ sāmaiyaṁ tattha ṭhāṇammi ॥ 9 ॥ 6736 ॥ 
ētthaṁtarammi sahasā samāgaō bahalamasagasaṁghāō । tēṇaṁ khañjatō sō satthō vi haḍapphaḍō jāō ॥ 10 ॥ 6737 ॥ 
tattō dhūmāīyaṁ satthō juttaṁ karēi masagāṇaṁ । sīhō vi mahāsattō acchai taha cēva khajjaṁtō ॥ 11 ॥ 6738 ॥ 
mēru vya nippakaṁpō sō sammaṁ sahai uggamuvasaggaṁ । dhammajjhāṇammi ḍiō jhāēi suṇiccalamaīō ॥ 12 ॥ 6739 ॥ 
aha tēhiṁ masaēhiṁ jāva imō pāḍiō mahākaṭṭē । tā dakkhiṇavāēṇaṁ āgaṁtuṁ pēlliyā masagā ॥ 13 ॥ 6740 ॥ 
mukkō uvasaggāō sāmaiyaṁ pāraē taō sīhō । khaṇamēttēṇa ya dēhaṁ sūṇaṁ savvaṁ pi ēyassa ॥ 14 ॥ 6741 ॥ 
kaihiṁ vi diṇēhiṁ jāyaṁ satthāvatthaṁ puṇō vi hu sarīraṁ । tattō ya jāi puraō jāva vasaṁtappurē pattō ॥ 15 ॥ 6742 ॥ 
vikkēūṇaṁ bhaṁḍaṁ āsāiya tattha bahuguṇaṁ lābhaṁ । valiō ya niyayadēsassa sammuhaṁ jāva puṇa pattō ॥ 16 ॥ 6743 ॥ 
niyayambhi nayarammiṁ tattha paviṭṭhō u mahavibhūīē । niyaē pāsāyavarē bhuṁjai tatthuttamaṁ sōkkhaṁ ॥ 17 ॥ 6744 ॥

" kaha vaṇiuṁ samatthō sirisaṁtijiṇēsarassa bhavagahaṇē । jēṇa ahaṁ chaumatthō, maṁdamaī taha ya accatthaṁ ॥ 1 ॥ tahā ya-
bahujōyaṇagaṁtavvē maggē kaha jāu paṁgulō purisō ? । kaha vā vihu dummēhō paḍhau asēsa pi suyanāṇaṁ ? ॥ 2 ॥ 
bhūmiṭṭiō bāmaṇaō kaha vā gēṇhau phalāṇi tālassa ? । kaha vā vi maṁdacakkhū pēcchēu bara'kkharē suhumē ? ॥ 3 ॥ 
kaha vā vi uccakannō suṇēu aiguttamaṁtamaṁtaṇayaṁ ? । kaha vā vi bāhutaraō jāu mahājalahipārammi ? ॥ 4 ॥

ēyasamō ahayaṁ pi hu vaṇṇēmi kahaṁ nu saṁtijiṇacariyaṁ ? | ahavā vi 'bhattivasagā muṇaṁti nō attaṇō sattiṁ ' ॥ 6 ॥ 
jaha jalahimajjhaḍiō vi dughaō lēi attaṇō pūraṁ । bahubhōjē vi hu pattē lēi narō udarabharamēva ॥ 7 ॥ 
jaha bahutārē vi nahē gaṇai sugaṇaō vi tāraē kaivi । jaha bahudavbē vi jaē niyai narō thōvarūbāī ॥ 8 ॥ 
jaha varavakkhāṇē vi hu maṁdamaī suṇai kaivi hu payatthē । jaha sāmannanariṁdō kiṁcī bhuṁjēi bharahassa ॥ 9 ॥ 
taha saṁtiṇāhacariē apamāṇaguṇē aṇēgavr̥ttaṁtē । acaṁtamaṁdamaiṇā maē vi kiṁci samakkhāyaṁ ॥ 10 ॥ 
jō niyayasattiviyalō uppāḍai garuyabhārapabbhāraṁ । hāsadvāṇaṁ jāyai niyamā sō sattijuttāṇaṁ ॥ 11 ॥ 
taha ahamavi maṁdamaī payaṭṭamāṇō imammi kavvammi । jāō viusajaṇāṇaṁ hāsadvāṇaṁ mahamaīṇaṁ ॥ 12 ॥

111 tamapr̥ṣṭhasyāntimapaṁktitaḥ 112 tama pr̥ṣṭhasyādimapaṁktatrayaparyantaḥ sandarbhaḥ dvi-dvicaraṇarūpāsu ṣaṭsu paṁktiṣu vibhaktavyaḥ ।
289 tamapr̥ṣṭhasya tr̥tīyapaṁktērārabdhaḥ saptamapaṁktigata kannu paryantaḥ caturdaśacaraṇātmakaḥ sandarbhaḥ dvi-dvicaraṇarūpāsu saptasu paṁktiṣu
vibhaktavyaḥ । tathā saptamapaṁktigata 'tikkhaṁkusu 'ityārabdhaḥ aṣṭamapaṁktigata rāyaṁgaṇaha 'paryantaḥ sandarbhaḥ apabhraṁśakāvyasya 'ghattā 'nāmakachandaḥ-
prakārasya pūrvārdharūpō jñēya:, tadanantaragataḥ aṣṭamapaṁktisandarbhaśca 'ghattā 'nāmakachandaḥ prakārasyōttarārdharūpō'vagantavyaḥ ।
